item.title: Antonio Banderas is joined by stunning daughter Stella for Holy Week celebrations in his hometown of Malaga
item.description: The actor, 57, showcased his freshly-shaved head as he and the stunning 21-year-old watched the lavish affair from the balcony of a boutique hotel.
item.content:encoded:
He returns to his Spanish hometown of Malaga every year for the city's annual Holy Week.

And Antonio Banderas ensured the celebrations were a family affair on Monday, as he was joined by his daughter Stella for the famous Semana Santa.

The actor, 57, showcased his freshly-shaved head as he and his 21-year-old watched the religious affair from the balcony of a boutique hotel.

Family affair: Antonio Banderas was joined by his daughter Stella for the famous Semana Santa in Malaga on Monday

The actor, who had participated in the Palm Sunday service the previous evening, cut a more casual figure in an Aviation-style bomber jacket as he watched proceedings from the Larios hotel. 

While he layered a shirt and tie underneath, it was his freshly-shaven head that caught the most attention - having undergone a dramatic makeover for his upcoming role as Pablo Picasso.

Clearly relaxed during the annual celebrations, Antonio was joined by his daughter Stella - who was casually chic in high-rise jeans and an embroidered floral cardigan.

Casual: The actor cut a low-key figure in an Aviation-style bomber jacket as he watched proceedings from the Larios hotel

Catching up: Clearly relaxed during the annual celebrations, Antonio was joined by his daughter Stella, 21, and one of her friends

Stunning: Stella was casually chic in high-rise jeans and an embroidered floral cardigan, and opted to forgo make-up 

Having a ball: The trio were seen happily chatting together as they watched the famous service from their hotel room

Leaving her hair in loose, tousled waves and sporting minimal make-up, the beauty proved her naturally clear and glowing complexion as she chatted to her father during the exciting event. 

The actor returns to his hometown of Málaga each year for the religious Easter Weekend. 

Twenty-four hours earlier he was seen participating in the Palm Sunday service,as part of his role as a penitent in the Lagrimas y Favores (Tears and Favours) brotherhood.

Capturing the moment: The group were later seen snapping photos as the service proceeded

Iconic: Numerous guests were spotted on the hotel balcony, with the Semana Santa the city's most famous annual celebration

The Mask of Zorro actor donned white robes, a black hood and an ornate necklace as he rang a large silver bell and called out to the congregation inside a church. 

Antonio has been joined for the celebrations by his daughter and girlfriend Nicole Kimpel, 37.

The pair have been dating since 2014, following the end of his 19-year marriage to Melanie Griffith.   

Doing his bit: He has already been seen participating in the Palm Sunday service, as part of his role as a penitent in the Lagrimas y Favores (Tears and Favours) brotherhood

Antonio was worlds away from his usual self with his freshly-shaved head and eyebrows, which mark part of his metamorphosis into Pablo Picasso for the second series of Genius.

The artist's story follows the first hit season, which starred Geoffrey Rush as Nobel Prize winning scientist Albert Einstein.

The show earned National Geographic its best ratings ever, with 45million viewers tuning in globally, and the second series is set to premiere on April 24. 

Main man: Antonio was worlds away from his usual self with his freshly-shaved head and eyebrows, which mark part of his metamorphosis into Pablo Picasso for TV series Genius

And Antonio Banderas ensured the celebrations were a family affair on Monday, as he was joined by his daughter Stella for the famous Holy Week. item.title: Love Island's Georgia Harrison shows off her envy-inducing figure in chic bardot bikini as she tops up her tan in Cape Verde
item.description: The 22-year-old displayed her impressively toned stomach and tiny waist in her chic off-shoulder swimwear as she took a phone call during a stroll on the beach.
item.content:encoded:
She is known for her killer body, having confidently showed it off during her stint in Majorca for ITV2 series Love Island.

And Georgia Harrison set pulses racing once again on Monday, as she stripped to another two-piece to top up her tan in Cape Verde. 

The 22-year-old displayed her impressively toned stomach and tiny waist in her chic off-shoulder swimwear as she took a phone call during a stroll on the beach. 

Bikini babe: Love Island's Georgia Harrison set pulses racing on Monday, as she stripped to a skimpy two-piece to top up her tan in Cape Verde

Catching up: The 22-year-old displayed her impressively toned stomach and tiny waist in her chic off-shoulder swimwear as she took a phone call during a stroll on the beach

The blonde certainly commanded attention as she hit the beach in her trendy bikini, which pulled into a bardot crop top and barely-there briefs.

The bralet, patterned with a monochrome zig zag print, pulled straight across the chest while the bottoms rose to high at her hip, to draw attention to her impossibly petite waist and rippling abs.

Only making the look saucier, the briefs then cut into a thong at her rear, to give a flash her peachy derriere to all as she relaxed in the sunshine. 

Chic: The blonde certainly commanded attention as she hit the beach in her trendy bikini, which pulled into a bardot crop top and barely-there briefs

Simply chic: The bralet, patterned with a monochrome zig zag print, pulled straight across the chest while the bottoms rose to high at her hip, to draw attention to her impossibly petite waist

Abs-olutely fabulous: Sporting nothing but the bikini, Georgia's rippling abs took centre stage as she basked in the sunshine

Despite her low-key day the beach, Georgia still styled her hair into loose, tousled waves and sported a contoured make-up look and pale pink lip, in a typically glamorous touch. 

Tying her look together with oversized, cat-eye shades, the reality star was every inch the beach babe as she paddled in the sea, while chatting to a friend on the phone. 

Georgia is no stranger to showing off her figure in a bikini, having risen to prominence on ITV2's Love Island in June. 

Life's peachy: Only making the look saucier, the briefs then cut into a thong at her rear, to give a flash her peachy derriere to all as she relaxed in the sunshine

Glam: Despite her low-key day the beach, Georgia still styled her hair into loose, tousled waves

Dolled up: She also marinated her usual Essex glamour with a contoured make-up look and pale pink lip, despite the blazing heat

The blonde caused chaos when she entered the villa by choosing to couple up with Kem Cetinay - who had just asked Amber Davies to be his girlfriend. 

Yet she soon became a favourite on the show after the drama died down thanks to her cheeky fling with Sam Gowland, who she split from in August. 

However in February, she candidly shed light on the darker side of the dating sphere as she recalled a harrowing abusive relationship she had at the tender age of 18.

Finishing touches: Tying her look together with oversized, cat-eye shades, the reality star was every inch the beach babe as she paddled in the sea

Relaxed: The star was seen cooling off in the water and running her hands through her hair, as well as chatting to a friend on the phone

Confidence is key: Georgia is no stranger to showing off her figure in a bikini, having risen to prominence on ITV2's Love Island in June

The reality beauty penned in a Women's Fitness article that she feared for her life every day as her now-ex spat in her face, taunted her and smashed up her phone. 

Reflecting on her past abusive relationship, Georgia wrote: 'I remember being in constant fear throughout the day of what would set him off.

'Would he take my phone again and lock me out so that he can obsessively scroll through it until he finds an innocent message from a friend and smashes it up for the 3rd time?

'Would he taunt me and criticise my appearance to the point where I can’t even look at myself? Would he take me to dinner and then spit in my face because I "looked at the waiter in a provocative way"? Each day was just a huge contrast of love and fear.' 

Back in the day: Georgia embarked on a fling with Sam Gowland (L) in the Majorca villa, but the pair broke up only two months later

item.title: 'They were all over each other': Olivia Attwood spotted on romantic spa weekend with ex Bradley Dack... one month after split from Chris Hughes
item.description: In photos obtained by The Sun , the 26-year-old is seen packing on the PDA with the footballer, 24, in the swimming pool of the Pennyhill Park Hotel and Spa.
item.content:encoded:
She split from Love Island beau Chris Hughes last month, amid claims she had been texting her exes.

And Olivia Attwood did little to quash the rumours on Saturday, as she was spotted cosying up to her former flame Bradley Dack during a romantic spa weekend. 

In photos obtained by The Sun, the 26-year-old is seen packing on the PDA with the footballer, 24, in the swimming pool of the Pennyhill Park Hotel and Spa - with sources claiming the pair were 'all over each other'. 

On again? Olivia Attwood was spotted cosying up to her former flame Bradley Dack during a romantic spa weekend on Saturday - just one month after her split from Chris Hughes

Olivia and Bradley appeared closer than ever at the luxurious Surrey spa, with one photo showing the pair cuddling on a sun lounger in their white robes. 

With the duo later pictured paddling and chatting in the outdoor plunge pool, a source claimed the pair were acting very much like a couple.

An insider told the paper: 'Olivia and Bradley were constantly touching each other, and cuddling and kissing. 

Hotting up: Olivia and the footballer (above) were pictured packing on the PDA at the Pennyhill Park Hotel and Spa - with sources claiming the pair were 'all over each other'

'They were all over each other in the pool – it looked to me like they're officially back together.

'They weren’t trying to hide either - they were with another couple and Olivia was taking selfies with Bradley the whole time.'

MailOnline has contacted Olivia's representatives for comment.  

Olivia is perhaps moving on with her footballer ex - just one month after she parted ways from Love Island beau Chris Hughes.

Happier times: Olivia is perhaps moving on with her footballer ex - just one month after she parted ways from Love Island beau Chris Hughes (pictured together in January) 

The pair endured a turbulent relationship both in and out of the Love Island villa, and eventually parted ways in February amid claims Olivia had been contacting her exes, including Bradley and former co-star Mike Thalassitis. 

However, Olivia retaliated by claiming Chris had 'publicly humiliated' her on numerous occasions, and accused him of 'monetising' their romance while she stood by him.  

Their tumultuous split has since aired on their reality spin-off show Crackin' On last week, which was cut short due to their endless rows.  

Not happy: Their tumultuous split has since aired on their reality spin-off show Crackin' On last week (above), which was cut short due to their endless rows

Flirty: Olivia and Bradley have been flirting on social media in recent weeks, and it was claimed her split from Chris was because she had been texting him and Mike Thalassitis

Last week, Bradley hinted he and Olivia were back together by referring to her as a 'fit blonde bird' on Twitter, during her appearance on Celebrity Ghost Hunt.

Olivia was also caught FaceTiming the footballer after a night out in November, and even reportedly sent flirty messages to Bradley late at night on social media - leaving Chris 'gutted' and 'embarrassed'. 

In August, one month after the Love Island final, the leggy blonde was spotted on a cosy night out with Bradley at Faces nightclub in Essex. 

However, Chris forgave Olivia days after the photos emerged, while Bradley temporarily deleted his Twitter page after suffering at the hands of trolls.  

Back in the day: Chris and Olivia met and fell in love on Love Island last June
item.dc:abstract: She split from Love Island beau Chris Hughes last month, amid claims she had been texting her exes. And Olivia Attwood did little to quash the rumours on Saturday, as she was spotted cosying up to her former flame Bradley Dack during a romantic spa weekend. In photos obtained by The Sun, the 26-year-old is seen packing on the PDA with the footballer, 24, in the swimming pool of the Pennyhill Park Hotel and Spa - with sources claiming the pair were 'all over each other'.

item.title: Will a Hollywood star stand in for Ant McPartlin on Saturday Night Takeaway final? As it's denied James Corden will join Declan Donnelly as co-host in Orlando
item.description: Hollywood stars are being lined up by ITV to stand in for embattled star Ant McPartlin during the finale of their flagship show Saturday Night Takeaway, it's been reported.
item.content:encoded:
Hollywood stars are  being lined up by ITV to stand in for embattled star Ant McPartlin during the finale of their flagship show Saturday Night Takeaway, it's been reported.

According to the Daily Star, a host of big names including Bruce Willis and Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson, are in talks to join Declan Donnelly for the Orlando-based finale on April 7.

Dec will present this week's edition of the show solo for the first time after his presenting partner entered a treatment centre for the second time for prescription drug and alcohol addiction following his arrest for drink driving a week ago. 

Finale: Hollywood stars are being lined up by ITV to stand in for embattled star Ant McPartlin during the finale of their flagship show Saturday Night Takeaway, it's been reported

While last weekend's episode of Saturday Night Takeaway was cancelled as crisis talks continued, the final two shows will go ahead, it was confirmed by ITV and Dec last week. 

While there were rumours US chat show king James Corden was in talks to join Dec on the show, Ant and Dec's representative has denied the claims he'll stand in for the Universal Studios Resort finale.

According to the Daily Star, ITV are also said to be recruiting Hollywood stars including Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson and Bruce Willis as an extra boost for the anticipated finale, which will also host lucky competition winners from the series.

'Dec has got a big job on his hands fronting a live show from the States all on his own,' a source told the paper.

Co-stars: 'Although Dec will have fellow show stars Scarlett Moffatt and Stephen Mulhern there to assist, the producers want to add some sparkle' a source has revealed

'Although he will have fellow show stars Scarlett Moffatt and Stephen Mulhern there to assist, the producers want to add some sparkle with some big Tinseltown names. We're confident everyone will jump on board as it's such a popular family show.' 

Last year's SNT final saw special guests including Christina Ricci, CeeLo Green and Ant and Dec's SMTV co-host Cat Deeley join the duo at Walt Disney World Resort in Florida.

A representative for ITV have been contacted by MailOnline for comment.

In a rollercoaster week for Dec, the star confirmed the happy news on Sunday that he is expecting his first child with wife Ali Astall.

Star power: The ITV show has a history of attracting big names, including Cuba Gooding Jr who took the role as announcer during the March 3 episode 

The host, 42, confirmed the news in a brief statement published on social media platform Instagram on Sunday evening.

Sharing a black and white image from his 2015 wedding to Ali, he wrote: 'Just wanted to say thank you for all the lovely messages.

'The news has sneaked out a little earlier than we had hoped but Ali and I are delighted to be expecting our first child. Thanks for all the love, we really appreciate it.' 

This comes after Ant - who split from wife Lisa Armstrong earlier this year after 11 years of marriage - was arrested for a drink drive incident over the weekend and has since made the quick decision to return to rehab earlier this week. 

Pal: It's been denied James Corden will step in as Ant's replacement for the Orlando-based finale on April 7

Dec confirmed he will present the final two Saturday Night Takeaway episodes solo in a Twitter statement last week, telling fans:

'Whilst I never thought I'd be in this position, after much discussion and careful consideration we've decided that the remaining two shows of this series of Saturday Night Takeaway will go ahead.

'We made a promise to take hundreds of deserving winners to Florida to watch the series finale, and we will honour that.

'Everyone at ITV and the Takeaway team feels we owe it to the audience to complete the series.'  

ITV were reportedly affected by the decision not to air last weekend's episode, with the broadcaster 'losing 3 million viewers' after the show was replaced by The Voice on Saturday evening. 

The singing competition only managed to receive 4.2 million views, compared to the favoured series' average of approximately 8 million. 

Solo: Dec confirmed he will present the final two Saturday Night Takeaway episodes solo in a Twitter statement last week
item.dc:abstract: Hollywood stars are being lined up by ITV to stand in for embattled star Ant McPartlin during the finale of their flagship show Saturday Night Takeaway, it's been reported. According to the Daily Star, a host of big names including Bruce Willis and Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson, are in talks to join Declan Donnelly for the Orlando-based finale on April 7.

item.title: Saying 'I do'... again! Married At First Sight fan favourites John Robertson, 54, and Melissa Walsh, 53, 'plan to wed in a legally-binding ceremony'
item.description: They've already walked down the aisle once on Married At First Sight.
item.content:encoded:
They've already walked down the aisle on Married At First Sight.

And John Robertson, 54, and Melissa Walsh, 53, are now planning to officially marry in a legally-binding ceremony.

John told Woman's Day that the blonde journalist is the 'woman of (his) dreams.'

Scroll down for video 

Saying 'I do'... again! Married At First Sight fan favourites John Robertson, 54, and Melissa Walsh, 53, 'plan to wed in a legally-binding ceremony' 

A source added: 'Marriage was never really on the cards for John and Mel again, but after the show they've really started to consider the idea.'

The couple, who have both been married before, also have a particular destination in mind for their wedding.

'Their dream place would be the Mornington Peninsula,' said the insider.

'Their dream place would be the Mornington Peninsula': The couple, who have both been married before, also have a particular destination in mind for their wedding

Sweet: John and Melissa got 'married' on Channel Nine's social experiment, but it was not a legally-binding ceremony

John and Melissa got 'married' on Channel Nine's social experiment, but it was not a legally-binding ceremony.

Earlier this month, it was rumoured that John and Melissa had quietly split.

'John can't fail twice, so production pretty much told Mel to just smile and nod and enjoy the ride,' a source allegedly told New Idea.    

'Totally false': Earlier this month, New Idea reported that John and Melissa had split - however, she denied the claims as 'totally false'

'They get on well, but they are very different people.' 

Melissa denied the claims, however, telling Daily Mail Australia that New Idea's story was 'totally false'.

As their Married At First Sight journey came to an end, the couple renewed their vows and said they were happy together.

Smitten: As their Married At First Sight journey came to an end, the couple renewed their vows and said they were happy together
item.dc:abstract: They've already walked down the aisle once on Married At First Sight. And now fan-favourite couple John Robertson, 54, and Melissa Walsh, 53, are planning to officially marry in real life. John told Woman's Day that the blonde journalist is the 'woman of my dreams.'
item.dc:creator: Chloe-Lee Longhetti
item.mi:shortTitle: MAFS' John and Mel are set to officially tie the knot

item.title: 'She needs to rest her voice': Kylie Minogue CANCELS all upcoming interviews in Australia after Karl Stefanovic was slammed for his bizarre chat with the pop icon
item.description: The Daily Telegraph reported on Tuesday that Kylie Minogue has pulled out of all promotional interviews during her trip home to Australia this week.
item.content:encoded:
Kylie Minogue has cancelled all interviews during her upcoming trip home to Australia.

The London-based pop sensation, 49, is set to arrive in the country this week to perform songs from her highly-anticipated new album, Golden.

But the songstress has opted out of all accompanying promotional interviews, citing illness as the cause for the last-minute cancellation.

Scroll down for video 

Cancelled: The Daily Telegraph reported on Tuesday that Kylie Minogue has pulled out of all promotional interviews during her trip home to Australia this week

On Thursday, Kylie is set to take the stage in Sydney for an invitation-only Nova Red Room concert.

A spokesperson told The Daily Telegraph on Tuesday: 'She (Kylie) has a throat infection and needs to rest her voice ahead of the performance'. 

The publication says 'all other commitments are believed to have been spiked until further notice'.

Awkward: The news comes less than 48 hours after journalist Karl Stefanovic was slammed for his interview with Kylie, which was broadcast on Sunday night's edition of 60 Minutes

The news comes less than 48 hours after journalist Karl Stefanovic was slammed for his interview with Kylie, which was broadcast on Sunday night's edition of 60 Minutes. 

Viewers branded the Channel Nine star's chat a 'trainwreck' and called for someone more 'professional' to take the helm.

During the chat Karl made Kylie visibly uncomfortable by describing her as 'hot 50-year-old' and asked if she could stop dating 'incredibly good-looking d**kheads'. 

Oh dear: Karl was slammed after he called a 'hot 50-year-old' and told her to stop dating 'd**kheads' in a bizarre interview

Viewers flocked to Twitter to blast the 'rubbish' interview and claimed Karl was using the chat to 'creep' on Kylie.

The Channel Nine personality concluded the interview by bringing out a birthday cake for Kylie and singing to her, in a nod to her 50th in May.

Coming up from behind her, the grinning host gestured at the camera crew and publicists to join in as he serenaded a squirming Kylie.

It's not believed that the poorly-received chat is related to the pop queen's decision to pull the pin on further interviews with Australian journalists.

Backlash: Viewers were less than impressed with Karl's onscreen antics, blasting the 'trainwreck' interview and calling for someone more 'professional' to take the helm

item.title: Tallulah Willis sets pulses racing with her toned figure as she sunbathes completely NAKED in sizzling Instagram snap
item.description: The 24-year-old certainly caught the attention of her followers by posing posed completely naked - with nothing but her arms and legs concealing her modesty - as she relaxed in the garden.
item.content:encoded:
She is known for showing off her impressive figure in an array of swimwear to her 184,000 followers. 

But Tallulah Willis went one step further on Monday, as she stripped herself of all clothing for another sizzling snap on Instagram.

The 24-year-old certainly caught the attention of her followers by posing posed completely naked - with nothing but her arms and legs concealing her modesty - as she relaxed with a pet pooch in the garden.

In the nude: Tallulah Willis posed completely naked for her Instagram followers on Monday

The star was the picture of confidence as she posed - with only her arm covering her bare chest, to show off her enviably toned figure to all. 

While she ensured to achieve an all-over tan by going naked in the sunshine, the brunette did protect herself from the heat in a beige cap and oversized sunglasses, tipped sexily to the edge of her nose. 

Posing on a sun lounger beside her dog in the garden, Tallulah shared the snap without a caption, to let her figure and bold display do the talking.  

Girls' getaway: Tallulah appeared to be chilling at home in the snap - following a sun-soaked getaway to Turks & Caicos with her sister Scout

Tallulah appeared to be chilling at home in the photo - following a sun-soaked getaway to Turks & Caicos with her sister Scout.

The daughter of Hollywood actors Bruce Willis and Demi Moore looked sensational in a pastel blue bikini as she showcased her rippling abs in another Instagram snap. 

The model worked her best angles for the camera as her tanned skin glowed against the idyllic location. 

Girls just want to have sun! The model, 24, looked to be having the time of her life as she soaked up the sun in a sizzling pink swimsuit on Sunday

Tallulah shielded her eyes from the dazzling sunlight in a pair of classic wide-brimmed shades as she tied back her orange-tinged locks up into a messy bun. 

Going fresh-faced for the beach day, the starlet left her quirky accessories at home and opted for just one shimmering ring.

Older sister Scout, 26, got in on the swimsuit action as she slipped into a hot pink two-piece.   

Leaving very little to the imagination, the Idaho-born beauty hitched up her racy bikini bottoms high on her waist to give the best view of her eye-popping derriere and washboard abs.

Scout's dark chestnut tresses fell past her shoulders in a tousled straight style as the artist posed up a storm for the tantalizing pic.   

Famous offspring: Tallulah is the youngest daughter of Demi Moore [pictured] and her ex-husband Bruce Willis

'Pls pretend to b annoyed by these' Tallulah jokingly captioned as the pair worked their best model pose. 

Scout and Tallulah escaped to the exotic destination for a balmy getaway with friends last week and made sure to share their enviable getaway on social media. 

On Sunday, Talullah looked to be having the time of her life as she shared yet another sizzling swimwear snap on Sunday, taken as the model enjoyed a day topping up her tan in the sun-soaked location.

The natural beauty looked incredible once again in a plunging pink swimsuit as she basked in the rays of the sunlight.

Flashing a hint of sideboob, the fashionista looked the picture of confidence as she pulled a playful pose and clutched on a can of coke.

Letting her natural beauty shine through, Tallulah kept her skin free of make-up and allowed her quirky orange locks to fall around her face in easy waves.  

Proud mama: Hollywood actress Demi Moore, 55, has an incredibly close relationship with all three of her daughters

Tallulah captioned the snap: 'Thank god she finally got over her shyness,'which saw her pulling a rather flamboyant pose.

The star has previously spoken candidly about her path to sobriety and the merciless bullying she was subjected to as a teenager. 

'I had people when I was 13 telling me how ugly I was, and how could two beautiful actors create such hideous troll children?' she told Katie Couric in 2014 after her stint in rehab.  

'So many people are telling me, "You inspired me,"' she said. 'I guess I didn’t understand that this is such a communal fault line, that is running through every individual on this planet that whether it’s hidden or not hidden, that we all feel this certain sense of insecurity.' 

Last July, the model shared an honest message about how far she has come.

Honest: Tallulah has admitted battling addiction and an eating disorder in the past and shared a candid message alongside this picture last July

Posting an old picture of herself looking dangerously thin and with a cigarette hanging from her mouth, she wrote: '3 years ago I was a malnourished string bean with aches that echoed throughout my soul. 

'However the internal cries to tend my most blistered and deep wounds repeatedly fell on deaf ears. I did not value myself, my life or my body and as such I was constantly punishing for not being enough. 

She continued: 'Self annihilation fueled with medicating left me a shell, and the world on mute. I was hoisted from my hole, (one so deep I was certain we were nearing the Earths magma core) on the backs of powerful human beings that I will forever be indebted too, and on that day my life was gifted back to me. 

'I love the girl in this picture, I cry for her and I mourn her lost years. She is inside of me always and I must never let her slip too far.

'I don't push any agenda, I can only speak for my path and staying sober has been far and beyond the most important thing I've done in my wee 23 years.' 

 Tight knit: Tallulah (L)  Demi Moore and Scout LaRue (R) remain tight knit along with other sister Rumer

item.title: 'Mommy and Daddy': Khloe Kardashian shares yet another naked bump photo with Tristan Thompson... only this time he's cradling her tummy
item.description: In this snap, the beauty is having her large baby bump - she is due in early April - held by her beau Tristan Thompson of the Cleveland Cavaliers as they stand in a kitchen.
item.content:encoded:
Khloe Kardashian has been sharing several sexy images from a pregnancy photo shoot done by her friend Sasha Samsonova.

And on Monday the 33-year-old uploaded a brand-new image to her Instagram account.

In this snap, the beauty is having her large baby bump - she is due in early April - held by her beau Tristan Thompson of the Cleveland Cavaliers as they stand in a kitchen with beautiful Spanish tiles.

Sharing even more: Khloe Kardashian posted this naked bump photo with beau Tristan Thompson on Monday that was taken by her friend Sasha Samsonova

The image looks like their pregnancy announcement photo

Khloe captioned the  eye-popping photo, 'Mommy and daddy.'

Like in previous photos from the same set, Khloe has on a black lace bra and matching undies and has put her very large bump on full display.

The TV sensation looked stunning with her long blonde locks worn down in Malibu waves and her makeup done to perfection.

In her first bump shot from the set, she flashed a leg as she wore a long black coat off her shoulders.

Stunning: The 33-year-old siren shared a very glamorous baby bump shot to Instagram on Wednesday

The Revenge Body star was outside on a patio with plants everywhere.

And in the second shot she was in bed with Tristan placing a hand on her thigh. 

This new post comes just days after the looker took to Snapchat to discuss food. The siren revealed what she's been feeding that bump.

The Good American designer gave fans a look at the fried chicken and biscuits she was digging into to fulfill her cravings. 'Popeyes Louisiana Chicken, I love you,' the star wrote over the image. 'Thank you.'

Two cute: The Revenge Body star was seen with beau Thompson in bed in this image shared on Thursday

She had a large box of 24 large biscuits and a box of friend chicken placed on her dining room table.

Her hand was also seen going into a bag that contained condiments.

'I am starving! I sort of want Popeyes,' she tweeted the night before. 'I’m not sure though LOL the struggle is real.'

But then she gave in. 'Ok that fulfilled every craving I’ve been having for Popeyes over the past couple days,' the star tweeted.

'Letting the food craving build up is actually better. I’m so satisfied now. Yum yum! I feel guilty but GREAT.'

No a salad: Khloe gave her health food a break to dig into friend chicken and biscuits on Thursday

 'Popeyes Louisiana Chicken, I love you,' the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star wrote over the image. 'Thank you'

Khloe is due very soon so it's no wonder she's letting herself enjoy her pregnancy to the fullest before she welcomes the child.

No doubt the looker will have to be on a diet as soon as her little girl is welcomed into the world due to the pressure that comes with being a representative of the Kardashian empire. 

Last week Khloe wrote about her pregnancy on her pay site Khloewithak.com. 

'Being pregnant has always been a dream of mine. Even though 9 months feels like a lifetime while I'm awaiting the arrival of my baby girl, it's really a blink in the grand scheme of life,' she began.

'I know I'm going to miss my belly so much once she's here, I had to capture the beautiful process that is pregnancy so I can always look back at this time. Thank you Sasha Samsonova for this special photo shoot! Also, shout-out to my glam team who helped me look and feel like a goddess: Hrush, Andrew and Jill.'  

Busy mama: Last week the LA native launched her Good Mama maternity line, which is an offshoot of Good American

The daughter of Kris Jenner - who has said she has not yet found a name for her baby girl - has been very active during her pregnancy.

She has not only launched her Good Mama maternity line, which is an offshoot of Good American, but she has also kept up with her social media posts.   

In mid March, Khloe's sisters and mother were all in attendance at her extravagant Los Angeles baby shower, which was held back-to-back with Tristan's birthday party.

item.title: Amber Turner shows ex Dan Edgar what he's missing in sizzling bikini snaps from Dubai getaway... following showdown with new girl and love rival Clelia Theodorou on TOWIE
item.description: The 24-year-old showed off her enviable figure in an array of skimpy swimwear as she relaxed at a swanky beach club and enjoyed a boat ride during her sun-soaked trip in Dubai.
item.content:encoded:
She was seen confronting new girl Clelia Theodorou on Sunday night's TOWIE, after discovering Dan Edgar had been dating them at the same time. 

And Amber Turner certainly showed the lothario what he was missing on Monday, as shared a number of sizzling bikini snaps from her holiday in Dubai. 

The 24-year-old showed off her enviable figure in an array of skimpy swimwear as she relaxed at a swanky beach club and enjoyed a boat ride during her sun-soaked trip.

Bikini babe: Amber Turner showed her ex Dan Edgar what he was missing on Monday, as shared a number of sizzling bikini snaps from her holiday in Dubai

The blonde first displayed her enviably slim and toned figure in a skimpy blue two-piece, as she posed with her feet in the pool at Nikki Beach.

With the swimwear rising high at her waist and pulling into a gold body chain across her stomach, Amber let her impressive physique take centre stage as she sultrily looked over her shoulder in the snap.

Not stopping there, the reality star then slipped into an equally saucy white bikini as she posed at the wheel of a yacht for another snap. 

Here she is: She first posed sultrily at Nikki Beach Dubai, before she slipped into an equally saucy white bikini to pose at the wheel of a yacht

The TOWIE beauty gave a glimpse of her womanly curves in the swimwear, which plunged into a deep V neckline at the chest to tease at her cleavage.

Styling her hair into loose waves and sporting a heavy, contoured make-up look despite Dubai's thirty degree heat, Amber looked as glamorous as ever as she posed for the snap, captioned: 'Just Call Me Captain!' 

Amber's sizzling snaps followed TOWIE's return on Sunday, which saw her become embroiled in a showdown with new girl Clelia Theodorou - who is dating her ex Dan Edgar. 

Not happy: Amber's sizzling snaps followed TOWIE's return on Sunday, which saw her become embroiled in a showdown with new girl Clelia Theodorou (R)

Drama: Amber discovered Dan Edgar (above) had been dating the girls at the same time, and immediately called Clelia to let her know before the cast trip to Barcelona

However, Amber discovered the hunk had been two-timing them both, and immediately informed his new squeeze.

After confronting Dan during a workout, Clelia rang Amber to settling the matter, stating: 'I spoke to him and he told me he did see you a couple of days ago and that he did lie to you about the fact that he has been seeing me.

'And he did tell me that you guys did sleep with each other a month ago which was obviously when I've been seeing him.'

Furious: Amber said: 'The other day we spoke for two hours and he said there's only been three girls that have ever affected him, his first girlfriend, his ex and me'

Opposite: Only making matters worse, Clelia replied: 'What he said to me was completely different, he said you guys had been on and off and that he didn't want to be with you'

Not happy, Amber replied: 'When I was with him a few days ago, he did lie and denied numerous times over the past few months that anything's gone on with you. He's denied it, denied it and said 'I've not even kissed her'.

'The other day we spoke for two hours and he said there's only been three girls that have ever affected him, his first girlfriend, his ex and me.'

Only making matters worse however, Clelia then revealed: 'What he said to me was completely different, he said you guys had been on and off for a while and that he didn't want to be with you.' 

Girl power: Amber branded Dan a coward, while the newbie declared she was not going to 'wait around' for him to decide what he wants

Amber branded Dan a coward, while the newbie declared she was not going to 'wait around' for him to decide what he wants. 

Despite parting ways with the TOWIE lothario, Amber recently admitted she still had feelings for Dan during a recent interview on This Morning.

Speaking ahead of the new series' debut, she said: 'It's been over a year with us but I'm not going to say there aren't feelings there, but I can't do it anymore.'  

Struggling: Despite parting ways with the TOWIE lothario, Amber recently admitted she still had feelings for Dan during a recent interview on This Morning

Tension between the pair became so heated that she even threw a drink in his face while filming the ITVBe show in Barcelona earlier this year.  

When asked about an alleged row between them at popular Essex haunt Sugar Hute, she said: 'I was having a conversation with one of the new girls and he came into the conversation and it just didn't go down well. 

'Things have just got so toxic between us and I'm just so done with the situation,' before joking: 'A cup fell out of my hand and it may have had liquid in it.

'You think a lot of it is played for dramatics but everything I've talked about is real life.' 

At war: Speaking of her ex (pictured together in September), she said: 'Things have just got so toxic between us and I'm just so done with the situation'
item.dc:abstract: She was seen confronting new girl Clelia Theodorou on Sunday night's TOWIE, after discovering Dan Edgar had been dating them at the same time. And Amber Turner certainly showed the lothario what he was missing on Monday, as shared a number of sizzling bikini snaps from her holiday in Dubai. The 24-year-old showed off her enviable figure in an array of skimpy swimwear as she relaxed at a swanky beach club and even enjoyed a boat ride during her sun-soaked trip.
item.dc:creator: Julia Pritchard

item.title: Age-defying Melanie Sykes, 47, exhibits her gym-honed physique in VERY skimpy lingerie for sizzling photoshoot
item.description: Melanie Sykes, 47, showcased her assets and toned stomach in the dream-coloured two-piece for a sizzling photoshoot.
item.content:encoded:
Her love life has been in the spotlight as of late, thanks to reported flings with singer Olly Murs and golfer, Martin Kaymer.

But Melanie Sykes diverted attention back to her envy-inducing physique as she sizzled for a lingerie-clad photoshoot. 

 The 47-year-old presenter looked far younger than her years as she showcased her assets and toned stomach in the dream-coloured two-piece. 

Smokin' hot: Melanie Sykes, 47, showcased her assets and toned stomach in the dream-coloured two-piece for a sizzling photoshoot

Primped and preened to perfection, with a coat of glamorous make-up and a glossy blowdry, Melanie oozed body confidence as she posed for the snap.

Snuggled up against a plethora of pillows on a bed, the gym bunny showcased the fruits of her labour in the plunging balcony bra and matching suspender style briefs. 

A pair of nude-coloured stocking and red nail varnish added to the pin-up feel as she flashed a huge smile.     

Fitness fanatic: The presenter diverted has honed her envy-inducing physique at the gym 

Meanwhile, sources recently told MailOnline the presenter has been enjoying a long-term romance with German golfer Martin Kaymer, 33 - and they're said to have been going to great lengths to keep things under wraps.

This comes after Olly Murs confirmed that he had enjoyed a brief fling with Mel after months of relentless speculation.

However, while the pair have made no mention of each other on their social media accounts, for more than three years they've popped up at the same places at the same time, jetting off to a variety of sun-kissed locations around the globe. 

Just last month, when Martin competed in the Abu Dhabi HSBC Championship, former Let's Do Lunch presenter Melanie teased her Instagram followers with a plethora of shots of herself lounging on the Emirates' golden shores.

Just pals: Olly Murs recently confirmed that he had enjoyed a brief fling with Mel after months of relentless speculation

And that's just one of many travel coincidences that have occurred as far as back as at least January 2015, when Martin participated in the Omega Dubai Desert Classic - at the same time that the Lancashire lass just so happened to be holidaying there.

And in June of that year, Martin and Melanie uploaded snaps a day apart as they basked in the sunshine on the Balearic island of Mallorca. While Martin shared a shot of his luxury hotel accommodation, Mel opted to pose with a female pal.

Their coincidental travels also took them to Florida, from which mother-of-two Melanie revealed that she was enjoying a 'cheeky little stop off' as she showed off her sensational physique in a white bikini under sheer patterned sundress.

When contacted by MailOnline, a representative for Melanie declined to comment. 

Sources recently told MailOnline: The presenter has been enjoying a long-term romance with German golfer Martin Kaymer, 33 - and they're said to have been going to great lengths to keep things under wraps

item.title: My 'hot mom' makeover! Blonde bombshell Kylie Jenner shares sultry snap while she focuses on 'getting her body back'
item.description: It seems that the 20-year-old is ready for a change after giving birth to her first child last month. The make-up mogul debuted brand-new bombshell blonde locks in a sexy Instagram on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
It seems that Kylie Jenner is ready for a change after giving birth to her first child last month.

The make-up mogul shared a seductive Instagram Monday - likely a throwback - where she also flaunted her voluptuous chest wearing just a robe.

The starlet reminisced about her blonde look at the same time it's said she's hard at work getting back her pre-pregnancy figure with an insider revealing she: 'wants to be a really hot young mom and is making sure that happens' toPeople Monday.

Heating things up! Kylie Jenner showed off a blonde look on Instagram Monday, as it's said the star is focused on getting back her old body, with a friend telling People she 'wants to be a really hot young mom and is making sure that happens'

Though the makeup mogul is already working on her body transformation, she appeared just as alluring as ever in her provocative bedroom Instagram.

In the photo the starlet let a hotel robe slip off her shoulders seductively to reveal her full chest.

She continued to tease in her caption, writing: 'I think i was meant to be blonde.'

Though Kylie's continued sex appeal is undeniable, insiders say that the beauty is 'already starting to work out,' and is 'focusing on getting her body back and also getting back to a comfortable weight aside from caring for Stormi.'

Woah mama! Though it's been less than two months since Kylie Jenner gave birth, the star (above while expecting) is 'focusing on getting her body back and also getting back to a comfortable weight aside from caring for Stormi'

Swim fan! Reminiscing about her pre-baby figure, the 20-year-old posted a flashback snap of herself in a very revealing bikini Monday on Instagram

They said the fans can look forward to the beauty 'flaunting her progress more and more' as time goes on.

The insider also admitted that the star: 'wasn't the most comfortable while pregnant.'

Even though the make-up mogul's worried about her body, there's been no shortage of sexy photos from the star since her daughter's birth February 1.

Reminiscing about her pre-baby figure, the California native posted a flashback snap of herself in a very revealing bikini Monday on Instagram.

Snapping back! Kylie Jenner is having no trouble getting back to her smoking pre-pregnancy figure, as evident by a Saturday Snapchat post

Kylie captioned the black and white image: 'summer goals #tb'. 

The day before Kylie showed off her fitness progress on Snapchat as she hiked up her sweatshirt to reveal enviably flat abs and a hint of her full bust covered in a grey sports bra. 

At the same time she's hard at working trimming down her body, the starlet is also making sure she and daughter Stormi are living in fine style.

The starlet gave Snapchat a peek inside her newly decorated living room on Monday, showing off her stylish take on interior designer.

No baby proofing here! New mom Kylie Jenner opens doors to her opulent living room featuring signed Basquiat print, $25k side table and roaring open fire

Watch out Stormi! The reality star will have to be careful to ensure her baby stays safe once she starts crawling

While the room was far from child-friendly - featuring a sharp-edged glass coffee table and an unprotected open roaring fire - it was certainly impressive.

Above the fireplace hung a signed Basquiat print of his artwork Hollywood Africans In front Of The Chinese Theater With Footprints Of Movie Stars.

Similar prints from the limited edition 1983 run of 60 are currently on sale for between $50,000 to $75,000.

To the side of the fire under a round mirror stands a gold occasional table dripping with metallic bulges

Proud mom: The makeup mogul gave birth to her firstborn, Stormi Webster, with rapper beau Travis Scott nearly two months ago 

This piece is the Melting Brass Hallway Table by Zhipeng Tan, which retails for $25,000.

The reality star has been extremely busy after giving birth to her firstborn, daughter Stormi Webster, nearly two months ago. 

On Tuesday, the 20-year-old relished some alone time with her rapper beau Travis Scott, as the pair grabbed an early morning juice in West Hollywood together. 

The couple have been dating for around 11 months, after first being romantically linked in April 2017, following a sighting at Coachella.

Proud parents: Kylie and Stormi's dad Travis Scott have been dating for around 11 months, after first being romantically linked in April 2017, following a sighting at Coachella

item.title: 'We argue all the time': Millie Bobby Brown admits there's tension with her Stranger Things co-stars following claims her team negotiated pay rise separately in top secret deal
item.description: The 14-year-old actress said they were initially all 'really nice' to one another, but now they are now like 'siblings' and constantly bicker over small things.
item.content:encoded:
Breakout star:Millie Bobby Brown at PaleyFest in LA on Sunday

Millie Bobby Brown admits the 'honeymoon stage' is over between the Stranger Things cast.

The 14-year-old actress quickly forged a close relationship with her young co-stars when they began filming the Netflix drama, and though they were initially all 'really nice' to one another, they are now like 'siblings' and constantly bicker over small things.

Speaking during a panel chat at PaleyFest on Sunday, her co-star Caleb McLaughlin, 16, said: 'Once we first met each other I think we were all very outgoing. So it was just easy to connect. It wasn't actually hard.'

Millie added: 'It was like a relationship actually, because it felt like we went through a honeymoon stage.

'We would be, like, really nice to each other. We didn't want to do anything that would hurt each other's feelings.

'Now it's so different. We are actually siblings. We argue all the time.'

But Millie admitted the arguments are over trivial matters such as 'Why are you eating my chips?'

Caleb added: 'It's little remote control arguments.'

But one person who stays out of the squabbles is Sadie Sink, who only joined the cast for the second season.

Co-stars: Gaten Matarazzo, Millie Bobby Brown, Sadie Sink, Finn Wolfhard and Caleb McLaughlin in November 

Millie admitted: 'Sadie doesn't argue though! She's like, 'Guys, everybody calm down.''

The cast will be returning to work in the next few weeks but stayed tight-lipped on what will happen in the next season of the supernatural drama.

Director Shawn Levy said: 'I'll get in so much trouble. I can't say much. But we are going back to work next month and we're super excited.'

Millie shaved her head for her role as Eleven on the show and she recently admitted it was the most 'empowering' thing she'd ever done.

She said: 'The day I shaved my head was the most empowering moment of my whole life. The last strand of hair cut off was the moment my whole face was on show and I couldn't hide behind my hair like I used to. As I looked in the mirror I realised I had one job to do. Inspire ... Shaving your head is so empowering. You don't need hair to be beautiful. You are beautiful with or without. I learnt that too x (sic)'

It recently emerged that Millie Bobby Brown's team inked a top secret payrise that was negotiated separately to her fellow young co-stars.

Hit show: The Stranger Things stars have all negotiated pay rises, but Millie's deal has been kept top secret 

Gaten Matarazzo (Dustin Henderson), Finn Wolfhard (Mike Wheeler), Caleb McLaughlin (Lucas Sinclair) and Noah Schnapp (Will Byers) are all said to be in line for around $250,000 per episode. 

Some sources have suggested Millie may be making nearer to the $350,000 fee Winona Ryder (Joyce Byers) and David Harbour (Jim Hopper) are said to be on.

According to insiders, the deals closed last week with season three production scheduled to begin on April 23.

Speaking during a panel chat at PaleyFest on Sunday, her co-star Caleb McLaughlin, 16, said: 'Once we first met each other I think we were all very outgoing. So it was just easy to connect. It wasn't actually hard.'

item.mi:shortTitle: Millie Bobby Brown admits there's tension with Stranger Things cast

item.title: 'We'll see how many he wants!' Kate Hudson reveals she'd love to have a baby girl as she talks family plans with beau Danny Fujikawa
item.description: Kate Hudson, 38, has insisted she 'isn't done yet' when it comes to children, gushing she'd love to have a baby girl one day.
item.content:encoded:
She's a doting mum to two boys, Ryder, 14, and Bing, six.

But Kate Hudson, 38, has insisted she 'isn't done yet' when it comes to children, gushing she'd love to have a baby girl one day.

Talking to The Times the Almost Famous actress said it's ultimately down to her boyfriend Danny Fujikawa if and when she expands her brood.

Family plans: Kate Hudson, 38, has insisted she 'isn't done yet' when it comes to children, gushing she'd love to have a baby girl one day

The actress is already a proud mum to Ryder, with ex-husband Chris Robinson, and Bingham, with former fiance Matt Bellamy of the band Muse. 

'I'd like to [have more children]! I'm not done yet. A girl would be fun,' she gushes in the new interview, quickly adding though: 'We'll see. We'll see how many Danny wants.'

The How To Lose a Guy in 10 Day' actress was 24 when she had her first child and admits that makes her feel different to her friends as they're only just starting their families now, though she has no regrets.

Besotted: Talking to The Times the Almost Famous actress said it's ultimately down to her boyfriend Danny Fujikawa if and when she expands her brood

Mum of two: The actress is already a proud mum to Ryder, with ex-husband Chris Robinson, and Bingham, with former fiance Matt Bellamy of the band Muse

She explained: 'I've only ever been a mom! I never had an adult life without kids. My friends had their whole twenties -- they're all just getting pregnant now. But everything I've experienced has been great, albeit not conventional, including my childhood.'

With her own acting background and her sons' fathers being musicians, Kate, who is the daughter of Hollywood icon Goldie Hawn, is not surprised that both her sons seem destined to be performers when they grow up.

She said: 'Oh, yeah! I definitely believe it's in the DNA. It's just what you know, it's in your gut and you just pursue it.

With her boys: The actress was 24 when she had her first child and admits that makes her feel different to her friends as they're only just starting their families now

'[Ryder is] a great mimic. I wouldn't be surprised -- I'd be a little concerned, but in a good way -- if he went into stand-up. And Bing is abnormally musical. He's been drumming since he was a year and a half.'

Though her work sometimes keeps her apart from her children, the 'Fool's Gold' actress is thankful technology keeps them in touch - though it isn't always convenient.

She said: 'It's funny with FaceTime now -- you're always still with your kids all day, even when you're travelling. Last night I kept getting calls about homework. I was, like, 'Honey, I'm trying to get to sleep!' '

 Serious: Kate and Danny recently celebrated their one-year anniversary, and rumours had even began to circulate that they had got engaged following the romantic occasion

Kate and Danny recently celebrated their one-year anniversary, and rumours had even began to circulate that they had got engaged following the romantic occasion. 

Last year, on December 3, Kate marked the couple's anniversary with a gushing note on Instagram describing how they first met when she was 23 and pregnant. 

The Almost Famous star began: 'The first time I met Danny I was 23 and enormously pregnant with Ryder. His step sisters are my best friends @sarafoster @erinfoster and so it goes we have been in the same circle for over a decade!'

She added: 'A year ago today Danny took me on a hike and what I thought was just a hike with a family friend turned very quickly into an unexpected first date.

'No moves were made on this first date. In fact, it took months for him to make a first move! And as a kiss on this bridge would have been nice, the kiss a year later was so much sweeter.'

Hudson then remarked: 'So on our 15th year of knowing each other we were able to open our hearts to each other to feel so much pure love and it’s been truly incredible.! ❤️Happy first date anniversary baby. #LoveThisMan #WhatAYear.' 

Slow burner: Last year, on December 3, Kate marked the couple's anniversary with a gushing note on Instagram describing how they first met when she was 23 and pregnant
item.dc:abstract: Kate Hudson, 38, has insisted she 'isn't done yet' when it comes to children, gushing she'd love to have a baby girl one day. Talking to The Times, the Almost Famous actress said it's ultimately down to her boyfriend Danny Fujikawa if and when she expands her brood. The actress is already a proud mum to Ryder, with ex-husband Chris Robinson, and Bingham, with former fiance Matt Bellamy of the band Muse.

item.title: Ant McPartlin's estranged wife Lisa Armstrong shows her support for Declan Donnelly and Ali Astall's baby news as she 'likes' their announcement on Twitter
item.description: Ant McPartlin's estranged wife Lisa Armstrong has shown her support for Declan Donnelly's announcement he is expecting his first child.
item.content:encoded:
Ant McPartlin's estranged wife Lisa Armstrong has shown her support for Declan Donnelly's announcement he is expecting his first child.

Lisa, who split from Dec's presenting partner earlier this year, 'liked' the star's Twitter post on Sunday evening which confirmed he is expecting a baby with wife Ali Astall.

Among the 130,000 likes on the post was Lisa's, which comes after her estranged husband entered a treatment facility for drink and prescription drugs for a second time following his arrest for drink driving a week ago.  

Still friends: Ant McPartlin's estranged wife Lisa Armstrong has shown her support for Declan Donnelly's announcement he is expecting his first child

Last year both Ant and Dec confessed in an interview that they were hoping to start families, but while Lisa and Ant announced they were divorcing earlier this year, Dec and Ali confirmed their happy news on Sunday.   

The presenter, 42, confirmed the news in a brief statement published on social media platform Instagram on Sunday evening. 

Sharing a black and white image from his 2015 wedding to Ali, 40, he wrote: 'Just wanted to say thank you for all the lovely messages. 

So happy: Declan Donnelly confirmed  that he is expecting his first child with wife Ali Astall in a post shared with Instagram followers on Sunday evening 

Happier times: Last year both Ant and Dec (pictured with their wives in 2015) confessed in an interview that they were hoping to start families

'The news has sneaked out a little earlier than we had hoped but Ali and I are delighted to be expecting our first child. Thanks for all the love, we really appreciate it.' 

Earlier that day Declan was seen out and about in London, hours after it was reported that Ali is pregnant. 

The TV star was seen returning to his home, dressed casually in jeans and a baseball cap during what has been the most turbulent weeks of his career. 

Reports of their growing family comes hot on the heels of Dec preparing to host Saturday Night Takeaway solo next weekend, in light of presenting partner Ant McPartlin heading to rehab following his recent drink-drive arrest. 

Exciting news: Earlier that day Declan was seen out and about in London, hours after it was reported that Ali is pregnant 

What a week: The TV star was seen returning to his West London home, dressed casually in jeans and a baseball cap during what has been the most turbulent weeks of his career

Rollercoaster few days: Dec, 42 , failed to raise a smile on Sunday as he headed to the house he shares with Ali

Just hours before The Sun reported that the couple, who wed in 2015, are 'delighted to be expecting - especially since they have been trying for some time.'

It is alleged that the couple first learnt they were pregnant soon after Dec left the Australian jungle after the last series of I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Oh Here! finished in December. 

'They have been keeping the pregnancy a closely guarded secret, but now that Ali is safely over 12 weeks, they are starting to let people know,' it is claimed of the happy news, with the source quickly adding that they have told 'key people at ITV'.

Ali has reportedly told her close colleagues and will be stepping away from work commitments to 'look after herself' and to enjoy an 'easy' pregnancy.

'They have both always wanted a family but worried that it might not happen for them.'

A representative for Dec and Ali refused to comment on the claims when approached by MailOnline.

'They are delighted': Dec Donnelly, 42, and his wife Ali Astall are reportedly expecting their first child 

Growing family: According to The Sun, the pair, who wed in 2015, are 'delighted to be expecting - especially since they have been trying for some time'

Woes: Reports of their growing family comes hot on the heels of Dec preparing to host Saturday Night Takeaway himself, in light of Ant McPartlin heading to rehab following his recent drink-drive arrest

It has also been inevitable to ignore the fact that his happy news comes hot on the heels of his best friend Ant's woes. 

'This has come at a difficult time for them both, given everything that Ant is now going through and the pressure that has put on Dec in the past week,' it was said, before adding that 'their priority now is their baby and an experience that they see as the best of their lives.' 

Dec and Ali - who has acted as the presenting duo's manager for over a decade - married in Elswick, Tyne and Wear in August 2015 after two years of dating.

Happy news: It is alleged that the couple first learnt they were pregnant soon after the last series of I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Oh Here! finished in December

It is claimed of their delight: 'They have been keeping the pregnancy a closely guarded secret, but now that Ali is safely over 12 weeks, they are starting to let people know'

In an interview with Fabulous magazine in February last year, Ant and Dec both said that the focus in their lives has always been on their families as they bared all about marriage and hopefully having children in the near future.

Ant - who had previously spoken about his struggles with having children and of course has since split from his wife - revealed he would be 'over the moon' to become a dad, while Dec echoed similar wishes.

Dec said: 'Absolutely at some point, when the time is right! We’ll have to put some time in the diary. Things are pretty busy!' 

In April of last year, while recording the finale of the 2017 season of Saturday Night Takeaway at Walt Disney World in Florida, both men admitted that being there made them feel a little ‘broody’.

Mum to be: Ali has reportedly told her close colleagues and will be stepping away from work commitments to 'look after herself' and to enjoy an 'easy' pregnancy

As reported in OK!, Dec said: ‘It is almost like a prescription – everyone should come and spend a couple of days in Disney once in their life. Would we come back with a little Ant and Dec? Oh, definitely! 

'We saw it on the show, what it means for young ones to come out here. It would be one of those things to do with children, definitely.’ 

This comes after Ant - who split from wife Lisa Armstrong earlier this year after 11 years of marriage - was arrested for a drink drive incident over the weekend and has since made the quick decision to return to rehab earlier this week. 

One onlooker, Jake Spencer, said the Britain's Got Talent star was argumentative towards cops when they tried to put him in a police car after he failed a breath test.

A source added: 'They have both always wanted a family but worried that it might not happen for them'

Love: Dec and Ali - who has acted as the presenting duo's manager for over a decade - married in Elswick, Tyne and Wear in August 2015 after two years of dating

'This has come at a difficult time for them both': It has also been inevitable to ignore the fact that his happy news comes hot on the heels of his best friend Ant's woes

He told The Sun newspaper: 'Ant looked in a right state and was acting argumentatively toward a policewoman. I couldn't believe it when I saw who it was.

'The woman was trying to arrest him and get him in the police car but he clearly wasn't having it. He was not making it easy for her and he seemed to be trying to wriggle out of her clutches. He was not in a good way.

'Eventually she got him in the police car. There were about six or seven police cars in total.'

Candid: In an interview last year, Ant and Dec both said that the focus in their lives has always been on their families and hopefully having children in the near future

'It's tougher than you think': Ant has previously spoken about his struggles with having children

Marital breakdown: Ant split from his wife of 11 years, Lisa Armstrong, earlier this year 

It is thought Ant veered into the wrong lane after coming round a sharp bend, hitting a green Mini before crashing into a BMW X5. A three-year-old girl was taken to hospital to be checked over as a precautionary measure. 

In 2013, Ant also discussed he and his estranged make-up artist wife were finding it difficult to conceive.

At the time he confessed to Radio Times: 'Lisa and I would love to have kids. We’re trying. It’s tougher than you think when you get a bit older.'

Explaining the issue in terms of his friendship with Dec, Ant revealed: 'There’s a rumour that we do everything together and I’m holding off having kids till Dec finds himself Mrs Right. I love that idea, but I’m afraid it’s not true.' 

Troubles: This comes after Ant was arrested for a drink drive incident over the weekend and has since made the quick decision to return to rehab earlier this week
item.dc:abstract: Ant McPartlin's estranged wife Lisa Armstrong has shown her support for Declan Donnelly's announcement he is expecting his first child. Lisa, who split from Dec's presenting partner earlier this year, 'liked' the star's Twitter post on Sunday evening which confirmed he is expecting a baby with wife Ali Astall.

item.title: Beach baby! Heavily pregnant Eva Longoria accentuates her bump in a white dress while filming in Miami
item.description: The 43-year-old is currently producing ABC's Grand Hotel in Miami.
item.content:encoded:
Her baby is due to arrive sometime in May.

On Monday, Eva Longoria, 43, accentuated her large baby bump in a white dress that she layered with collared shirt. 

The mom-to-be is currently producing ABC's Grand Hotel in Miami. 

Scroll down for video 

Bumping around! On Monday, Eva Longoria , 43, accentuated her large baby bump in a white dress that she layered with collared shirt

Hard at work! The mom-to-be is currently producing ABC's Grand Hotel in Miami

This is Eva's first child, but her husband Jose Baston's fourth.

He shares daughter Natalia, 22, and 14-year-old twins Mariana and Jose with ex-wife Natalia Esperón. 

The Mexican-American talked briefly about her pregnancy with Access on the Golden Globes red carpet.

'I'm feeling great,' she said as she held her belly protectively. 

The Mexican-American talked briefly about her pregnancy with Access on the Golden Globes red carpet. 'I'm feeling great,' she said as she held her belly protectively

Growing family! This is Eva's first child but her husband Jose Baston's fourth

Fun in the sun! Shoe-less on the beach, Longoria was spotted having a laugh with one of her actors. Despite being seven-months pregnant, Eva is still hard at work in the director's chair

Shoe-less on the beach, Longoria was spotted having a laugh with one of her actors.

The Texas native was spotted wearing a baseball cap adorned with the shape of her home state and hanging from her collar were a pair of aviators.

Despite being seven-months pregnant, Eva is still hard at work in the director's chair. 

She has been working on shows including Blackish and The Mick as of late. 

Represent! The Texas native was spotted wearing a baseball cap adorned with the shape of her home state and hanging from her collar were a pair of aviators

New gig: Grand Hotel is set to air during pilot season. The soap-opera-esque show will follow the staff of a family-run Miami Beach hotel. It is loosely based on the Spanish series Gran Hotel

On Sunday, Eva spent a relaxing day in South Beach. 

She met up with friend and model Lili Estefan for a hearty brunch at Yardbird Southern Table. 

The two chowed down on chicken and waffles, cornbread, and a spread of desserts. 

Girl time! On Sunday, Eva spent a relaxing day in South Beach. She met up with  friend and model Lili Estefan for a hearty brunch at Yardbird Southern Table where they chowed down on chicken and waffles and cornbread
item.dc:abstract: Her baby is due to arrive sometime in May. On Monday, Eva Longoria, 43, accentuated her large baby bump in a white dress that she layered with collared shirt. The mom-to-be is currently producing ABC's Grand Hotel in Miami.

item.title: TOWIE: 'You're a spoilt brat': James Lock aims vicious foul-mouthed tirade at girlfriend Yazmin Oukhellou... as co-star Gemma Collins and fans SLAM his 'disgusting' behaviour
item.description: The 31-year-old TOWIE veteran became agitated after he was confronted for his disrespectful behaviour by his other half's pals Chloe Lewis and Chloe Meadows.
item.content:encoded:
The Only Way Is Essex returned to TV screens on Sunday night and there was more drama than ever before.

The ITVBe favourite proved to be more explosive than ever before after James 'Lockie' Lock launched into a foul-mouthed tirade aimed at his girlfriend Yazmin Oukhellou while in Barcelona.

The 31-year-old TOWIE veteran became agitated after he was confronted for his disrespectful behaviour by his other half's pals Chloe Lewis and Chloe Meadows following a recent dinner they had all attended.

R|ant: James 'Lockie' Lock launched into a foul-mouthed tirade aimed at his girlfriend Yazmin Oukhellou while in Barcelona on Sunday night's TOWIE

Although the girls were sticking up for their pal and attempting to calmly resolve the issue, James quickly became enraged and left Yazmin in tears as he repeatedly called her a 'spoilt brat'. 

Taking a nasty turn, he shouted: 'Let me tell you something. Okay, you’re gonna start doing that. Throwing that card. Listen Yaz, do not f***ing sit there and make me look like a d**k. 

'Don't sit here playing the victim because you are a spoilt, f***ing brat. Alright? You're a spoilt, little f***ing brat. Do not sit here and f***ing play the victim. Don’t start f***ing crying.I'm a f***ing nice boy...'

In the midst of his rage, Yazmin pleaded with him to stop: 'I don't care if you do it at home but this is embarrassing'.

Disrespectful: Although the girls were sticking up for their pal and attempting to calmly resolve the issue, James quickly became enraged and left Yazmin in tears as he repeatedly called her a 'spoilt brat' 

Confronted: The 31-year-old TOWIE veteran became agitated after he was confronted for his disrespectful behaviour by his other half's pals Chloe Lewis and Chloe Meadows following a recent dinner they had all attended

Nasty: Taking a nasty turn, he shouted: 'Let me tell you something. Okay, you’re gonna start doing that. Throwing that card. Listen Yaz, do not f***ing sit there and make me look like a d**k'

But James refused to stop and tensions continued to rise as he reduced Chloe L to tears after he insinuated she went on a night out without telling her boyfriend Danny Flasher.

The brunette fired back: 'I'm very much in love and my partner does not speak to me the way you do.' To which Lockie replied: 'Yeah, go and have a cry. Bore off...'

Shocked by his behaviour, Chloe L made her way back inside the venue screaming: 'Gentleman? You're not a gentleman! You might want to look it up in the dictionary.'

Not holding back: He added: 'Don't sit here playing the victim because you are a spoilt, f***ing brat. Alright? You're a spoilt, little f***ing brat. Do not sit here and f***ing play the victim. Don’t start f***ing crying.I'm a f***ing nice boy...'

'Embarrassing': In the midst of his rage, Yazmin pleaded with him to stop: 'I don't care if you do it at home but this is embarrassing'

Claims: But James refused to stop and tensions continued to rise as he reduced Chloe L to tears after he insinuated she went on a night out without telling her boyfriend Danny Flasher

Firing back: The brunette fired back: 'I'm very much in love and my partner does not speak to me the way you do'

Tension: As tensions slowly started to simmer down, Yazmin said through her tears: 'It's embarrassing that they think you treat me like shit'

As tensions slowly started to simmer down, Yazmin said through her tears: 'It's embarrassing that they think you treat me like shit.'

Which left James angry adding: 'Me and you have a really toxic relationship. You try and wind me up, Yaz.'

Following expletive scene, viewers took to social media in their droves as they slammed the TOWIE star for his appalling behaviour while his co-star Gemma Collins and Celebs Go Dating expert Nadia Essex admitted they were outraged by his appearance.  

TOWIE's Gemma Collins tweeted: 'What totally disgusting behaviour! Not for me!'

Outrage: Following expletive scene, viewers took to social media in their droves as they slammed the TOWIE star for his appalling behaviour while his co-star Gemma Collins and Celebs Go Dating expert Nadia Essex admitted they were outraged by his appearance

While Nadia shared: 'If my boyfriend spoke to me like Lockie just spoke to Yaz in or out of public...needless to say he would no longer be my boyfriend' alongside a hand-waving emoji. 

A viewer wrote: '@JamesLock__ wouldn't know the meaning of the word "Gentleman" if someone smacked him round the face with a dictionary!! Vile human.'

'Sorry but shouting at your bird for crying is a joke, then going on to call her a brat. Gentleman my a**,' another posted. 'The way Lockie talks to Yaz is acc disgusting man. Ngl , it now makes sense why Danielle broke up with him'.

Anger: Which left James angry adding: 'Me and you have a really toxic relationship. You try and wind me up, Yaz'

The ITVBe favourite proved to be explosive than ever before after James 'Lockie' Lock launched into a foul-mouthed tirade aimed at his girlfriend Yazmin Oukhellou while in Barcelona.
