item.title: Who bit Beyonce's face? Online frenzy follows Tiffany Haddish's shock revelation... as Chrissy Teigen tweets 'You'd NEVER guess who it is!'
item.description: While Girl's Trip star Tiffany deliberately didn't name the woman, the Bey Hive immediately began debating her identity.
item.content:encoded:
Twitter has been sent into meltdown by Tiffany Haddish's revelation that a mystery actress bit Beyonce's face at a party.

The Girl's Trip star told the April edition of GQ that the incident happened in December, at a private afterparty following Jay Z's  performance at The Forum in Los Angeles.

And while Girl's Trip star Tiffany deliberately didn't name the woman who bit Beyonce, the Bey Hive immediately began debating her identity.

Chrissy Teigen was one of the first, tweeting: 'I cannot leave this planet without knowing who bit Beyonce in the face.'

Who bit Beyonce's face? Online frenzy follows Tiffany Haddish's shock revelation... as Chrissy Teigen tweets 'You'd NEVER guess who it is!'

She then followed this up with: 'I can only think of one person who would do this. but I cannot say. but she....is the worst.'

However after finding out who the actress with vampire-like tendencies actually was, Chrissy expressed her shock.

'My initial guess was wrong. The real person? I *never* would have guessed. I’VE SAID TOO MUCH.'

But while Chrissy wasn't able to name the alleged biter, Twitter wasn't so reticent, with fans all jumping to name actresses they thought could be to blame.

Warning! Tiffany was previously called out by Beyonce in new song Top Off after the comedian spilled party drama; the two are seen in a selfie that night

The debate was started when Tiffany opened up to GQ about the memorable December party, saying the actress appeared high on drugs.

Tiffany explained: 'There was this actress there that's just, like, doing the mostest. She bit Beyonce in the face.'

As might be imagined, Beyonce wasn't happy about this. 

Continued Tiffany: 'So Beyonce stormed away, went up to Jay-Z, and was like, "Jay! Come here! This b****..." and snatched him. They went to the back of the room. I was like, "What just happened?" And Beyoncé's friend walked up and was like, "Can you believe this b**** just bit Beyonce?"'

Tiffany says that the mystery actress then crossed her path - telling her to stop dancing.

In DJ Khaled's new song Top Off, Queen Bey seemed to address her interaction with Haddish when she rapped, 'If they’re tryna party with the queen, they gon' have to sign a non-disclosure'; she is pictured with Jay Z at the bash

Tiffany then approached Beyonce, who she had met for the first time that evening.

The irrepressible 38-year-old said she told her: 'I'm going to beat somebody ass at your party. I just want to let you know that.'

Beyonce told her not to, and said of the actress: 'That b**** is on drugs. She not even drunk. The b**** is on drugs. She not like that all the time. Just chill.'

The interview updates Tiffany's previous description of meeting the superstar, in which she went into less detail.

In it Tiffany said she had witnessed the singer act possessively when the unidentified actress placed her hand on Jay Z's chest. 

In response on DJ Khaled's recent song Top Off, Queen Bey called out Tiffany, saying her name and rapping, 'If they’re tryna party with the queen, they gon' have to sign a non-disclosure.' 

But the Girls Trip star doesn't seem to be too worried that she has burned the friendship bridge with her idol. 

'Everything she said rang so real to me,' she said in a tweet after the song was released. 'Just know I will sign an NDA any day for Beyoncé. But also know this I will fight for Beyoncé. I love that woman she is a gift from God,'

Opening up: Tiffany's interview appears in the new edition of GQ, out now
item.dc:abstract: Tiffany Haddish's revelation that an actress bit Beyonce's face at a party has sent Twitter into meltdown. And while Girl's Trip star Tiffany deliberately didn't name the woman, the Bey Hive immediately began debating her identity. Chrissy Teigen was one of the first, tweeting: 'I cannot leave this planet without knowing who bit Beyonce in the face.'
item.dc:creator: Lizzie Smith
item.mi:shortTitle: Chrissy Teigen leads online frenzy to find out who bit Beyonce

item.title: Winnie Harlow flaunts her incredible figure in two tiny bikinis as she poses up a storm for sizzling sunset shoot on Dubai beach
item.description: She has been a catwalk queen for four years, since her London Fashion Week debut in 2014.
item.content:encoded:
She has been a catwalk queen for four years, since her London Fashion Week debut in 2014.

And Winnie Harlow took her skills to the beach over the weekend as she posed in skimpy swimwear in the stunning surroundings of Dubai.

The Brit model - real name Chantelle Brown-Young - flaunted her incredible figure in monochrome bikinis for an Instagram shoot.

Beach life: Winnie Harlow took her catwalk skills to the beach over the weekend as she posed in skimpy swimwear in the stunning surroundings of Dubai

Winnie slipped into a sporty Tommy Hilfiger two piece for some shots, proudly displaying her long legs and taut stomach.

With her hair left loose and in curls and natural makeup, her athletic figure took the spotlight.

Walking through the surf as the sun set, Winnie also teased a look at her pert posterior in the thong-cut of her bikini bottoms as she gazed out to sea.

Check out the view! The Brit model - real name Chantelle Brown-Young - flaunted her incredible figure in monochrome bikinis for an Instagram shoot

For her other Insta shots, the top model, who has a skin condition called vitiligo, changed into an even skimpier white halterneck bikini. 

She also posed in front of the famous Burj Al Arab hotel for some shots, adding a tight white t-shirt over her bikini, knotted at the waist.

Before the beach Winnie headed to an animal sanctuary for some more shots, tenderly bottle feeding a tiger cub and deer and posing with the giraffes, alongside the caption: 'real life Disney princess'.

Stunning: The top model, who has a skin condition called vitiligo, changed into an even skimpier white halterneck bikini

What a location! She also posed in front of the famous Burj Al Arab hotel for some frames, adding a tiny white crop top over her bikini

Despite beaming in some of the beautiful photos, she chose to caption the photos with a series of cryptic messages relating to heartbreak and the search for love.

One caption included the lyrics to Brandy's song Have You Ever, with Winnie writing: 'Have you finally found the one you’ve given your heart to Only to to find that one won’t give their heart to you Have you ever closed your eyes and dreamed that they were there And all you can do is wait For the day when they will care.' 

Winnie has previously been linked to Formula 1 ace Lewis Hamilton, enjoying a sizzling summer with the fellow Brit last year. 

Strike a pose: Winnie was in a world of her own as she posed for the stunning images

Feeling blue? The top model chose to caption the photos with a series of cryptic messages relating to heartbreak and the search for love

Leggy: The Brit beauty flaunted her incredibly long legs in the gorgeous images

The model has made waves since she made her catwalk debut in September 2014 during London Fashion Week.

The catwalk queen recently gave fans a glimmer into her non-stop party girl lifestyle in an interview with Harper's Bazaar.

Sharing her best skincare tips while on the road, she told the publication: 'I like to unwind at the end of a long day with music and a massage, always. As for bed time, there's no normal time.'

Moving location! Winnie also shared some photos from an animal sanctuary earlier in the day as she tenderly bottle fed a tiger cub

Photobomb: Winnie dressed in a tiny black crop top and chic head scarf for the shots

Winnie first secured fame on the 21st season of America's Next Top Model before she carved out a successful career for herself.

She has since appeared in a number of high-profile music videos, including Eminem's Guts Over Fear and Beyoncé's Lemonade.

The 5ft 9in stunner was diagnosed with vitiligo around the age of four, which made her among one per cent of the population who has the condition. 

In her element: As she cosied up to the wildlife, the animal lover captioned this photo: 'real life Disney princess'

And Winnie Harlow took her skills to the beach over the weekend as she posed in skimpy swimwear in the stunning surroundings of Dubai. item.title: 'This is it': Joanna Krupa flashes her massive diamond ring on coffee run before sharing cute snap with new fiance Douglas Nunes
item.description: Joanna Krupa is ready for the whole world to know she's taken. The wedding news comes just eight months after splitting from her ex-husband Romain Zago, 45.
item.content:encoded:
Joanna Krupa is ready for the whole world to know she's taken.

The 38-year-old model flashed her massive diamond ring while out for coffee in Tampa on Monday. 

Krupa announced her engagement to boyfriend Douglas Nunes just a day ago.

Peace and love! Joanna Krupa is ready for the whole world to know she's taken. The 38-year-old model flashed her massive diamond ring while out for coffee in Tampa on Monday

Going to the chapel! Krupa announced her engagement to Douglas Nunes just a day ago

Later the same day Joanna posted a cute snap of the couple on Instagram, the first following her engagement news.

'This is it,' she captioned the photo of her kissing Nunes.

The silver-haired fox is the COO of 451 Media Group, but very little else is known about him.

The wedding news comes just eight months after her split from her ex-husband Romain Zago, 45.

If fans weren't already reeling over her speedy engagement, they certainly are now after Joanna posted a curious photo of her bloated belly on Instagram leading some to believe she also has baby news. 

'OMG someone ate too much,' she captioned the image. 

Her happy engagement news was revealed on Sunday when Joanna posted a snap of herself wearing the sparkler on her wedding finger while holding hands with Nunes.

On Monday afternoon, Joanna posted the first photo with her fiance on Instagram. 'This is it,' she said as she kissed on Nunes who keeps his social media accounts private 

Model status: Krupa stepped out in a pair of skin-tight jeans, black booties, and a tank top 

She captioned the image: 'Just another weekend in the Krupa-Nunes household.' 

Confirming the news to MailOnline, a spokesperson said: 'Yes they are engaged - that's all for now.' 

Last October, Joanna hinted that she was single when she spoke to US Weekly and admitted she was focusing on her work.

She said at the time: ‘Honestly, right now I’m trying to focus on work. I just feel like men in Hollywood are looking for a trophy wife.

Baby news? If fans weren't already reeling over her speedy engagement, they certainly are now after Joanna posted a curious photo of her bloated belly on Instagram

Moving on: The wedding news comes just eight months after splitting from her ex-husband Romain Zago, 45 

'It’s really hard to get to know somebody. If prince charming comes along, great, but I just feel like it’s really tough in LA.’ 

Just following her divorce from Romain, the Poland native decided to freeze her eggs. 

'You never know what life will bring,' she told Life & Style Magazine. 'What if that moment comes when you can’t have kids? Thank goodness I froze my eggs.' 

The playboy vet also told the magazine that ideally she'd like to have a boy and a girl. 

Just following her divorce from Romain, the Poland native decided to freeze her eggs. 'You never know what life will bring,' she told Life & Style Magazine . 'What if that moment comes when you can’t have kids?' She also admitted to wanting a boy and a girl...ideally

item.title: 'It was hard not to take the pain myself': Gaz Beadle's girlfriend Emma McVey details her heartbreak over newborn son Chester's 'poor health' after he was rushed to hospital
item.description: Gaz Beadle's girlfriend Emma McVey has described her heartbreak over her three-month-old son Chester's recent poor health in an Instagram snap.
item.content:encoded:
Gaz Beadle's girlfriend Emma McVey has described her heartbreak over her three-month-old son Chester's recent poor health in an Instagram snap.

The model, 25, admitted that there was 'nothing worse' than seeing her newborn 'so poorly' - with her even stating that she wish she 'could take the pain herself.'

The stunning brunette also went on to describe her turmoil after a slew of doctors failed to take her and Gaz seriously, due to them being 'first time parents', before they eventually found an 'amazing paediatrician who listened.' 

'Nothing worse': Gaz Beadle's girlfriend Emma McVey, 25, has described her heartbreak over her three-month-old son Chester's recent poor health in an Instagram snap

Taking to Twitter, Emma penned: ' 'There’s been nothing worse than to see Chester so poorly and in pain from every feed, to the point I cried for him. Everyone sees a brave front but it has been the worst and hardest time of my life to not be able to take the pain myself. 

'Thanks to all the emergency doctors who brushed us off with colic, because it’s normal that he eventually started refusing feeds? It’s normal we had to take shifts sitting up through the night as he could only sleep sat upright on us? 

'It’s normal that he ended up in a curled up position that he couldn’t get out of? Blaming the fact we are ‘first time parents’. After 4 emergency visits we finally found an amazing paediatrician who listened, who checked and helped us.'

Heartbreak: The model admitted that there was 'nothing worse' than seeing her newborn 'so poorly' - with her even stating that she wish she 'could take the pain herself'

'Thanks to all the doctors who brushed us off': The brunette also went onto describe her turmoil after doctors failed to take her and Gaz seriously, due to them being 'first time parents'

Emma continued the lengthy caption: 'Cries and a real struggles, I will say every parent deserves a medal. I definitely couldn’t of got through the past week without the amazing help from grandparents, friends and a fab daddy that Chester has.

'A tablet a day dissolved and given to by a shringe for his stomach acid, cows milk intolerance and a thicking agent added to every feed we have a happy Chester, not 100% but he’s definitely on his way! 

'Nothing makes me smile more than seeing this face and hearing him giggle. I will take the sleepless nights as long as you’re happy little man,' she concluded.     

This comes after Emma showcased her incredible post-baby body in a sizzling bikini-clad Instagram snap shared, taken just two months after she gave birth.

The brunette beauty flaunted her incredibly taut midriff and tiny waist in a smouldering pink, green and white string bikini, which drew the eye to her amazing 28 pound weightloss after giving birth.

Wow factor: This comes after Emma showcased her incredible post-baby body in a sizzling bikini-clad Instagram snap shared, taken just two months after she gave birth

Emma put her ample cleavage on display in a fuschia pink top, which was trimmed with green and ivory stripes.

The model exuded sex appeal as she leaned back on a sun lounger, revealing her endless, toned legs in all their glory and her skimpy bikini bottoms.

Her brunette tresses were styled in loose waves while she opted for a touch of smoky eye make-up and a peachy blusher for her radiant spa look.

Later that day,  her hunky beau Gaz also shared a sweet snap of the family with their baby boy, as he prepared to ring in his landmark 30th birthday as a new father.

Cute: Later that day, her hunky beau Gaz Beadle also shared a sweet snap of the family with their baby boy, as he prepared to ring in his landmark 30th birthday as a new father

In the cute photo, a smiling Gaz leans into a fresh-faced Emma, who is clad in a khaki-green onesie.

The beauty is cradling their beautiful baby boy, who looked adorable in a white and navy babygro. 

Alluding to the many night feeds ahead, a whimsical Gaz wrote; 'Night before my bday having a mad 1... pre milk about 11 still be smashing the milk about 3am Infact probs 7 aswell....'.       

Back in late January, just 10 days after giving birth, Emma announced she had lost the baby weight thanks to healthy meals and snacks.

Wow: Back in late January, just 10 days after giving birth, Emma announced she had lost the baby weight thanks to healthy meals and snacks

She penned in the caption: 'I’m back to my original weight and shape in 10 days! I swapped from my energy and maintenance shakes to the fat loss ones the past 7 days so a huge thank you to herbalife... 

'This is one of the main reasons me and @gazgshore have decided to team up with them (don’t want him having a dad bod).  

'I gained a total of 28lbs which was a good amount of weight for me and Chester who was 6lbs2. You all had so many questions about the shakes I posted and had throughout my pregnancy so I’ve decided to start sharing my journey with you alongside my healthy meals and snacks!'

Toned; She wowed in this saucy underwear snap in which she flashed her ample bust 

Romance: Gaz and Emma's love story goes back to August 2016 when sparks first started flying and they have been going strong ever since

Emotional Gaz detailed how he was fighting back the tears in a heartfelt interview with OK! magazine following the birth of their son.

He told the publication: 'I was fighting back tears as it was happening and I was thinking to myself, don’t cry! I was turning away as it was happening. It’s the weirdest thing. It’s mad.'  

Gaz and Emma's love story goes back to August 2016 when sparks first started flying and they have been going strong ever since. 

Smitten: The couple's first baby Chester Raymond arrived in January

The model, 25, admitted that there was 'nothing worse' than seeing her newborn 'so poorly' - with her even stating that she wish she 'could take the pain herself.' The stunning brunette also went on to describe her turmoil after a slew of doctors failed to take her and Gaz seriously, due to them being 'first time parents', before they eventually found an 'amazing paediatrician who listened.'

item.title: Beach baby! Pregnant Eva Longoria covers her growing bump in chic floral dress during seaside outing with husband Jose Baston
item.description: She's expecting her first baby in May. And Eva Longoria looked happy and healthy as she was spotted enjoying a day at the beach in Miami on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She's expecting her first baby in May.

And Eva Longoria looked happy and healthy as she was spotted enjoying a day at the beach in Miami on Monday.

The 43-year-old stunner covered her growing baby bump in a breezy chic floral dress as she wrapped her arms around husband Jose Baston.

Oh baby! Eva Longoria, 42, was spotted enjoying a day at the beach in Miami on Monday

Daring to impress, the Desperate Housewives star showcased her delicate decolletage in the flower print number that had a plunging neckline.

Her toned and tanned arms were on full display as the sleeveless gown covered her enviable figure in a complimentary manner.

She kept her trademark brunette tresses long and loose under an exquisite fedora that featured a black strap.

Adding to the springtime casual look, Eva rocked large gold hoop earrings and a pair of retro sunglasses.

Chic stunner: The stunner covered her growing baby bump in a breezy chic floral dress

Impressive: Daring to impress, the Desperate Housewives star showcased her delicate decolletage in the flower print number that had a plunging neckline

Toned up: Her toned and tanned arms were on full display as the sleeveless gown covered her enviable figure in a complimentary manner

Throwing caution to the wind, the natural stunner went virtually makeup free with just a dab of pale pink lip.

After enjoying the sandy shoreline, Eva wrapped her arms around Jose as they found a place to lounge together on the crowded beach.

The TV mogul revealed his trim athletic build as he took off his black shirt to relax next to his expecting wife. 

Hair story: She kept her trademark brunette tresses long and loose under an exquisite fedora that featured a black strap

Additions: Adding to the springtime casual look, Eva rocked large gold hoop earrings and a pair of retro sunglasses

Windy city: She grabbed her hat as the wind picked up

Throwing caution to the wind, the natural stunner went virtually makeup free with just a dab of pale pink lip

They left the popular tourist location arm in arm as he carried most of the beach accessories they had brought.

With her first baby on the way in a matter of weeks, Eva doesn't appear to be slowing down any time soon as she attended the filming of her new ABC soap Grand Hotel earlier in the day.

While the multi-talented actress is busy with her thriving career, Eva recently spilled to Entertainment Tonight she was so busy she sometimes forgot she was pregnant.

Loved up: After enjoying the sandy shoreline, Eva wrapped her arms around Jose Baston as they found a place to lounge together on the crowded beach

Quitting time: They left the popular tourist location arm in arm as he carried most of the beach accessories they had brought

Toes in sand: They both carried their flip flops in their hands

Leggy stud: Jose showcased his muscular calves as he walked the beach

'I have been working, so sometimes I wake up and I forget I am pregnant. Like this morning, I was like, "Oh my god, I am late!" and then I was like, "Why can't I get out of bed?" and I was like, "Helppp!" 

'And then I was like, "Oh yeah, this thing." ... [I said] we should go skiing next weekend and [Jose] said no. I didn't know why. 

'I was like, "Why can't we go? What is the problem?" And I was like, "Oh god, I forgot!"'

Eva and her media mogul husband confirmed her pregnancy in January after rumours began circling at the end of last year, when she posted a photo of her growing baby bump on her Instagram account.

The couple tied the knot in Mexico in May 2016. 

Take it off: The TV mogul revealed his trim athletic build as he took off his black shirt to relax next to his expecting wife

Treasure chest: Jose revealed his hirsute chest to gawking onlookers

Hats off! Eva took off her hat as she found shade underneath the umbrella

Phone check: Eva had to check in on her phone as she is a busy actress, director, and producer
item.dc:abstract: She's expecting her first baby in May. And Eva Longoria looked happy and healthy as she was spotted enjoying a day at the beach in Miami on Monday. The 43-year-old stunner covered her grwoing baby bump in a breezy chic floral dress as she wrapped her arms around husband Jose Baston.
item.dc:creator: Heather Waugh

Pregnant Eva Longoria puts her baby bump on display in a classic black T-shirt and leggings as she enjoys a brunch date in Miami

item.title: 'There are days I feel fat': Ashley Graham says women will always be self-conscious about their bodies... as she rocks out on Instagram
item.description: Ashley Graham is 'not convinced' there will ever be a time when women aren't self-conscious about their bodies.
item.content:encoded:
She posted an Instagram video of herself twerking on Monday.

But despite her incredible figure and obvious body confidence, Ashley Graham is 'not convinced' there will ever be a time when women aren't self-conscious about their bodies.

The 29-year-old model admits that she has days where she 'feels fat', and doesn't believe there will be a time when 'every woman' wakes up and 'feels like a million dollars'.

Scroll down for video 

Looking good: Ashley Graham posted an Instagram video of herself twerking on Monday

Working it: She captioned the video, which promoted her tie-in with Revlon, 'Revlon’s Kiss Plumping Lip Crème, Lemon Dance Challenge, Live Boldly'

Doubts: Despite her incredible figure and obvious body confidence, Ashley is 'not convinced' there will ever be a time when women aren't self-conscious about their bodies

She said: 'There are some days I feel fat. I'm not convinced there's going to be a moment where every woman in the world wakes up and feels like a million dollars. So, what I want to do is give women the tools that will help when those moments come up. Sometimes it can be as easy as telling yourself that you are beautiful.'

But the Sports Illustrated model refuses to 'let a little cellulite' hinder her happiness, and says she is largely inspired by the 'positive' outlook that her mother always has.

She added: 'My mom is the most positive person. She has always had a smile on her face no matter what came her way. After seeing that, I'm not going to let a little cellulite get in the way of my happiness!'

And Ashley is determined to help other women 'be happy and thrive' in their own skin, and has urged women everywhere to 'support each other'.

At her best: The Sports Illustrated model says she refuses to 'let a little cellulite' hinder her happiness, and says she is largely inspired by the 'positive' outlook that her mother always has

Speaking out: Ashley is determined to help other women 'be happy and thrive' in their own skin, and has urged women everywhere to 'support each other'

Message: She told the June/July issue of StyleWatch magazine: 'Support each other'

She told the June/July issue of StyleWatch magazine: 'Support each other. In the modelling industry, one woman is great, but in order to make a major change, you need a group of models supporting each other. At the end of the day, I just want to help other women be happy and thrive. And that's what I want for myself too.'

Meanwhile, Ashley previously admitted she was 'disgusted' by her curvaceous figure when she was a teenager.

Asked when she became accepting of her figure, Ashley explained: 'It would be so much easier to be like, 'This is the date, time, and experience I had,' but there really isn't one. It was more about experiences in my life of devaluing the fact that I was an average, normal girl living in the city.

Confident: The model is the face of Revlon; pictured at a party for the brand in January

'But being told, 'You're fat,' 'You're ugly' or 'You're just not good enough,' and trying to live in these model standards, that was my normal.

'I think I hit bottom around 18. I was disgusted with myself and told my mom I was coming home. And she told me, 'No, you're not, because you told me that this was what you wanted and I know you're supposed to do this. It doesn't matter what you think about your body, because your body is supposed to change somebody's life.'
item.dc:abstract: Ashley Graham is 'not convinced' there will ever be a time when women aren't self-conscious about their bodies. The 29-year-old model is known for speaking out about body positivity and flaunting her own stunning curves, but has admitted even she has days where she 'feels fat', and doesn't believe there will be a time when 'every woman' wakes up and 'feels like a million dollars'. She said: 'There are some days I feel fat. I'm not convinced there's going to be a moment where every woman in the world wakes up and feels like a million dollars. So, what I want to do is give women the tools that will help when those moments come up. Sometimes it can be as easy as telling yourself that you are beautiful.'
item.dc:creator: Lizzie Smith
item.mi:shortTitle: Ashley Graham rocks out on Instagram

item.title: Real Housewives Of Atlanta: Kenya Moore gets surprised by new husband Marc Daly who makes show debut
item.description: Marc Daly finally made an appearance on The Real Housewives Of Atlanta on Sunday night, but not all of the women were impressed.
item.content:encoded:
Kenya Moore's husband Marc Daly finally made an appearance on The Real Housewives Of Atlanta on Sunday night, but not all of the women were impressed.

Shereé Whitfield still wasn't convinced they were actually married, and was very disparaging about his nose piercing

'I haven't really seen a man with a nose ring since Tupac,' scoffed the 48-year-old, who has been 'dating' an incarcerated man.

Surprise appearance: Kenya Moore while hosting the premiere of her PSA was surprised by her new husband Marc Daly on Sunday's episode of The Real Housewives Of Atlanta

'Shereé slow your roll, my man has always been real, just like my hair, and so are his checks, can I say the same for your man?' smiled Kenya,  47, in a side confessional.

Marc, who owns a restaurant in Brooklyn, appeared as a surprise at the screening of Kenya's PSA about domestic violence.

Kenya had suffered in an abusive relationship when she was 16-years-old.

Previously she discussed why her husband couldn't be there on her big night.

Nose ring: Marc sported a small nose ring as he showed up to support his wife

Recent jewelry: The restaurant owner told Sheree Whitfield that he got the ring two years ago

Good one: Sheree said that she hasn't seen a man with a nose ring since the late rapper Tupac Shakur

'He's working and he was just like, ''I can't, but I send you my love'',' she explained to the suspicious RHOA women.

'He can't even get on a plane by himself. I need to book his ticket, I need to pick out his clothes,' Kenya told the ladies.

'Girl, that man has been flying without you his whole life,' Porsha Williams responded with a smirk.

Travel arrangements: Kenya earlier spoke how she makes the travel arrangements for Marc

Catching up: NeNe Leakes continued reaching out to Porsha Williams at the event

'He has, but guess what? He is married now, so guess who he likes to take care of him?' Kenya replied.

As Kenya was giving her speech Marc walked into the room.

'My knight in shining armor,' she beamed.

Shining armor: Marc after surprising Kenya stood to the side as she spoke

'I don't know if he's her real husband, but he's real,' said Shereé bitterly.

'I think he wanted to make a grand entrance and that he did,' said Kenya, a 46-year-old former beauty queen.

'He's kind of sexy, she has got a fine husband,' remarked Cynthia Bailey.

Fine husband: Cynthia Bailey approved of Kenya's husband mark

'I'm happy for Kenya that Marc is here,' said NeNe Leakes graciously.

Cynthia cried while watching her PSA as her mother discussed the violence she had experienced.

'I'm so proud of my mom for speaking up,' said the 51-year-old beauty.

Getting emotional: The PSA about domestic violence featured Cynthia's mother and her daughter cried while watching it

Powerful message: NeNe and Kenya also took part in the PSA

Earlier in the show Shereé was shown working on her 'château'.

She decided it must have a 'theater, sauna and a man cave/game room' for her jailed boyfriend Tyrone Gilliams.

'I am committed to you for life,' he told Shereé on the phone, while she fantasized about a 'destination wedding' whenever he gets out of prison.

Behind bars: Sheree talked to her incarcerated boyfriend Tyrone Gilliams who vowed that he was committed to her for life

'I don't know what the realistic release date is for Tyrone, but it better be this year,' she huffed.

Shereé later talked about her convict boyfriend with her 'very responsible' daughter Kaleigh.

'You're going to date a man from jail?' asked Kaleigh incredulously.

Candid conversation: The reality star later talked to her daughter Kaleigh about her jailed boyfriend

'Something's not right, there are a lot of fish in the sea and you go for the jailbait?' sighed the sensible teenager.

'He's a good guy,' Shereé assured her.

The show opened with Porsha, who was roller skating with her 'friend' Rickey Smiley.

Roller skating: Porsha opened the episode roller skating with Rickey Smiley

'I didn't even have time to get my nails done, I'm looking ratchet as hell,' she confessed before taking a tumble.

'Gotta make sure that a** is ok,' he said, while leaning over to kiss it.

'You've got to give it mouth-to-mouth,' she giggled.

Good times: Ricky and Porsha joked after she took a tumble

Rickey suggested going back to his apartment to 'practice' Porsha's dating skills, but she refused.

Cynthia met with Kenya to throw shade over Kim Zolciak-Biermann about 'roach gate'.

'You can take Kim and her family out of the trailer park, but you cannot take the trailer park out of Kim and her family,' announced Kenya.

Roach gate: Kenya continued to insult Kim Zolciak-Biermann after learning of 'roach gate'

Kandi Burruss told her husband Todd about her issues with NeNe, who had cried on social media after getting heckled during her comedy show.

'I feel like I am a part of her pain,' fretted Kandi.

'Why can't we forgive NeNe and let this blow over?' she asked.

Friendship fractured: Kandi Burruss talked to her husband Todd about her fractured relationship with NeNe

NeNe played pool with her 18-year-old son Brentt.

'You have to have a career, having a job sucks,' she told the teen, who wants to be a comedian.

'I am going to mentor him…and we are just going to leave Uber and Lyft alone,' said NeNe, who had fallen into controversy for making a joke about rapes in Uber cars.

Teenage son: Brentt, 18, told his mother NeNe that he was done with school after graduating from high school

Career plan: NeNe pledged to help Brentt with a career in comedy

Meanwhile, Cynthia talked to her 18-year-old daughter Noelle Robinson about her boyfriend Will Jones.

'I would totally love to meet him,' said Noelle.

The RHOA returns next week with the season 10 finale on Bravo.

Mother and daughter: Cynthia talked to her daughter Noelle about meeting her new boyfriend Will Jones

item.title: 'She'll visit during school holidays': Married At First Sight's Tracey Jewel is leaving her daughter Grace, 8, in Perth to start a new life with Sean Thomsen in Melbourne - as she insists 'it's NOT a rebound relationship'
item.description: Married At First Sight's Tracey Jewel, 35, reveals in Monday's New Idea, that she will move to Melbourne to be with new beau Sean Thomsen, 35, and states it's not a rebound relationship.
item.content:encoded:
She is moving to Melbourne to live with her new boyfriend Sean Thomsen.

And Married At First Sight's Tracey Jewel has revealed her eight-year-old daughter Grace will visit her 'on school holidays.'

In an interview with New Idea this week, the 35-year-old also insisted that her new relationship, following soon after her breakup with Dean Wells, 'isn't a rebound.'

New beginnings: MAFS' Tracey Jewel has revealed her eight-year-old daughter Grace will visit her 'on school holidays' after she moves from Perth to Melbourne to live with her boyfriend Sean Thomsen

'We are moving to Melbourne! When we move there, I want to focus on my writing and Sean's almost qualified as a personal trainer,' Tracey said on Monday.

Speaking about Grace, her child from a previous relationship, Tracey added: 'I'll travel to Perth regularly to see my daughter and she'll come here on school holidays.'

Tracey emphasised that her new romance 'isn't a rebound relationship'. Meanwhile, Sean described his girlfriend as 'the love of (his) life'.

New chapter: In an interview with New Idea, the 35-year-old also insisted her new relationship, following soon after her breakup with Dean Wells, 'isn't a rebound'

Despite Tracey revealing her daughter will not live with them full-time in Melbourne, she told Daily Mail Australia on Thursday that Grace and Sean have already bonded.

Tracey said that the pair get along 'like great mates' and enjoy playing board games.

She added: '(Grace) has been fine with this whole thing. I've been open and honest with her. It was my decision for her not to be filmed or part of it, but I certainly kept her in the loop about everything that's been happening.'

Motherhood: Speaking about Grace, her child from a previous relationship, Tracey added: 'I'll travel to Perth regularly to see my daughter and she'll come here on school holidays'

Tracey and Sean publicly debuted their romance last Tuesday, after she broke up with Dean during an emotional episode of Married At First Sight. 

Dean, 40, was previously caught up in a cheating scandal with another contestant on the show, Davina Rankin.

While Tracey initially decided to give Dean a second chance, she was unable to forgive him.

That was quick! Tracey and Sean publicly debuted their romance last Tuesday, after she broke up with Dean Wells (pictured) during an emotional episode of Married At First Sight 

Read more: The full story is featured in this week's New Idea magazine, on sale now

item.title: Top dog! Bradley Cooper dresses as a pooch as girlfriend Irina Shayk sports cat whiskers for daughter's animal themed first birthday party
item.description: Showing his playful side Bradley, 43, also wore a headband adorned with a mini balloon animal. The couple welcomed Lea De Seine on March 21 2017.
item.content:encoded:
They welcomed daughter Lea De Seine on March 21 2017.

And marking their little girl's first birthday on Saturday Bradley Cooper and Irina Shayk pulled out all the stops to celebrate with an animal-themed bash at their home in Los Angeles.

Getting in the spirit of things Bradley donned a furry dog costume while his rumored fiancee kept it low-key with cat whiskers painted on her face. 

Ruff life: Bradley Cooper dressed as a dog as he and Irina Shayk threw a first birthday party for their daughter Lea De Seine at their home in Los Angeles

Meow! The Russian model sported cat whiskers and a cat-print mini dress 

The 32-year-old Russian model flaunted her slender legs in a colorful cat-print mini dress and white sneakers and sipped on a drink while chatting with pals. 

Showing his playful side Bradley, 43, also wore a headband adorned with a mini balloon animal.

Guests joined in on the theme wearing face paint and tucked into frozen treats.

The couple have been dating since 2015 and Irina, who was born in Yemanzhelinsk, Russia, has been sporting a large emerald ring on her engagement ring for over a year.

Festive spirit: The 43-year-old actor added a headband with a balloon animal on it 

Exotic beauty: Irina shared a sultry selfie last week during an LA downpour

The duo are notoriously private and even kept their daughter's birth under wraps with news of the birth making headlines nearly a month after her arrival.

Prior to getting together, The Hangover actor was dating British model Suki Waterhouse and Irina was in a relationship with soccer star Cristiano Ronaldo. 

Meanwhile Irina sizzled in a sexy selfie last week wearing sheer white lingerie.

The busy mom is currently the face of Intimissimi's latest lingerie campaign. 

Private duo: The couple - who are rumored to be engaged - started dating in 2015 and welcomed daughter Lea De Seine on March 21. They are pictured on March 8 2016

item.title: Slimmed down Kevin Federline celebrates 40th birthday with wife Victoria Prince at strip club...after asking ex Britney Spears 'to increase child support payments'
item.description: Kevin Federline celebrated his 40th birthday with his current wife at a strip club. The new 40-year-old and Victoria Prince enjoyed bottle service at their VIP section of Crazy Horse 3 Gentlemen's Club.
item.content:encoded:
Kevin Federline celebrated his 40th birthday with his current wife at a strip club.

The new 40-year-old and Victoria Prince enjoyed bottle service at their VIP section of Crazy Horse III Gentlemen's Club in Las Vegas, TMZ reported.

K-Fed, a rapper most famous for his ruptured marriage to Britney Spears, looked to have slimmed down at the event which found him at work at his own birthday party, stepping up to serve as DJ.

All class: Kevin Federline celebrated his 40th birthday with his current wife at a strip club

That evening, his outfit had the measure of the occasion - a black hoodie that read: 'COOKIES' over casual grey trousers and a pair of white sneakers.

K-Fed, who in his heavier days was cheekily dubbed K-Fat, lounged at a table stacked with fake money that featured his smiling face. 

Kevin also posed between a couple of the club's performers - a pair of blondes slid into skimpy black lingerie and matching stilettos.

Swank: The new 40-year-old and Victoria Prince enjoyed bottle service at their VIP section of Crazy Horse III Gentlemen's Club in Las Vegas, TMZ reported

At the table: K-Fed, a rapper most famous for his ruptured marriage to Britney Spears, found himself at work at his own birthday party, stepping up to serve as DJ

Half the man he used to be! K-Fed pictured in 2009 carrying a bit more weight

He reportedly made a recent request that Britney increase the child support she gives him - which is already a whopping $20,000 a month.

The erstwhile couple share two sons - Sean, 12, and Jayden, 11 - and Kevin maintains that the boys' increasing age is making them more expensive to raise.

Jamie Spears, Britney's father and conservator, was dubious about the request and failed to get either Kevin or his lawyer to specify what precisely the rapper needed the extra money for, according to sources who gossiped to TMZ.

Photogenic: K-Fed, who in heavier days was cheekily dubbed K-Fat, lounged at a table stacked with fake money that featured his smiling face 

Nor, allegedly, did they even give an exact amount they felt Kevin should be paid a month as an increase from the $20,000. 

Kevin's lawyer did apparently make a point of noting Britney's increased income from such professional triumphs as her Las Vegas residency.

Sean and Jayden are Britney's only two children, but Kevin has a further four.

Mingling: Kevin also posed between a couple of the club's performers - a pair of blondes slid into skimpy black lingerie and matching stilettos

He and Victoria have two daughters - Peyton, three, and Jordan, six - and he has another two children by his ex-girlfriend Shar Jackson.

Kevin and Shar, who were together from 2001 until 2004, have a 15-year-old daughter called Kori and a 13-year-old son called Kaleb.

After a 55-hour Las Vegas marriage to her old pal Jason Allen Alexander in 2004, Britney got hitched to Kevin later that same year and divorced him in 2007.

Fundraising: He reportedly made a recent request that Britney increase the child support she gives him - which is already a whopping $20,000 a month

One night in 2008, amid her legal battle with Kevin over their sons, she refused to hand the children over to him despite the fact he'd won temporary custody.

Britney, whom police theorized was 'under the influence of an unknown substance' that evening, brought her sons into the en suite bathroom of her house's master bedroom and holed up in there with them.

The authorities were called to the hostage crisis and retrieved the pop icon on a gurney, whereupon she was briefly hospitalized and for a time lost visitation rights - though she now shares custody with Kevin.

Up they grow: The erstwhile couple share two sons - Sean, 12, and Jayden, 11 - and Kevin maintains that the boys' increasing age is making them more expensive to raise

item.title: Tom Hardy cuts a surly figure as he transforms into notorious gangster Al Capone in first photo from forthcoming biopic Fonzo
item.description: The actor unveiled the first look of him portraying the notorious Chicago gangster via Instagram on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
He has taken on the role as Al Capone in the biopic Fonzo. 

And Tom Hardy unveiled the first look of him portraying the notorious Chicago gangster via Instagram on Sunday.

The actor, 40, bore a striking resemblance to the American mobster in the snap, sporting a shaven head and deep-set scars. 

Surly: Tom Hardy unveiled the first look of him portraying the notorious Chicago gangster via Instagram on Sunday

In the moody shot, the hunk cut a surly figure as he sat in a cell in unkempt clothes with his inmate.

Holding Al Capone's signature white hat, his character looked anguished, which is no doubt in reference to the criminal's mind deteriorating during his 10-year imprisonment. 

He simply captioned the snap: 'Chasing Fonzo'.

Notorious: The actor, 40, bore a striking resemblance to the American mobster (pictured above in 1930), sporting a shaven head and deep-set scars

Once the most feared gangster in America, the Josh Trunk movie will follow Al Capone at the age of 47, as he battles dementia. 

According to production notes, the story will show how 'his past becomes present as harrowing memories of his violent and brutal origins melt into his waking life'.

The Dark Knight Rises star, who beefed up considerably to play Bane in the Batman film and MMA fight Tommy Conlon in Warrior, previously spoke about his fears for his health now he's 40.

For the project, Tom had to once again alter his appearance, however, he claimed it wouldn't be as drastic as his muscular roles.

Muscle man: The Dark Knight Rises star, who beefed up considerably to play MMA fight Tommy Conlon in Warrior, previously spoke about his fears for his health now he's 40

 The Taboo star previously told the Daily Beast: 'It's not the classic Al Capone that you necessarily envision with the silhouette. I don't want to give too much away about it, but there's definitely a transformation with that role. 

'I don't know if it's as drastic as Bane. I've probably damaged my body too much. I'm only little!

'If I keep putting on weight I'll collapse like a house of cards under too much pressure.'

 The star added that he has aches and pains in places that he shouldn't and admitted he now struggles lifting his children Louis, nine, and the two-year-old he shares with wife Charlotte Riley. 

Meanwhile, Tom has confirmed that he wants to be the next 007 - by refusing to talk about the part in fear it will get him blacklisted.

He claimed that in the industry speaking about the role could be a kiss of death and so chose his words carefully.

The star was happy to throw his support behind Inception director Christopher Nolan, however, who has revealed he would be keen take over the franchise.

Striking: For the project Fonzo, Tom had to once again alter his appearance, however, he claimed it wouldn't be as drastic as his muscular roles

item.title: 'Make it official!' Fans continue to speculate over Hailee Steinfeld's developing friendship with Niall Horan as she poses in One Direction star's tour T-shirt
item.description: The Pitch Perfect star, 21, sent her keen Twitter followers wild with relationship questions as she shared a typically stunning snap in Niall Horan's tour merchandise on Sunday evening.
item.content:encoded:
They recently sparked romance rumours after they put on a cosy display during a concert in Las Vegas just a few weeks ago.

And Hailee Steinfeld sent her keen Twitter followers wild as she shared a typically stunning snap in Niall Horan's tour merchandise on Sunday evening.  

The Pitch Perfect star, 21, gave the camera a smoldering gaze as she showcased her support for the One Director star, 24.

A blossoming romance? Hailee Steinfeld sent her keen Twitter followers wild with relationship questions as she shared a stunning snap in Niall Horan's tour merchandise on Sunday evening

The Love Myself hitmaker teamed the promotional tee with edgy ripped jeans, tied in with a pair of on-trend brogues.

As her brunette tresses cascaded down one side of her face, the Term Life actress gave a slight peek at her glamorous makeup, which included a smokey eye look.

Flooding Hailee's page with assumptions on her relationship with Niall, one fan wrote: 'I love a supportive girlfriend.'

Close pals: The Pitch Perfect star, 21, recently sparked romance rumours after she put on a cosy display with the former One Director star during a concert in Las Vegas last month

Another insisted that the stars should confirm their status: 'Make it official already!'

Gushing in admiration over Hailee's appearance, a follower wrote: 'Hailee in a Naill t-shirt? I've never seen a more perfect sight!' 

Focusing on their musical talents instead of their personal connection, one penned: 'Where's the collab we all want?' while another keen fan shared a hilarious meme of Ed Sheeran holding a dictionary definition of collaboration.  

'I love a supportive girlfriend': Eager fans flooded the actress' page with assumptions on their relationship

MailOnline has contacted Niall and Hailee's representatives for comment.

These tweets come after the pair enjoyed a lively Backstreet Boys gig last month.

The singers proved to be close as they attended the concert together - chatting and laughing together as they sipped on drinks in the VIP area. 

In video footage posted to Twitter, Hailee and Niall were seen singing and dancing to the band's big hits - I Want It That Way and Everybody - before they erupted into laughter when Niall was approached by a group of fans for selfies. 

The Slow Hands hitmaker had already set the rumour mill whirring in December last year, when he shared a sweet birthday tribute to the award-winning actress on Instagram.

Niall wrote: 'Happy birthday to the loveliest person on the planet and one of my best friends @haileesteinfeld. Have no idea what the hell is going on in this photo. Love ya hails.'

The Los Angeles native gave a glimpse of her relationship with Niall in an interview with Us Weekly: 'I feel so lucky that [my fans] care enough about me to know what I’m doing every second of every day, but I think that sometimes it’s hard for people in general to realise that there are boundaries to a person’s life and personal life.'

Sweet: The Slow Hands hitmaker had already set the rumour mill whirring in December last year, when he shared a birthday tribute to the award-winning actress on Instagram

Before adding: 'I do love that I have the opportunity to share with them what I’m comfortable with and they’re there to listen and support me.' 

She also admitted she has a 'guard up' when it comes to dating, in an interview with Marie Claire.

She said: 'I’m trying to protect myself and have a bit of a guard up, but I also want to fall in love and know why love hurts.'  

The Irish belter confirmed he was single back in October, when he last discussed his love life in public.

Appearing on KIIS FM Breakfast in Australia, he said: 'I'm a very single man. You know, I'm 24 and travelling the world and that's the way it is.'

'I'm trying to protect myself!' The award-winning star recently admitted she has a 'guard up' when it comes to dating, in an interview with Marie Claire
item.dc:abstract: They recently sparked romance rumours after they put on a cosy display during a concert in Las Vegas just a few weeks ago. And Hailee Steinfeld sent her keen Twitter followers wild as she shared a typically stunning snap in Niall Horan's tour merchandise on Sunday evening. The Pitch Perfect star, 21, gave the camera a smoldering gaze as she showcased her support for the One Director star.

item.title: Caroline Flack and Andrew Brady split: Love Island host DUMPS CBB star beau amid fresh cheating claims... days after introducing him to her family
item.description: Sources revealed: 'Caroline ended things with Andrew after realising that he hadn’t been entirely honest with her. She felt like she couldn’t trust him. Things started to unravel'
item.content:encoded:
Caroline Flack has split from her boyfriend Andrew Brady amid fresh claims he cheated on her a second time, three weeks after it was alleged he cheated during a nightclub appearance.

Insiders revealed she parted ways with the Celebrity Big Brother favourite just days after introducing him to her entire family at her father's 70th birthday, amid claims she discovered he was 'being dishonest with her'.

A source told MailOnline: 'First of all there was the first girl who came forward and then there was a second girl and while it wasn't proven but its broken down the trust. She's obviously very upset.'  

Tough times: Caroline Flack has reportedly split from her boyfriend Andrew Brady amid claims he cheated on her during a nightclub appearance

MailOnline has contacted Andrew's representatives for comment. Caroline's team declined to comment when approached. 

Meanwhile sources told The Sun: 'Caroline ended things with Andrew after realising that he hadn’t been entirely honest with her. She felt like she couldn’t trust him. Things started to unravel after the first cheating claim.' 

Undoubtedly red-faced over recent events, Caroline removed all traces of the reality star from her social media having littered her Instagram stories with posts of her dad's 70th birthday - where Andrew was buddying up with her family.  

Just hours after the couple went public with their blossoming romance earlier this month, it was claimed Andrew smooched a club-goer on a night out beforehand.  

Happy days: Sources revealed: 'Caroline ended things with Andrew after realising that he hadn’t been entirely honest with her. She felt like she couldn’t trust him. Things started to unravel after the first cheating claim'

The so-called other woman laid bare the details as she said Andrew had been 'extremely drunk' on the night and she added Caroline wasn't angry with her. 

'Yeah, we spoke, she wasn't angry with me at all,' she told The Sun of her alleged kiss with the star. 'I got up in the morning and left.' 

The teacher insisted she only stole a smooch from the Apprentice star and she did not sleep with him, despite spending the night together. 

Andrew hit back at claims he cheated on the star a day after confirming their relationship - following the claims that plagued the start of their romance.

Defiant: Following the release of the news, Andrew told MailOnline: 'I have never seen this woman in my life', despite claims his appearance in Chester ended in a kiss'

The Sun reported that The Apprentice contestant 'shared a passionate kiss' with a dance teacher he met in a Chester night club a fortnight ago while he was still involved with the TV personality.

Following the release of the news, Andrew told MailOnline: 'I have never seen this woman in my life', despite claims his appearance in Chester ended in a kiss. 

The timing is devastating, as Caroline introduced the star to her family over the weekend when he attended her dad's 70th birthday bash.   

Before the cheating claims, Caroline went Instagram official with the reality star, posting a cute photo and adding: 'Having tried to get rid of him for a while he’s kinda just sticking around now.'
item.dc:abstract: Caroline Flack has reportedly split from her boyfriend Andrew Brady amid claims he cheated on her during a nightclub appearance. Insiders tell The Sun she parted ways with the Celebrity Big Brother favourite after discovering he was 'being dishonest with her'. Sources revealed: 'Caroline ended things with Andrew after realising that he hadn’t been entirely honest with her. She felt like she couldn’t trust him. Things started to unravel after the first cheating claim.'
item.dc:creator: Ciara Farmer
item.mi:shortTitle: Caroline Flack and Andrew Brady split: Host 'breaks up with CBB star'

item.title: Angelina Jolie wears all-black ensemble to Los Angeles pet store as son Knox carries away snake bedding
item.description: The 42-year-old Oscar-winning actress treated her nine-year-old son Knox on Sunday to a trip to a Los Angeles pet store.
item.content:encoded:
Angelina Jolie treated her son Knox on Sunday to a trip to a Los Angeles pet store.

The 42-year-old Oscar-winning actress wore an all-black ensemble for the outing.

The mother-of-six wore a knee-length black coat over a black crew neck top and black trousers. 

Pet store: Angelina Jolie wore all-black on Sunday while taking her son Knox to a pet store in Los Angeles

She completed her look with matching footwear and accessorized with sunglasses.

Angelina had her dark brown hair pulled back into a bun.

Nine-year-old Knox kept it casual in a grey Tempest Trü Freedom T-shirt, khaki green cargo pants and black Nike sneakers.

The budding herpetologist carried a bag of snake bedding from the pet store. 

Mother and son: Nine-year-old Knox kept it casual while spending time with his mother

Knox and his twin sister Vivienne were born in July 2008 in Nice, France to Angelina and estranged husband Brad Pitt, 54.

Angelina also has children Maddox, 16; Pax, 14; Zahara, 13 and 11-year-old Shiloh.

She was spotted on Tuesday in a longer black coat grocery shopping with Zahara and Knox in Los Angeles.

Busy star: Angelina also was spotted with Knox recently grocery shopping in Los Angeles

Angelina and Brad separated in September 2016 and she filed for divorce seeking physical custody of their children.

The former couple last month received court approval to extend their ongoing private divorce negotiations.

Angelina agreed to a temporary custody agreement late last year that granted Brad visitation rights. 

Happier times: Brad Pitt and Angelina are shown in November 2015 in Hollywood
item.dc:abstract: Angelina Jolie treated her son Knox on Sunday to a trip to a Los Angeles pet store. The 42-year-old Oscar-winning actress wore an all-black ensemble for the outing. The mother-of-six wore a knee-length black coat over a black crew neck top and black trousers.

item.title: Bonding with her parents! Kaia Gerber takes time off from her supermodel career to catch up with Cindy Crawford and Rande Gerber in Malibu
item.description: On Saturday she joined thousands of others in downtown Los Angeles at the March For Our Lives protest against gun violence. On Sunday, the 16-year-old was much more relaxed in Malibu.
item.content:encoded:
On Saturday she joined thousands of others in downtown Los Angeles at the March For Our Lives protest against gun violence.

And on Sunday, Kaia Gerber looked far more relaxed as she left Starbucks in Malibu with her mom, former model Cindy Crawford, her entrepreneur dad Rande Gerber and a group of gal pals.

An internationally famous model at just 16, Kaia was casually dressed in a black sweatshirt and black cargo pants that she tucked into a pair of heavy black Doc Martens boots.

Teen model and activist: Kaia Gerber was spotted out in an all-black outfit in Malibu on Sunday, the day after taking part in the March For Our Lives rally against gun violence in Los Angeles

She smoothed her brunette tresses back into a high pony tail showing off her peachy, make-up free complexion.

Kaia completed her outfit with a black bag on a chain that she threw over her shoulder.

The genetically blessed teen owes her beauty to former supermodel Cindy and her father Rande, also once a model. 

Following her parents: The 16-year-old left Starbucks with her mom Cindy Crawford, 52, and dad Rande Gerber, 55

Musical moment: The beautiful brunette's eye - and ear- was caught by a small band playing outside Starbucks

Cindy, 52, showed off her fashionista creds in a light brown suede jacket that she wore over a white T-shirt and skinny jeans that she tucked into over-the- knee black boots. 

She added more color to her ensemble with a long green, grey and white scarf she looped around her neck.

The celebrity smiled at a band playing outside Starbucks and stopped for a bit to dance along. 

Showing off her paces: The leggy lovely grooved to the music as Rande smiled at her

Not embarrassing at all: Kaia and her gal pals didn't seem to mind Cindy's performance

The Versace star walked next to her husband with her chestnut tresses tumbling over her shoulders.

Rande, who was the only one holding a Starbucks beverage, was as casually dressed as his wife of 20 years and daughter.

He donned a black zip-up jacket over a black shirt, grey pants and black sneakers.

Genetically blessed: Kaia is the image of her former supermodel mom Cindy

There was no sign of the couple's 19-year-old son Presley, who is also a model, on Sunday.

Kaia is still at high school so she was keen to support the March For Our Lives Movement.

She joined friend and fellow model Charlotte Lawrence, 17, at the rally aimed at protecting the lives of children and teachers through gun reform.

Activist pals: She joined friend and fellow model Charlotte Lawrence, 17, at Saturday's downtown L.A. rally aimed at protecting the lives of children and teachers through gun reform
item.dc:abstract: On Saturday she joined thousands of others in downtown Los Angeles at the March For Our Lives protest against gun violence. And on Sunday, Kaia Gerber looked far more relaxed as she left Starbucks in Malibu with her mom, former model Cindy Crawford, her entrepreneur dad Rande Gerber and a group of gal pals. An internationally famous model at just 16, Kaia was casually dressed in a black sweatshirt and black cargo pants that she tucked into a pair of heavy black Doc Martens boots.

item.title: Richard Bacon reveals he has been diagnosed with ADHD at age 42 and says Blue Peter 'cocaine debacle' would not have happened if condition had been spotted in his 20s
item.description: He was famously sacked from Blue Peter in 1998 after he admitted snorting cocaine in a nightclub.
item.content:encoded:
He was famously sacked from Blue Peter in 1998 after he admitted snorting cocaine in a nightclub.

And Richard Bacon has revealed he has been diagnosed with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) at age 42- and said he believes if he had been diagnosed earlier, the 'cocaine debacle' would not have happened.

In a candid interview with The Sun, the Fox presenter admitted his behaviour had spun out of control in the run-up to his diagnosis,saying he had been going out late drinking too much, as well as losing his credit cards 'twice a week', and other personal items.

Candid: Richard Bacon has revealed he has been diagnosed with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) at age 42- and said he believes if he had been diagnosed earlier, the 'cocaine debacle'  at Blue Peter would not have happened

Shamed: He was famously sacked from Blue Peter in 1998 after he admitted snorting cocaine in a nightclub (pictured in 1997)

He said: 'It sounds trivial, but the consequences add up to something quite serious for your family.

The father-of-two, who said it was a 'relief' to be finally be diagnosed, admitted he was causing 'pain and chaos' to his family, and was tired all the time.

'I was opening a bottle of wine and getting through it in front of the telly at night', he said. 

Concerned by his behaviour, the star saw a specialist, and after a brain scan, found out he had two types of ADHD and was put on medication.

Spiral: In a candid interview with The Sun , the Fox presenter admitted his behaviour had spun out of control in the run-up to his diagnosis,saying he had been going out late drinking too much, as well as losing his credit cards 'twice a week', and other personal items

He said the treatment has allowed him to sleep and cut down his drinking to twice a week and in significantly lesser amounts.

Richard, who has been married to Rebecca McFarlane since 2008, said now he feels he can finally change and be a 'good husband and father.' The couple share son Arthur, six and daughter Ivy, three.

He said: 'If I’d been diagnosed in my twenties the cocaine debacle wouldn’t have happened.'  

Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) is a group of behavioural symptoms that include inattentiveness, hyperactivity and impulsiveness.

Doctor: Concerned by his behaviour, the star saw a specialist, and after a brain scan found out he had two types of ADHD and was put on medication

Symptoms of the disorder tend to be noticed in childhood years, with most cases diagnosed between the ages of six and 12.   

People with ADHD may also have problems such as sleep and anxiety disorders.  

Richard was just 18 months into his dream job at Blue Peter when he was fired at the age of 22 after admitting he took cocaine in a London nightclub.

Devoted: Richard, who has been married to Rebecca McFarlane since 2008, said now he feels he can finally change and be a 'good husband and father.' The couple share son Arthur, six and daughter Ivy, three

At the time the BBC issued a statement from Lorraine Heggessey, head of children’s programmes, which said: ‘It is sad that such a talented presenter as Richard Bacon has not only let himself and his colleagues down but, most important of all, he has let down the millions of children who watch Blue Peter.’

A producer told Bacon him he would never work in television again.

More than a decade on, Bacon’s career has seen him present multiple television programmes for the Corporation, as well as for Channel 4 and ITV. 

He now lives in LA and fronts a successful daily news show 'The 30'.

Dismissal: Richard was just 18 months into his dream job at Blue Peter when he was fired at the age of 22 after admitting he took cocaine in a London nightclub (pictured in 1997 with Stuart Miles, Katy Hill and Romana D'Annunzio)
item.dc:abstract: He was famously sacked from Blue Peter in 1998 after he admitted snorting cocaine in a nightclub. And Richard Bacon has revealed he has been diagnosed with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) at age 42- and said he believes if he had been diagnosed earlier, the 'cocaine debacle' would not have happened.
item.dc:creator: Eve Buckland

item.title: Modern family! Joyful Jasmine Yarbrough joins Karl Stefanovic at his son's sports match after Today host's ex-wife 'called the police' during their commitment ceremony
item.description: Karl Stefanovic and Jasmine Yarbrough pledged their love to one another in an intimate commitment ceremony held earlier this month.
item.content:encoded:
Karl Stefanovic and Jasmine Yarbrough pledged their love to one another in an intimate commitment ceremony held earlier this month.

And the pair were the picture of domestic bliss on Sunday as they cheered on Karl's young son River at a sports match in Sydney.

Looking every inch the modern family, the couple's outing comes amid rumours Jasmine is expecting her first child with her Today show beau.

Modern family! Jasmine Yarbrough joined Karl Stefanovic as they cheered on his young son at a sports match in Sydney on Sunday

Domestic bliss! The pair showed their supportive for 11-year-old River as they strolled along the sidelines of the sports field 

Clearly in weekend mode, Karl cut a casual figure, blending in with other doting dads as he watched his 11-year-old son. 

Channel Nine's golden boy wore a loose-fitting grey shirt and a pale pink pair of shorts.

He covered up his famous visage with a pair of stylish sunglasses and his favourite faded Boston Red Sox ball cap.

Casual Karl: Clearly in weekend mode, Karl cut a casual figure, blending in with other doting dads as he watched his 11-year-old son River play AFL 

Low-key lovers: Fashionista Jasmine similarly opted for low-key ensemble as she draped her hands around her beau

A baby on the way? The couple's outing comes after rumours Jasmine is expecting her first child with Karl

Meanwhile, fashionista Jasmine similarly opted for a low-key ensemble.

The talented shoe designer wore a tan-coloured tank top and a pair of deliberately tattered jeans. 

She finished off her look with a pair of stylish slides from her own Mara and Mine label.  

Easy does it: With another child possibly on the way, it seems Karl may be in for many more years watching his children on the sports field

Lazy Sunday: Cosying up with Jasmine, Karl was seen slipping off his shoes and kicking back in the sunshine

With another child possibly on the way, it seems Karl may be in for many more years watching his offspring on the sports field.

And it appears he knows how to make the most of the parental duty, seen slipping off his shoes and kicking back in the sunshine.

The TV star and his blonde beauty were both beaming, happy and relaxed.

After the game finished the pair were later seen calling in at a cafe as they continued their blissfully lazy Sunday.

The look of love: In the wake of his Ubergate scandal, Karl appeared at ease as he enjoyed time with his ladylove 

Supportive future step-mum! Jasmine stepped out to cheer on young River at his weekend sports game 

It's a far cry from reports that Karl's ex-wife Cassandra Thorbun 'called the police after becoming concerned about her children' during the new couple's commitment ceremony.

Karl and Cassandra share three kids together, and New Idea reports that her call was sparked by 'concern' for her two youngest, Ava and River.

They were both with Karl on a designated weekend when he decided to exchange vows with Jasmine.

According to Woman's Day, the children were confused and upset after finding out about the commitment ceremony just three hours beforehand.

Karl and Cassandra's eldest child Jackson did not attend and is believed to be estranged from the Today show host. 

Pit stop: After the game finished the pair were later seen calling in at a cafe as they continued their blissfully lazy Sunday

Leaving it all behind: Karl appeared to be putting the drama of his Ubergate scandal behind him as he spent time with his family on Sunday
item.dc:abstract: Karl Stefanovic and Jasmine Yarbrough pledged their love to one another in an intimate commitment ceremony held earlier this month. And the pair were the picture of domestic bliss on Sunday as they cheered on Karl's young son River at a sports match in Sydney. Looking every inch the modern family, the couple's outing comes amid rumours Jasmine is expecting her first child with her Today show beau.

item.title: 'Today is our wedding day!' The View's Star Jones weds Ricardo Lugo on Bahamas cruise ship one day after celebrating 56th birthday on board
item.description: Star shared several snaps to her Instagram, first of her lavish birthday party on Saturday, then her on board bachelorette party along with her pet pooch Pinky Michelle Jones.
item.content:encoded:
Star Jones is one happy lady.

The former star of TV's The View not only celebrated her 56th birthday on Saturday on board a cruise ship; she also got hitched Sunday.

Star exchanged vows with fiance Ricardo Lugo in front of family and friends as they sailed in The Bahamas on the Royal Caribbean's Anthem Of The Seas.

Scroll down for video 

Seafaring nuptials: Star Jones tied the knot with fiance Ricardo Lugo on board a Royal Caribbean cruise ship in The Bahamas on Sunday. She posted this snap to her Instagram

Star shared several snaps to her Instagram, first of her lavish birthday party on Saturday, then her on board bachelorette party along with her pet pooch Pinky Michelle Jones.

She also added a shot of herself and her new husband silhouetted against the sunset sky.

She wrote in the caption:  'Yesterday was my birthday...and today is our wedding day at sea! Our #AnthemToLove has officially begun on the #AnthemOfTheSeas!'

Celebrating: The former panelist on The View also shared snaps of her bachelorette party posing with her beloved dog Pinky Michelle Jones and a glass of champagne

Blowing out candles: She also posted to Instagram a montage of photos taken at her 56th birthday party on Saturday, also on board the ship

The couple, who've been dating for several years, got engaged last summer.

Lugo is an assistant state attorney who works for State Attorney Kim Foxx in Illinois, according to the Chicago Tribune. 

Guests at the nuptials included Beyonce's mom Tina Knowles-Lawson who shared a snap of some of the female guests to Instagram with the caption: 'With all my beautiful fly girls on the seas❤️ here to celebrate the love and Union of Star Jones and Ricardo.'

'Fly girls': Guests at the nuptials included Beyonce's mom Tina Knowles-Lawson who shared this snap of some of the female guests

Husband number 2: Ricardo, pictured with Star in New York this past October, is an attorney

Star was previously married from 2004 to 2008 to Al Reynolds, a former investment banker.

The TV personality is best known for her stint on ABC's The View where she was one of the original panelists alongside Barbara Walters and Whoopi Goldberg.

She appeared on the daytime show from 1997 to 2006.

In 2011 she was cast in the fourth installment of The Celebrity Apprentice, placing fifth in the reality competition.

In November 2017, her ex-husband Reynolds came out as bisexual. 

The first husband: Star wed Al Reynolds, an investment banker, in 2004. They divorced in 2008. They're pictured at Diddy's Real White Party in The Hamptons in 2007
item.dc:abstract: Star Jones is one happy lady. The former star of TV's The View not only celebrated her 56th birthday on Saturday on board a cruise ship; she also got hitched Sunday. Star exchanged vows with fiance Ricardo Lugo in front of family and friends as they sailed in The Bahamas on the Royal Caribbean's Anthem Of The Seas.

item.title: 'Please slow down stay with me forever!' Kim Zolciak shares heartfelt messages as daughter Ariana, 16, goes to prom with her boyfriend Collin
item.description: The 39-year-old reality television starlet shared a series of photos and sweet messages to her little girl who was dressed to the nines in a gorgeous floral Sherri Hill gown.
item.content:encoded:
She's the doting mother to six children.

But Kim Zolciak was overcome with emotion as she sent her 16-year-old daughter off to prom on Saturday night in Atlanta, Georgia.

The 39-year-old reality television starlet shared a series of photos and sweet messages to her little girl who was dressed to the nines in a gorgeous floral Sherri Hill gown.

Scroll down for video 

Growing up! Kim Zolciak was overcome with emotion as she sent her 16-year-old daughter off to prom on Saturday night in Atlanta, Georgia

'Where does the time go? My sweet Ariana Biermann heading to her boyfriends prom! Of course I cried I'm so proud of you,' Kim shared in a lengthy post.

Ariana rocked a beautiful high-low strapless gown covered in massive red roses and bright green leaves as she walked down the stairs to her adoring family. 

Boyfriend Collin Lipman matched his leading lady wearing a black suit with a bright red bow tie.

Beautiful: The 39-year-old reality television starlet shared a series of photos and sweet messages to her little girl who was dressed to the nines in a gorgeous floral Sherri Hill gown

Young love: Ariana rocked a beautiful high-low strapless gown covered in massive red roses and bright green leaves as she walked down the stairs to her adoring family

'There are no words describe how proud of you we truly are,' Kim continued. 'You are balanced, kind, sweet, giving and patient! Please slow down stay with me forever!' 

She ended the long caption with a heartfelt shout out to the dress designer, Sherri Hill. 

'Year after Year! You have kept my girls looking flawless always,' the Don't Be Tardy star proclaimed.

Kim's husband and Ariana's adopted father Kroy Biermann made sure to get in on photos of the pair as they posed outside of the family's home. 

Snap! Kim's husband and Ariana's adopted father Kroy Biermann made sure to get in on photos of the pair as they posed outside of the family's home

The adorable young couple have shown up on each other's Instagram accounts dating back to October 2017. 

Her mother rose to fame as an original cast member on the Real Housewives of Atlanta before breaking off into her own show. 

Kim married former professional football player Kroy during a star-studded backyard wedding in November 2011.

Kroy adopted Ariana and her sister Brielle after marrying their mother. The pair also share sons Kroy Jr., six, Kash, five, and twins Kaia and Kane, four. 

Cuties: The adorable young couple have shown up on each other's Instagram accounts dating back to October 2017
item.dc:abstract: She's the doting mother to six children. But Kim Zolciak was overcome with emotion as she sent her 16-year-old daughter off to prom on Saturday night in Atlanta, Georgia. The 39-year-old reality television starlet shared a series of photos and sweet messages to her little girl who was dressed to the nines in a gorgeous floral Sherri Hill gown.
