item.title: Beyonce bite drama: Sara Foster and actress Sanaa Lathan hit back at the beehive and deny speculation they are the culprits
item.description: Tiffany Haddish sparked a Twitter frenzy this week after her relevation that a mystery actress bit Beyonce's face at a party.
item.content:encoded:
Tiffany Haddish sparked a Twitter frenzy this week after her revelation that a mystery actress bit Beyonce's face at a party.

And Beyonce's notoriously dedicated Beyhive have been quick to place blame, prompting Love & Basketball actress Sanaa Lathan and model Sara Foster, ex step-sister of Bella and Gigi Hadid, to deny rumours that they are the culprits.

Girls' Trip actress Tiffany started the drama when she told the April edition of GQ that music icon Beyonce was bit by a fellow reveller at a private afterparty following Jay Z's performance at The Forum in Los Angeles in December.

Detective work: Tiffany Haddish sparked a Twitter frenzy this week after her revelation that a mystery actress bit Beyonce's face at a party, prompting her fans to accuse two actresses

Tiffany has refused to name the culprit, meaning Bey's loyal fanbase have turned detective. 

Fans found the guest list from the event and concluded that it could have been The Best Man actress Sanaa, 46, commenting with bumblebee emojis on Lathan's social media.

Sanna broke her silence on Monday night, tweeting: 'Y'all are funny. Under no circumstances did I bite Beyoncé and if I did it would've been a love bite.'

Accused: Beyonce's notoriously dedicated Beyhive have been quick to place blame, prompting Love & Basketball actress Sanaa Lathan to deny rumours she is the culprit

Not me! Sanna broke her silence on Monday night, tweeting: 'Y'all are funny. Under no circumstances did I bite Beyoncé and if I did it would've been a love bite.'

Not convinced: The declaration of love for Beyonce only prompting still-suspicious fans to respond with a string of hilarious memes

The declaration of love for Beyonce only prompted still-suspicious fans to respond with a string of hilarious memes, including OJ Simpson gifs from those who took note of Sanaa's 'if I did it' line.

Model and 90210 actress Sara Foster also denied she played any part in the incident on Instagram, writing:

'Flattering that anyone thinks I could get this close to Beyoncé,' alongside a screen shot of an email she had received from a journalist. 

Under suspicion: Model and 90210 actress Sara Foster also denied she played any part in the incident after fans found out she was on the party guestlist 

Denial: 'Flattering that anyone thinks I could get this close to Beyoncé,' alongside a screen shot of an email she had received from a journalist

While Girl's Trip star Tiffany deliberately didn't name the woman who bit Beyonce, the Bey Hive immediately began debating her identity.

Chrissy Teigen was one of the first, tweeting: 'I cannot leave this planet without knowing who bit Beyonce in the face.'

She then followed this up with: 'I can only think of one person who would do this. but I cannot say. but she....is the worst.'

Who bit Beyonce's face? Online frenzy followed Tiffany Haddish's shock revelation... as Chrissy Teigen tweeted 'You'd NEVER guess who it is!'

However after finding out who the actress with vampire-like tendencies actually was, Chrissy expressed her shock.

'My initial guess was wrong. The real person? I *never* would have guessed. I'VE SAID TOO MUCH.'

But while Chrissy wasn't able to name the alleged biter, Twitter wasn't so reticent, with fans all jumping to name actresses they thought could be to blame.

Warning! Tiffany was previously called out by Beyonce in new song Top Off after the comedian spilled party drama; the two are seen in a selfie that night

The debate was started when Tiffany opened up to GQ about the memorable December party, saying the actress appeared high on drugs.

Tiffany explained: 'There was this actress there that's just, like, doing the mostest. She bit Beyonce in the face.'

As might be imagined, Beyonce wasn't happy about this. 

Continued Tiffany: 'So Beyonce stormed away, went up to Jay-Z, and was like, 'Jay! Come here! This b****...' and snatched him. They went to the back of the room. I was like, 'What just happened?' And Beyoncé's friend walked up and was like, 'Can you believe this b**** just bit Beyonce?''

Tiffany says that the mystery actress then crossed her path - telling her to stop dancing.

Tiffany then approached Beyonce, who she had met for the first time that evening.

The irrepressible 38-year-old said she told her: 'I'm going to beat somebody a** at your party. I just want to let you know that.'

Beyonce told her not to, and said of the actress: 'That b**** is on drugs. She not even drunk. The b**** is on drugs. She not like that all the time. Just chill.'

The interview updates Tiffany's previous description of meeting the superstar, in which she went into less detail.

In it Tiffany said she had witnessed the singer act possessively when the unidentified actress placed her hand on Jay Z's chest. 

In response on DJ Khaled's recent song Top Off, Queen Bey called out Tiffany, saying her name and rapping, 'If they're tryna party with the queen, they gon' have to sign a non-disclosure.' 

But the Girls Trip star doesn't seem to be too worried that she has burned the friendship bridge with her idol. 

'Everything she said rang so real to me,' she said in a tweet after the song was released. 'Just know I will sign an NDA any day for Beyoncé. But also know this I will fight for Beyoncé. I love that woman she is a gift from God,'

Opening up: Tiffany's interview appears in the new edition of GQ, out now
item.dc:abstract: Tiffany Haddish sparked a Twitter frenzy this week after her relevation that a mystery actress bit Beyonce's face at a party. And Beyonce's notoriously dedicated Beyhive have been quick to place blame, prompting Love & Basketball actress Sanaa Lathan and Sara Foster, the sister of top models Bella and Gigi, to deny rumours that they were the culprits. Girls' Trip actress Tiffany started the drama when she told the April edition of GQ that music icon Beyonce was bit by a fellow reveller at a private afterparty following Jay Z's performance at The Forum in Los Angeles in December.
item.dc:creator: Joanna Crawley
item.mi:shortTitle: Beyonce bite drama: Sara Foster and Sanaa Lathan both deny accusations

item.title: Jonathan Ross, Jimmy Carr and Catherine Tyldesley 'received up to £5,000 each' to take part in CHARITY specials of Catchphrase
item.description: It has been revealed that the famous contestants who appeared on the ITV show Catchphrase are thought to have been paid up to £5,000
item.content:encoded:
Game shows regularly run celebrity charity editions where famous faces compete to win money for their chosen cause.

However it claimed that the celebrity contestants who appeared on the ITV show Catchphrase are thought to have been paid up to £5,000.

Household names such as Jonathan Ross, Catherine Tyldesley and Jimmy Carr were allegedly paid for taking part in a celebrity versions of the programme.

Contestants: Game shows regularly run celebrity charity editions where famous faces compete to win money for their chosen cause

Revealed: It has been revealed that the famous contestants who appeared on Catchphrase are thought to have been paid up to £5,000

Other celebrities who are thought to have received four-figure sums include Linda Robson, Fay Ripley and Ellie Simmonds.

Although Jonathan Ross was paid for his stint on the show he is understood to have donated his fee to charity - although it is unclear if any of the others followed suit.

An ITV source has since insisted the celebrity version of the popular game show has have never been promoted as a charity special, telling MailOnline: 'Catchphrase celebrity specials are entertainment shows.  

Show host: The gameshow hosted by Stephen Mulhern was revived back in 2013 after being off air for nine years

'They are not called, nor are they positioned as, charity specials or charity appeals. 

'For the celebrity specials, the production teams approach celebrities to appear to be part of these entertainment shows, in which they can win significant sums of money for a charity of their choice.

'The non celebrity version of Catchphrase offers members of the public the opportunity to play, and win money for themselves.' 

Charity show: Household names such as Jonathan Ross and Jimmy Carr were allegedly paid for taking part in a celebrity versions of the programme.

A separate TV source previously told The Sun: 'It came as a surprise to find out the celebrities were getting paid when the show appears to be just for charity. 

'Obviously they are giving their time for good causes, but viewers probably wouldn't expect the stars to be paid.' 

MailOnline have contacted their representatives for comment.  

Generous: Although Jonathan Ross was paid for his stint on the show he later donated his fee to charity - it is unclear whether any of the others followed suit

The gameshow hosted by Stephen Mulhern was revived back in 2013 after being off air for nine years. 

The show has previously been hosted by several presenters including Roy Walker, Nick Weir and Mark Curry.

Contestants have to identify a familiar phrase represented by a piece of animation and background music.  

Famous faces: Other celebrities who are thought to have received four-figure sums include Linda Robson, Catherine Tyldesley, Fay Ripley and Ellie Simmonds

Shock: A TV source told the Sun : 'It came as a surprise to find out the celebrities were getting paid when the show appears to be just for charity
item.dc:abstract: However it has been revealed that the famous contestants who appeared on the ITV show Catchphrase are thought to have been paid up to £5,000. Household names such as Jonathan Ross and Jimmy Carr were allegedly paid for taking part in a celebrity versions of the programme.
item.dc:creator: Jason Chester
item.mi:shortTitle: Celebrities paid £5k to appear on charity specials of Catchphrase

item.title: From Paris to Miami: Cara Delevingne showcases her typically daring style as she hosts Armani Exchange in Florida... days after confirming romance with model Jackson
item.description: The Paper Towns actress, 25, let her statuesque frame take centre stage on Friday, as she hosted the Armani Exchange 'New Energy, Same Spirit' bash at Miami's W South Beach hotel.
item.content:encoded:
She hit headlines last week as she appeared to confirm her romance with Michael Jackson's daughter Paris as the pair put on a steamy display.

But Cara Delevingne let her statuesque frame and striking appearance take centre stage on Friday, as she hosted the Armani Exchange 'New Energy, Same Spirit' party alongside DJ Martin Garrix at the W South Beach hotel in Miami.

The Paper Towns actress, 25, looked every inch the vixen as she flaunted her lengthy pins in a stone-coloured trench coat.

Dare to be bold! Cara Delevingne let her statuesque frame take centre stage on Friday, as she hosted the Armani Exchange 'New Energy, Same Spirit' bash at Miami's W South Beach hotel

BFA's 2012 Model Of The Year recipient teamed her scanty outerwear with a pair of thigh-high stiletto boots. 

 The Suicide Squad star gave the camera an intense smoldering gaze, which was heightened by a dramatic smokey eye and clear lipgloss.

Ensuring focus remained on her stunning looks, Cara's pixie cut was framed by sophisticated flippy edges.

Sealed with a kiss: The Paper Towns actress, 25, hit headlines last week as she appeared to confirm her romance with Michael Jackson's daughter Paris as the pair put on a steamy display

All eyes on her: BFA's 2012 Model Of The Year recipient teamed her scanty outerwear with a pair of thigh-high stiletto boots

Cara's hosting gig came after she was spotting kissing Paris during an intimate night out last week.

The pair - who were joined by Paris' godfather Macaulay Culkin and his girlfriend - were out for a low-key night in West Hollywood, visiting the district's upmarket Argentinean steakhouse Carlito's.

At the end of their meal, the two happy couples headed outside, with model-turned-actress Cara leaning down to ask a giggling Paris to dance.

Hosts: The Suicide Squad star posed with co-host DJ Martin Garrix, as she gave the camera her intense smoldering gaze

Still flushed from their two-step, the pair then shared a passionate kiss, before Paris nestled into Cara's arms on the cold evening.

The Beverly Hills-born beauty - turning 20 in a week - and the British star cuddled while watching Todd Haynes' fifties-set lesbian flick, Carol, on a laptop earlier this month.

The 2015 romantic drama - starring heterosexual actresses Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara - was critically acclaimed and amassed $40.3M at the global box office.

Industry pals: Cara stood arm-in-arm with French producer David Guetta

The Gringo actress even quoted the movie's line 'flung out of space' on Snapchat and Insta-stories with the Valérian and the City of a Thousand Planets star, whom she's called 'my favorite.' 

Cara and Paris have taken their rumored romance across the globe, visiting the cities of Los Angeles, Prague and England - where they were first spotted holding hands outside a Dalston nightclub in November.

'There's no denying there's a spark,' a source told The Sun last month.

'They really hit it off at the MTV Movie and TV Awards in Los Angeles in May [2017] and have been hanging out since...Cara is quite enamored by the fact Paris is the daughter of one of her musical heroes.'

Love interest: Cara and Paris, 20 have taken their rumored romance across the globe, visiting the cities of Los Angeles, Prague and England

The Paper Towns actress, 25, looked every inch the vixen as she flaunted her lengthy pins in a stone-coloured trench coat.

item.title: 'People weren't too worried about using protection': Bachelor in Paradise stars didn't use condoms 'because everyone was told it was an STI-free zone'
item.description: Former Bachelor franchise stars jetted off to paradise to film the all-new spin-off series in Fiji late last year.
item.content:encoded:
Former Bachelor franchise stars jetted off to paradise to film the all-new spin-off series in Fiji late last year.

And some of the famed faces who have opted to give love a second chance on Bachelor In Paradise reportedly opted out of using protection when it came to having sex on the show.

Reported by NW on Monday, an on-set source claimed: 'Because everyone had been told it was an STI-free zone, people weren't too worried about using protection when it came to having sex.'

STI-free zone: Former Bachelor franchise stars jetted off to paradise to film the all-new spin-off series in Fiji late last year, and some of them reportedly opted out of protection when it came to having sex on the show

The publication further confirmed that each contestant was required to have a full screening for sexually transmitted diseases ahead of flying to the Fijian island for the series.

The cast members were only booked on flights once their clean results were submitted to the show from a doctor.

While the rooms were reportedly stocked full of condoms, some of the cast felt no need for their use given every cast member's STI-free status.

Frisky in Fiji! The publication further confirmed that each contestant was required to have a full screening for sexually transmitted diseases ahead of flying to the Fijian island for the series

Drama ensues! 'At one point, the girls started blowing up the condoms and playing with them as balloons on the lawns'

The source also stated: 'At one point, the girls started blowing up the condoms and playing with them as balloons on the lawns.'

And while drama ensues on the series with an upcoming proposal on the cards, rumours are also spiralling that a pregnancy announcement is set to hit screens too.

While Keira Maguire and Jarrod Woodgate are set to get hot and heavy on the show, the couple have attempted to keep their relationship under wraps following filming.

Incoming announcement: While drama ensues on the series with an upcoming proposal on the cards, rumours are also spiralling that a pregnancy announcement is set to hit screens too

Since wrapping up filming, the duo have been spotted pashing seaside and cosying up at the Portsea Polo.

In a recent interview on KIIS FM's The Kyle and Jackie O show, the controversial blonde villain hinted at their relationship status.

'I really like him, I think when I watched The Bachelorette I looked at him a different way to other people 'cause I know what happens and I know how it can be portrayed and twisted,' she said.

Keira added that she has never met such a 'genuine' person before.

Bachelor in Paradise returns to screens for more tears and drama on Channel 10 at 7:30 pm on Tuesday. 

Baby en route? While Keira Maguire and Jarrod Woodgate are set to get hot and heavy on the show, the couple have attempted to keep their relationship under wraps following filming

Let the drama roll: Bachelor in Paradise returns to screens for more tears and drama on Channel 10 at 7:30 pm on Tuesday

item.title: EXCLUSIVE - 'They did have concerns': Married At First Sight producers were 'worried over Sarah Roza's emotional behaviour while filming the show'
item.description: Sarah Roza reportedly suffered terribly during filming, with a source claiming MAFS producers were worried about her emotional behaviour
item.content:encoded:
She won over Married At First Sight viewers with her bubbly, outspoken personality.

But Sarah Roza reportedly suffered terribly during filming, with a source claiming producers were worried about her emotional behaviour.

Speaking exclusively to Daily Mail Australia, a TV insider said there was some concern on set over how she was coping.

Claims: Sarah Roza (pictured) reportedly suffered terribly while filming Married At First Sight, with a source claiming producers were worried about her emotional behaviour

'They did have concerns about Sarah's emotional well being,' the source said.

Sarah - who spoken candidly about her past struggles, including being 'abandoned' by a former partner - apparently acted in a way that had the crew worried.

The insider, who acknowledged the fact they were not qualified to make any kind of medical diagnosis, would not provide details about Sarah's alleged behaviour.

'They did have concerns': Speaking exclusively to Daily Mail Australia, a TV insider said there was some worry on set over how Sarah was coping

On Monday, Daily Mail Australia spoke exclusively with Telv Williams' mother, Tracey Bamblett Onus, who said there were instances which raised questions for her.

Admitting she first thought that Sarah's overzealous sharing was just for the cameras, Tracey said it continued even after filming stopped.

She added that her son Telv 'felt concern for her' and wanted to part ways amicably.

Having appeared on a 'meet the parents' episode, Tracey said that the dinner was 'very uncomfortable', despite appearing cordial on-screen.

'Very, very upset': On Monday, Daily Mail Australia spoke exclusively with Telv Williams' mother, who said there were instances which raised questions for her

Tracey explained that Sarah got 'very, very upset' at one point and a family member tried to console her.

Speaking of Sarah and Telv's relationship, Tracey claimed that her son felt like he was walking on 'eggshells'.

'He didn't think the woman he was going to get was going to be so demanding,' she said. 'But he still wants to remain friends, he still wants to remain amicable.' 

Tracey also revealed that each MAFS couple was assigned a 'manager' and that their relationships were 'strictly monitored.'

Concern: Speaking of Sarah and Telv's relationship, Tracey Bamblett Onus claimed that her son felt like he was walking on 'eggshells'

Behind the scenes: Having appeared on a 'meet the parents' episode, Tracey said that the dinner was 'very uncomfortable', despite appearing cordial on-screen

item.title: 'Last vacation as a family of three!' Ali Fedotowsky shows off her bump in a bikini during Hawaii babymoon
item.description: There are only a few weeks to go until she welcomes a new baby to her family.
item.content:encoded:
There are only a few weeks to go until she welcomes a new baby to her family.

And Ali Fedotowsky celebrated that fact as she and husband Kevin Manno took advantage of spring break to enjoy a babymoon to Hawaii.

Showing off her large bump in a bikini on the beach, the glowing mother-to-be looked happy and relaxed as she and her husband bonded.

Scroll down for video 

'Last vacation as a family of three!' Ali Fedotowsky shows off her bump in a bikini during Hawaii babymoon on Friday

Alone time: While Ali's toddler daughter Molly was also on the trip, so was Ali's mother and mother-in-law to babysit

The 33-year-old, who found fame on The Bachelor before becoming a TV host and blogger, stood looking out to the ocean, a smile on her face.

She and radio host Kevin, who married last year, then took a stroll along the sand.

The family trip includes the couple's first child, one-year-old daughter Molly, and both of the toddler's grandmothers - on hand to give the parents-to-be some couple time.

Parents to be: She and radio host Kevin, who married last year, took a stroll along the sand

Taking to her blog, Ali thanked her  mother and mother-in-law for coming along on the trip.

'I can’t believe this is our last vacation as a family of 3,' she wrote, before explaining the family dynamic.

'Well were really a family of 5 this trip because were lucky enough to have both grammies come with us.

Reality bites: The 33-year-old, found fame on The Bachelor before becoming a TV host

'They are SUCH a help with Molly. We can’t thank them enough.'

And with the grandmas on hand to babysit, Kevin and Ali found plenty of time to be together. 

Ali wrote: 'I tried to step away from my computer for a bit to soak up some time with my family. 

Pretty as a picture: The shoreline looked incredible

Like I mentioned in my last post, it rained here quite a bit during our trip. But yesterday was beautiful and we are so grateful we got such a gorgeous day to spend together. 

'We spent a lot of time by the pool and on the beach! 

'What’s so crazy is that the last time I stood on his beach, Molly was in my belly and now I’m holding her in my arms. It’s pretty crazy to think about.'
item.dc:abstract: There are only a few weeks to go until she welcomes a new baby to her family. And Ali Fedotowsky celebrated that fact as she and husband Kevin Manno took advantage of spring break to enjoy a babymoon to Hawaii. Showing off her large bump in a bikini on the beach, the glowing mother-to-be looked happy and relaxed as she and her husband bonded.

item.title: 'Here's to many more adventures together!' Reese Witherspoon sends 'wonderful husband' Jim Toth her love on their seventh wedding anniversary
item.description: They tied the knot in a private ceremony at her Libbey Ranch in Ojai, California, on March 26, 2011. The actress has since sold the property but her love for her husband is still going strong.
item.content:encoded:
They tied the knot in a private ceremony at her Libbey Ranch in Ojai, California, on March 26, 2011.

Reese Witherspoon has since sold the property but her love for husband Jim Toth is still going strong.

On Monday the couple celebrated their seventh wedding anniversary and the 42-year-old Big Little Lies star posted a snap of them standing on a runway in the heart of the country with a light aircraft and rolling hills in the background.

Out in the wild: Reese Witherspoon posted this snap on Monday captioned, 'Happy Anniversary to my wonderful husband who keeps me smiling everyday! Here’s to many more adventures together! I love you, JT' referring to Jim Toth

She captioned it: 'Happy Anniversary to my wonderful husband who keeps me smiling everyday! Here’s to many more adventures together! I love you, JT.'

Jim, 47, towered over Reese who went for a country and western look in a taupe cowboy hat, a blue blouse, skinny jeans and cowboy boots.

He is co-head of motion picture talent at the Creative Artists Agency, where Reese is a client.

Jim sported a red and blue plaid shirt, black pants, brown shoes and a big smile.

Dressy couple: The 42-year-old Big Little Lies star and her Creative Artists Agency husband, 47, looked smart as they headed to an event in February

The couple didn't give any indication of where they were, but it seemed very remote, suggesting they wanted some alone time on their anniversary.

There was no sign of their five-year-old son, Tennessee, or Reese's daughter Ava, 18, and Deacon, 14, whom she shares with ex-husband, actor Ryan Phillippe, 43.

The break may be just what Reese needs as she has a busy year ahead of her.

 The Draper James clothing and lifestyle entrepreneur has just released magical mystery A Wrinkle In Time, co-starring Oprah Winfrey and Mindy Kaling,

He wants a slice: Reese and Jim's five-year-old son, Tennessee, was very interested in his mom's birthday cake. The actress turned 42 on Thursday

The whole family: Reese with Ava, Deacon, little Tennessee and husband Jim at the Sing premiere in Decmeber 2016

She also has comedy drama, Wish list, in the works along with Tinker Bell, a live-action take on Peter Pan's fairy friend. Both have yet to set release dates.

Reese is working on the second series of her HBO show Big Little Lies with Nicole Kiman and Shailene Woodley.

Plus she has TV series Little Fires Everywhere and an untitled TV project with Jennifer Anison in pre-production that gives a behind-the-scenes look at a morning TV show broadcast from New York.

Fairy tale fun: Reese and Storm Reid in family friendly A Wrinkle In Time

item.title: Feeling a bit nippy? Braless Sinitta leaves little to the imagination as she attends Ready Player One screening in form-fitting green dress
item.description: The X Factor star, 54, showed off slightly more than she bargained for as she went braless at the film screening for Ready Player One at London's Charlotte Street Hotel on Monday evening.
item.content:encoded:
She regularly parades her age-defying looks at high-profile events.

But Sinitta showed off slightly more than she bargained for as she went braless at the film screening for Steven Speilburg's Ready Player One at London's Charlotte Street Hotel on Monday evening.

The X Factor star, 54, showcased her youthful appearance in a green figure-hugging ensemble, adorned with a brown belt that cinched in her tiny waist.

A bit nippy? Sinitta showed off more than she bargained for as she went braless at the film screening for Ready Player One at London's Charlotte Street Hotel on Monday evening

The So Macho hitmaker teamed her number with a pair of nude brown heels and accessorised with a flashy crucifix necklace.

Living up to her show-stopping ways, the Toy Boy belter styled her tresses into voluminous curls and wore glamorous make-up.

Sinitta was joined by her mother and soul singer Miquel Brown, 69, as well her son Zac, 12, and aesthetics doctor Dr. Vincent Wong. 

Svelte: The X Factor star, 54, showcased her youthful appearance in her green figure-hugging ensemble, adorned with a brown belt that cinched in her tiny waist

High spirits: Sinitta was joined by her mother and soul singer Miquel Brown, as well her son Zac, 12, and aesthetics doctor Dr. Vincent Wong

Sharing a glimpse into her fun-filled trip with her Instagram followers, the TV personality posted a snap of the group in electric shutter shades.

The I'm A Celebrity star captioned the image: 'Family Night with @DrVWong Miquel Mama Brown and @zacRoman #ReadyPlayerOne great #VirtualReality #StevenSpielberg #Movie.'

The new sci-fi film from iconic director Steven Spielberg is set in a future Dystopian earth, where humanity spends its time in an interconnected virtual space known as the OASIS, to escape the desolation of Earth's cities.

'Family night': Sharing a glimpse into her fun-filled trip with her Instagram followers, the TV personality posted a snap of the group in electric shutter shades

The founder dies and offers ownership of the space and $500bn to the first person who can find a hidden treasure within the space, by problem-solving and playing games, with a battle ensuing between a young man and his friends and a corrupt megacorporation. 

The movie - based on the novel Ernest Cline - stars Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke, Simon Pegg, and Lena Waithe, set for a US release date of March 29.  

Although the premiere at SXSW in Texas suffered technical difficulties when the theatre's sound system went down during a crucial scene - leading it to be replayed- it won acclaim from critics and fans alike.

The X Factor star, 54, showcased her youthful appearance in a green figure-hugging ensemble, adorned with a brown belt that cinched in her tiny waist.

item.title: Start your engines! Danica Patrick celebrates 36th birthday as she cuddles up to new beau Aaron Rodgers
item.description: Danica took to Instagram to share photos of the festivities on Monday as she was pictured close to the hunky 34-year-old ex-boyfriend of Olivia Munn.
item.content:encoded:
As if autoracing wasn't already enough of an adrenaline rush, Danica Patrick has found a new way to get her heart racing.

The professional race car driver celebrated her 36th birthday with new boyfriend Aaron Rodgers.

Danica took to Instagram to share photos of the festivities on Monday as she was pictured close to the hunky 34-year-old ex-boyfriend of Olivia Munn.  

Start your engines! Danica Patrick took to Instagram to share photos of her 36th birthday festivities on Monday

Getting close: The 36-year-old professional athlete was s of the festivities pictured close to the hunky 34-year-old ex-boyfriend of Olivia Munn

The birthday was unicorn-themed as she wore a cute birthday crown featuring flowers and a white horn.

She even blew out the candles on a fun two-tiered cake featuring a golden horn and multi-colored hair with horse ears.

She looked stylish as always in a sleeveless white top, black miniskirt, and light brown suede thigh-high boots.

Majestic: The birthday was unicorn-themed as she wore a cute birthday crown featuring flowers and a white horn

Golden: Big shiny balloons indicated what year she was celebrating 

Her brunette tresses were worn down flowing over her shoulders as she flaunted her natural beauty with minimal make-up.

Aaron - who is the star quarterback of the Green Bay Packers -  looked cool in a light grey sweater with dark grey pants. 

Aaron and Danica's relationship is very new.

According to TMZ, The couple have only been dating since December, almost immediately after Danica's break-up with fellow race car driver Ricky Stenhouse Jr.

The former duo previously dated for five years.

Fun times: Aaron and Danica's relationship is very new as they have been reportedly dating since December 

Prior to settling down with Danica, the NFL star dated actress Olivia Munn, 37, from 2014 until last April.

Last summer, the athlete opened up to ESPN about the break-up and said that fame was a big reason why he and Munn didn't make it together.

He told ESPN: 'When you are living out a relationship in the public eye, it's definitely ... it's difficult.

'It has some extra constraints, because you have other opinions about your relationship, how it affects your work and, you know, just some inappropriate connections.'

Exes: Prior to dating the race car driver, Rodgers dated Olivia Munn from 2014 until April 2017
item.dc:abstract: As if autoracing wasn't already enough of an adrenaline rush, Danica Patrick has found a new way to get her heart racing. The professional race car driver celebrated her 36th birthday with new boyfriend Aaron Rodgers. Danica took to Instagram to share photos of the festivities on Monday as she was pictured close to the hunky 34-year-old ex-boyfriend of Olivia Munn.

item.title: Wayne Rooney party girl Laura Simpson turns up the heat in a flirty bandeau bikini as she soaks up the sun in Tenerife
item.description: The office worker, 29, set pulses racing once again as she soaked up the sunshine on her Tenerife getaway on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She burst into the spotlight partying up a storm with Wayne Rooney on a boozy night out.

And Laura Simpson ensured all eyes were on her once again as she soaked up the sunshine during a Tenerife getaway on Monday.

The office worker and mother-of-one, 29, put on a sizzling display in a crisp white bandeau bikini top that was barely able to contain her ample cleavage.

Fun in the sun: Wayne Rooney party girl Laura Simpson ensured all eyes were on her once again as she soaked up the sunshine during a Tenerife getaway on Monday 

Laura flaunted her rippling abs in the cropped top, while flirty palm tree bikini bottoms sat high on her hips.

The party girl made the most out of her sun-drenched beach trip, going barefoot as she soaked up the rays on her stroll.

Laura's glowing tanned skin complemented her two-piece to perfection, while she kept out the sun's glare with chic circular shades. 

Beach babe: The office worker and mother-of-one, 29, put on a sizzling display in a crisp white bandeau bikini top that was barely able to contain her ample cleavage

Sizzling style: Laura flaunted her rippling abs in the cropped top, while flirty palm tree bikini bottoms sat high on her hips

Taking a break: The party girl made the most out of her sun-drenched beach trip, going barefoot as she soaked up the rays on her stroll 

Laura's glossy chestnut tresses fell past her shoulders in a natural straight style.

Leaving her glamorous accessories at home, Laura simply polished off her look with layered gold charm necklaces and a nude make-up palette. 

Looking very relaxed during her beach vacation, Laura perched on a rock to check her phone and to readjust her saucy two-piece.   

Her outing comes after the party-goer reportedly enjoyed a passionate one-night stand with former Celebrity Big Brother star Jeremy McConnell after a boozy evening out in Manchester.

And relax: Every inch the beach babe, Laura's glossy chestnut tresses fell past her shoulders in a natural straight style

Grabbing attention: Laura made sure all eyes were on her as she confidently strolled along the sand during her break in the Canary Islands 

In one steamy snap, the former Celebrity Big Brother star, 28, could be seen snuggling up to Laura, 29, in bed.

A source told The Sun: 'Jeremy and Laura were both single when they met and they hit it off straight away. 

'One thing led to another and they spent the night together after partying with their mates.

Time away: Laura stepped out solo for her beach trip, which no doubt proved a welcome change from her home town of Manchester 

Party girl: Laura was at the centre of a sea of speculation in September when she reportedly 'kissed' Wayne on a night out, leading to his estrangement from then pregnant wife Coleen

'It's certainly not going to lead to a relationship but it's a night of passion neither of them are going to forget in a hurry.' 

Laura was at the centre of a sea of speculation in September when she reportedly 'kissed' Wayne on a night out, leading to his estrangement from then-pregnant wife Coleen.

The couple eventually reconciled, but in a lengthy statement Coleen described the situation as 's**t.' 

Paradise: The bombshell courted attention once again but this time when she hit the beach in the Tenerife for a spot of winter sun

On the rise: It was reported that the flame-haired wannabe star is apparently setting up her own online business, which is similar to American infidelity site Ashley Madison

In November, Laura seemed to slam the mother-of-four's decision, writing in a now-deleted tweet: 'What a load of attention seeking b******s'.

She later added: 'Very very attention seeking if you ask me.'

While more recently, it was reported that the flame-haired wannabe star is apparently setting up her own online business, which is similar to American infidelity site Ashley Madison.

Eye-catching: The party-goer clearly enjoyed her sun-drenched moment as she took a casual stroll through the sand

Keeping in touch: Laura was never far away from her phone during the beach trip

A source told the Sunday Mirror: 'Laura knows her involvement with Wayne is the kind of thing other women would aspire to. 

'Women find it exciting to have illicit affairs with married men and lots of successful, rich men are happy to meet them.'

'She knows she will come under criticism and be called a home-wrecker but these men are going to cheat whether you give them a website to do it on or not. 

'This is just making sure women know they are married or in a relationship.'

Beach beauty: Making the beach her catwalk, Laura through he sultry pout towards the camera

The office worker and mother-of-one, 29, put on a sizzling display in a crisp white bandeau bikini top that was barely able to contain her ample cleavage.

item.title: 'The odds were against her surviving': Kym Marsh recalls horrific premature birth of daughter Polly... and reveals ongoing battle with mystery illness that left her needing brain scan
item.description: The 41-year-old actress was typically candid as she opened up about the odds of seven-year-old Polly's survival, as well as her own recent health woes that left her needing a brain scan.
item.content:encoded:
She suffered every parents' worst nightmare when she welcomed her daughter seven weeks early back in March 2011  - just two years after losing son Archie after he was born 18 weeks premature.

And Kym Marsh recalled her heartbreak during her recent interview with OK! magazine, describing daughter Polly - who she shares with ex-husband Jamie Lomas - as her 'little miracle'. 

The 41-year-old actress was typically candid as she opened up about the odds of seven-year-old Polly's survival, as well as her own recent health woes that left her needing a brain scan. 

'The odds were against her surviving': Kym Marsh recalled her heartbreak at welcoming daughter Polly seven weeks early during a recent interview with OK! magazine

Speaking about her daughter's distressing premature birth, the Coronation Street favourite confessed: 'I was on bed rest for the last three months of my pregnancy. It was very stressful. 

'I needed her to be here safely, especially with what happened with Archie. My body wanted to let me down and it was completely out of my hands.’

She continued: ‘The odds were against Polly surviving, she’s our little miracle. She’s grown into a beautiful, bright girl. I’m so proud of her, especially when I think of how it could’ve been.’

'It's a horrible feeling': Kym also admitted she has been battling a mysterious illness since January, which left doctors concerned she might have a brain tumour

Her words came just moments before Kym admitted she has been battling a mysterious illness since January, which left doctors concerned she might have a brain tumour.   

Read all about it! You can read the full interview OK! magazine, out now

The health woe - described by the magazine as an 'undiagnosed inner ear problem' - has left Kym suffering spells of dizziness since January. 

She divulged: ‘It’s a horrible feeling of dizziness and being off balance, and like the floor’s uneven. The feeling of not being in complete control of my balance is scary.’

Doctors eventually told Kym that she would need to undergo a brain scan to rule out anything more serious.  

She confessed: ‘I was anxious when I was told I had to have a brain scan; I did worry that it might be something more sinister.

'The good thing is that there were no tumours or signs of multiple sclerosis.’  

The interview also saw Kym admit marriage isn't on the cards with boyfriend Matt Baker, despite the pair quickly approaching their three-year anniversary. 

She dished: ‘We don’t really talk about it as it’s not really something I’m in a rush to do. I’ve been married twice before and it’s not something I’m desperate for. 

'Marriage isn’t the be-all and end-all to me. If a relationship’s going to succeed or fail, it doesn’t make a difference if you’ve got a ring on your finger or not.' 

'It's not something I'm desperate for': Kym admitted marriage isn't on the cards with boyfriend Matt Baker, despite the pair quickly approaching their three-year anniversary

The 41-year-old actress was typically candid as she opened up about the odds of seven-year-old Polly's survival, as well as her own recent health woes that left her needing a brain scan.

item.title: 'I had to stop going out': Brendan Cole given a 'PARTY BAN' by wife Zoe to 'rein in his late nights'... amid claims their marriage is 'under strain'
item.description: Brendan Cole has been given a 'party ban' from his wife Zoe after he partied the night away at the TRIC awards a mere few hours after they welcomed son Dante two weeks ago.
item.content:encoded:
They have been plagued by rumours of marital strain due to his excessive time away from home and partying. 

But Brendan Cole has now been given a 'party ban' from his wife Zoe after it was revealed that he reportedly partied the night away at the TRIC awards a mere few hours after they welcomed son Dante two weeks ago. 

Speaking to The Sun, the dance professional, 41, revealed: 'I had to stop going out at night. It’s been very quiet on the home front.'

'Had to stop going out': Brendan Cole has been given a 'party ban' from his wife Zoe after he partied at the TRIC awards a mere few hours after they welcomed son Dante two weeks ago

Speaking after his All Night Long show in Bromley, South London, Brendan continued: 'We’ve just had a baby boy. Two weeks he’s been on the scene. He is gorgeous, of course, but it’s been a hard couple of weeks.

'Sleepless nights take their toll,' he concluded before a source added: 'Brendan knows he needs to rein in his late nights and Zoe clearly has got through to him.'

This comes after recent reports that Brendan and Zoe's marriage has become strained following his increasing time spent away from home and excessive partying.

According to The Sun, the former Strictly professional had been touring non-stop in the weeks leading up to his wife's due date and had been documenting his late night outings with his fellow cast members on social media after their shows. 

The dance professional, 41, revealed: 'I had to stop going out at night. It’s been very quiet on the home front'

A source added: 'Brendan knows he needs to rein in his late nights and Zoe clearly has got through to him'

An insider said: 'Brendan’s hectic touring schedule and his late nights out with his fellow dancers is starting to take its toll. It's been a very stressful few months leading up to the birth and barely 24 hours after Zoe had Dante, Brendan is already back on the road.

'Spending so much time apart is bound to have an impact on their marriage and Zoe is well aware of the female company he so regularly socialises with.'

MailOnline has contacted Brendan Cole's rep for comment. 

The reports come in light of the dance star going back on the road for his solo tour. Brendan performed in Crawley, Sussex, on Thursday night and is expected to visit a number of cities around the UK before finishing up on March 31.

Baby boy: The couple welcomed their son on March 12, who joins older sister Aurelia, five, but recently the couple have been hit by claims their marriage is under strain

Brendan previously discussed how he found it difficult to find the balance between his family and working life, explaining that he prefers to keep them separate. 

He said: 'I separate the two. To do the two together, would be very difficult. You come off the stage and your adrenaline’s pumping and you don’t want to go to sleep for at least three hours. 

'I wouldn’t be in bed before two o’clock on a show day just because your adrenaline does not stop. So that is not conducive to family life.'

Brendan married model Zoe back in 2010, with the pair welcoming their first child, Aurelia, two years later. They had announced they were expecting another baby in September following a trip away to Mallorca, where the couple own a holiday home.

Toast: Brendan wet the baby's head alongside golfer and pal Carly Booth at the TRIC Awards held at London's Grosvenor House on March 13, celebrating 18 hours after Zoe gave birth

Fans were shocked last month when it was announced Brendan had been sacked by hit BBC show Strictly Come Dancingafter 13 years and 15 series on the show because of his 'fiery personality'.

Insiders told MailOnline at the time: 'Fiery Brendan was sacked after 13 years and 15 series on the show for creating negative press and for his on-air outbursts.'

But the television star showed his emotional side as he broke down in tears while discussing his sacking during an interview on Lorraine on rival channel ITV. 

Dumped: Fans were shocked last month when it was announced Brendan had been sacked by hit BBC show Strictly Come Dancing after 13 years and 15 series on the show

But Brendan Cole has now been given a 'party ban' from his wife Zoe after it was revealed that he reportedly partied the night away at the TRIC awards a mere few hours after they welcomed son Dante two weeks ago. Speaking to The Sun , the dance professional, 41, revealed: 'I had to stop going out at night. It’s been very quiet on the home front.'

item.title: 'Nothing in Christianity says I can't be a rock star!' Alice Cooper on how his faith saved him from an early death
item.description: The 70-year-old rocker was warned by doctors to quit drinking or die 37 years ago, when he woke up throwing up blood and was taken to hospital.
item.content:encoded:
Alice Cooper credits his religion for saving him from alcoholism.

The 70-year-old rocker was warned by doctors to quit drinking or die 37 years ago, when he woke up throwing up blood and was taken to hospital.

He recalled: 'Everything that could go wrong was shutting down inside of me.

'I was drinking with Jim Morrison and Jimi Hendrix and trying to keep up with Keith Moon and they all died at 27.'

'Nothing in Christianity says I can't be a rock star!' Alice Cooper on how his faith saved him from an early death; he is pictured last month

And the Welcome to My Nightmare rocker - who has children Calico, Dash and Sonora with wife Sheryl Goddard - admits it took his brush with death to bring him back to the church.

He told the New York Daily News newspaper's Confidential column: 'My wife and I are both Christian. My father was a pastor, my grandfather was an evangelist. I grew up in the church, went as far away as I could from it - almost died - and then came back to the church.'

The shock rocker insists his faith is compatible with his career.

He said: 'There's nothing in Christianity that says I can't be a rock star. People have a very warped view of Christianity. They think it's all very precise and we never do wrong and we're praying all day and we're right-wing. It has nothing to do with that. It has to do with a one-on-one relationship with Jesus Christ.'

As he was: Cooper in 1970 onstage

The 'School's Out' hitmaker finds the time for Bible study every day and goes to church every Sunday, and is proud that none of his children have ever had problems with drugs or alcohol.

Meanwhile, Alice can be seen as King Herod in the live action version of 'Jesus Christ Superstar' alongside John Legend in the lead role on NBC next weekend.

And the musician has taken inspiration from late actor Alan Rickman for his performance.

He explained: 'When I first heard about it, I thought Alan Rickman -- that condescending sort of arrogant character, and I kind of fashioned what I would do after what I thought Alan Rickman would do if he were alive.'
item.dc:abstract: Alice Cooper credits his religion for saving him from alcoholism. The 70-year-old rocker was warned by doctors to quit drinking or die 37 years ago, when he woke up throwing up blood and was taken to hospital. He recalled: 'Everything that could go wrong was shutting down inside of me.
item.dc:creator: Lizzie Smith
item.mi:shortTitle: Alice Cooper on how his faith saved him from an early death

item.title: Make-up free Geri Horner looks cheery as she heads out on a stroll with son Monty... amid reports the Spice Girls will 'reunite for animated adventure'
item.description: The singer, 45, had plenty to smile about as she enjoyed a casual stroll with son Monty, 14 months, in leafy Hampstead, north London, on Monday morning.
item.content:encoded:
She's rumoured to be lending her voice to a new animated adventure alongside her Spice Girls bandmates. 

And Geri Horner had plenty to smile about as she enjoyed a casual stroll with son Monty, 14 months, in leafy Hampstead, north London, on Monday morning.

The singer, 45, looked cheery as she soaked up the spring sunshine in a chic grey coat and charcoal scarf.

Mummy and me: Geri Horner had plenty to smile about as she enjoyed a casual stroll with son Monty, 14 months, in leafy Hampstead, north London, on Monday morning 

The mother-of-two kept things comfortable for her leisurely walk, donning a pair of sophisticated chestnut boots.

Flashing a wide smile, the It's Raining Men hitmaker cooed over her little boy while shielding her eyes in classic aviators.

Geri's copper locks were swept back off her face and tucked into her scarf as her natural glow radiated as she went make-up free.

Stylish mum: The singer, 45, looked cheery as she soaked up the spring sunshine in a chic grey coat and charcoal scarf

On the stroll: The mother-of-two kept things comfortable for her leisurely walk, donning a pair of sophisticated chestnut boots

Later in the day, the TV personality shared an adorable snap of Monty getting to grips with a felt football at a park, while the mum-of-two looked on. 

Geri's outing comes after Variety reported that Geri will reunite with her Spice Girls bandmates for an animated adventure with characters based on the band, known as Posh, Scary, Baby, Ginger and Sporty.

Sources told the publication that the characters will be voiced by the singers, better known now by their real names; Victoria Beckham, Melanie Brown, Emma Bunton and Melanie Chisholm.

Smiles: Geri's copper locks were swept back off her face and tucked into her scarf as her natural glow radiated as she went make-up free

Day out: Flashing a wide smile, the It's Raining Men hitmaker cooed over her little boy while shielding her eyes in classic aviators

The insider explained: ‘They are fired up about the idea. It’s perfect for them because it won’t involve too much of their time.

'They can record voice-overs while working on their solo projects – and the animated versions of the girls can look years younger without everyone wondering if they’ve had surgery.’ 

The group hopes it will be the first of many animated superhero feature films that will spawn lucrative hit soundtrack albums. 

‘They’re thinking big in terms of a franchise on a global scale,’ said the source. 

New adventure: The star's outing comes amid new claims Geri will reunite with her Spice Girls bandmates for an animated adventure with characters based on the band

On the up: Geri took the time to look around the neighbourhood as a friend pointed out something of interest

Creative Artists Agency, which represents the group, is pitching the project to major Hollywood studios.

Earlier this year, Geri admitted she often gets 'anxious' she doesn't spend enough time with her children. 

Speaking to OK! Magazine, she confessed: 'I want to feel connected, I feel my daughter as she's got older, needs me more to be there to talk things through,' she said of daughter Bluebell.  

'My mum guilt kicks in when Monty wakes me up at 5.20am. I do the school run, I'm with him all day and then have to get everyone to bed. So going to work the next day feels quite easy.' 

Casual: Geri looked ultra casual for their trip out, making sure to keep a pair of trainers with her

Sunny stroll: Geri made the most of the sunshine as she walked with son Monty in a sophisticated stroller

She added: 'I prioritise being a mother and my family … But of course I feel guilty.' 

The singer married Red Bull's Formula One team principle Christian Horner, 44, in an intimate ceremony in Bedfordshire in May 2016.

The couple announced their baby news in October 2016, before welcoming little Montague in January 2017.

Geri is also a mother to daughter Bluebell, 11, with screenwriter former flame Sacha Gervasi, 51.

Christian has daughter Olivia, four, with his ex-wife Beverley Allen.  

'At the park!' Later in the day, the TV personality shared an adorable snap of Monty getting to grips with a felt football at a park, while the mum-of-two looked on

And Geri Horner had plenty to smile about as she enjoyed a casual stroll with son Monty, 14 months, in leafy Hampstead, north London, on Monday morning. The singer, 45, looked cheery as she soaked up the spring sunshine in a chic grey coat and charcoal scarf.

item.title: Cara de la Hoyde reveals her incredible post-baby body in tiny lace lingerie set... just three months after giving birth to son Freddie George with beau Nathan Massey
item.description: Cara de la Hoyde proved she had snapped back into sensational shape as she took to Instagram on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She gave birth to her longed-for first baby Freddie George with beau Nathan Massey in December.

And Cara de la Hoyde proved she had snapped back into sensational shape as she took to Instagram on Monday.

The Love Island winner, 27, wowed in a tiny blush pink lace lingerie set which revealed her slim midriff and tiny waist as she saucily posed on the bed.

Post-baby body: Cara de la Hoyde proved she had snapped back into sensational shape as she took to Instagram on Monday, three months after welcoming baby boy Freddie George

Striking a sultry pose in the snap captioned 'Good morning Monday', the star flashed a hint of cleavage in a scanty bralet which she paired with a matching set of French knickers.

She also flashed a glimpse of her toned legs and intricate thigh tattoo.

Her raven tresses were styled in loose tumbling waves, flowing down one shoulder while her pretty features were enhanced with smoky eye make-up and a slick of frosted pink gloss. 

Blooming: The star welcomed her son in December with beau Nathan Massey

She was soon inundated with compliments from her fans with one writing 'So good to see a real body after having a baby without it being edited etc! You look amazing'.

Another wrote: 'Beautiful.... I've seen your posts on twitter about ur body and girl u look incredible I wish my body looked like yours after having my children. You should never feel pressured to be back looking like you haven't just had a child, it's so unrealistic. Love your body there's some women out there that can't have children, your body's done an amazing thing so love it.'

While a third added: 'Omg, now i even love you more! You are such a good role model for women/mums'.     

Last week the brunette beauty showed off her incredible bikini body, in a cobalt blue two piece while adding the caption: 'It's almost the weekend so shake it'.

Wow! Cara de la Hoyde became a first time parent with her beau Nathan Massey just three months ago, she proved she has snapped back into smouldering shape as she took to Instagram on Friday to post a sexy video

Cara and Nathan shot to stardom on the second series of ITV2 dating series Love Island in 2016 where they went on to win the show. Despite their initial passion, the pair announced their split in April, despite Cara revealing her pregnancy soon after.

After months apart, during which Nathan was an endless support during the pregnancy, the couple decided to reunite in December and have since been inseparable while sharing professions of love and snaps of baby Freddie. 

She has not only been sharing snaps of the tot but also of her stunning transformation after springing back into shape following the birth.

Cara wore her raven hair in loose waves over her shoulders while her make-up was lavishly applied to show off her glowing complexion.

Shake it! Showing off her incredible bikini body, the brunette beauty wowed in a cobalt blue two piece while adding the caption: 'It's almost the weekend so shake it'

The string straps on the halter bikini boosted her cleavage to perfection while the bottoms perfectly drew attention to her slender frame.  

In an interview with OK! Magazine in December the duo introduced their tot by name while Cara candidly recalled her labour however at that time insisted she won't be getting engaged to Nathan, now they are back together and have started a family.

Settled on Freddie George, Cara had the intials of her newborn engraved onto a ring which she has been spotted sporting on her left hand - sparking rumours she and Nathan are set to wed, now they have rekindled their romance.

Upsetting: Cara and Nathan shot to stardom on the second series of ITV2 dating series Love Island in 2016 where they went on to win the show. Despite their initial passion, the pair announced their split in April, despite Cara revealing her pregnancy soon after

However, setting the record straight on claims the duo were engaged, former dancer Cara explained the ring is a tribute to her 'little man' and not an engagement ring.

She told the publication: 'It has the baby's initials FG on it. We're not engaged so I wear his name on my ring finger as he's my little man.'

Recalling the moment she first welcomed her son into the world, Cara revealed she was forced to ditch her initial plans for a water birth, as she began to go into labour while in the bath.
item.dc:abstract: Cara de la Hoyde proved she had snapped back into sensational shape as she took to Instagram on Monday. The Love Island winner, 27, wowed in a tiny blush pink lace lingerie set which revealed her slim midriff and tiny waist as she saucily posed on the bed.

item.title: Love Island's Jonny Mitchell gets VERY amorous with bikini-clad new love Danielle Zarb-Cousin in the Maldives
item.description: Jonny Mitchell shared sizzling snaps of the pair putting on an amorous display in the Maldives on Monday, as he admitted he was in love with his girlfriend of one month.
item.content:encoded:
He has been enjoying a whirlwind romance with new girlfriend Danielle Zarb-Cousin, cementing his affection by whisking her away on a £20,000 holiday.

And Jonny Mitchell shared sizzling snaps of the pair putting on an amorous display in the Maldives on Monday, as he admitted he was in love with his girlfriend of one month.

The Love Island star, 27, and his model love looked closer than ever as they shared a smouldering kiss on a sunlounger, with a bikini-clad Danielle laying on top of a shirtless Jonny as they packed on the PDA surrounded by crystalline waters.

Wow factor: Jonny Mitchell put on a VERY amorous display with new girlfriend Danielle Zarb-Cousin in the Maldives on Monday, as he admitted he was in love with his girlfriend of one month

The brunette beauty showcased a cheeky glimpse of her peachy posterior and toned legs as she wrapped her arms around Jonny, who revealed his muscular upper body. 

Revealing his depth of feeling for his new girlfriend, the smitten reality star captioned the photo: 'Just two people in love in the Maldives I guess.'

The hunk couldn't help but share a series of photos of the new couple cosying up on their idyllic Indian Ocean break, starting with a very cheeky snap of Danielle posing up a storm in a skimpy black thong swimsuit.

Looking sensational in the sun-soaked snap, Danielle flaunted her endless legs and peachy posterior to an approving Jonny, who enjoyed a glass of bubbly while reclining on a sunlounger. 

Cheeky: The hunk couldn't help but share a series of photos of the new couple cosying up on their idyllic Indian Ocean break, starting with a very cheeky snap of Danielle posing up a storm in a skimpy black thong swimsuit

PDA:Jonny sharED a sweet photo of the pair staring into one another's eyes captioned: 'When you find someone who wears black as much as you do'

Showing his appreciation for his girlfriend he wrote: 'Cheers to a bootyful weekend.'

The love-fest continued with Jonny sharing a sweet photo of the pair staring deep into one another's eyes while wearing matching black outfits, captioned: 'When you find someone who wears black as much as you do'.

A besotted Jonny sweetly smiled at his stunning partner while Danielle flaunted her toned legs and cleavage in a racy lace minidress. 

'Perfect last night with my perfect girl': Jonny couldn't keep his hands or lips off his beautiful girlfriend as they shared a smooch over dinner 

The final photo showed Jonny and Danielle sharing a passionate kiss over the dinner table as they rang in their last night in paradise over refreshing glasses of wine.

He wrote: 'Perfect last night with my perfect girl.. Literally cannot even begin to describe how crazy I am about this amazing girl.'   

Earlier this week Jonny posted loved-up snaps of his romantic getaway with  the couple pictured sharing a steamy kiss as they take a dip in their idyllic infinity pool.

'This is what smitten looks like!':Earlier this week Jonny posted loved-up snaps of his romantic getaway with the couple pictured sharing a steamy kiss as they take a dip in their idyllic infinity pool

The Love Island star looked in the throes of love with the model as the pair cut scantily clad figures during their PDA session.

Beside one of the sweet pictures, Jonny penned: 'I’m no expert but I’m pretty sure this is what smitten looks like ❤️ @daniellezarbx.'

'A month with this girl and my life’s been turned completely upside down.' 

Loved-up: Beside one of the sweet pictures, Jonny penned: 'I’m no expert but I’m pretty sure this is what smitten looks like ❤️ @daniellezarbx'

Although the statuesque beauty donned skimpy attire - which included a scarlet lace bikini and a triangle black two-piece - attention remained on the couple's smitten display.

The reality star looked every inch the hunk as he showcased his toned physique in a pair of short swimming trunks. 

In another intimate snap, Jonny and Danielle appear head over heels in love as they enjoy a cosy bath session. 

All eyes on her: The statuesque beauty donned skimpy attire - which included a scarlet lace bikini and a triangle black two-piece

Steamy: In another intimate snap, Jonny and Danielle appear head over heels in love as they enjoy a cosy bath session

With the brunette beauty beaming with delight while she reclines on her partner's chest, Jonny captioned the image: 'The maid wasn’t too happy about taking this photo for us.. jokes. Baths and laughs I guess❤️❤️❤️❤️'

The Celebrity Big Brother star revealed his new romance with Danielle earlier this month, and admitted to MailOnline he had been crazy about her for some time, before their romance blossomed.

He said: 'Danielle is from the same area as me, and we didn’t know each other but we had mutual friends. It kind of happened like that. But she was on my radar, I had known of her, she’s a beautiful girl.' 

Toned: The reality star looked every inch the hunk as he showcased his toned physique in a pair of short swimming trunks

While he rose to fame on Love Island, Jonny added the pair had decided to keep their relationship under wraps, as he feels publicity only hinders romance. 

He said: 'I’m such a new kid on the block. I have found that publicity doesn’t do a relationship a lot of good. If I’m seen with any girl, I’m automatically conceded as that person.'

'But I knew I couldn’t keep it a secret forever, I’m crazy about that girl!'  

'I couldn't keep it a secret forever!' The CBB star revealed his new romance with Danielle earlier this month, and admitted to MailOnline he had been crazy about her for some time
item.dc:abstract: Jonny Mitchell shared sizzling snaps of the pair putting on an amorous display in the Maldives on Monday, as he admitted he was in love with his girlfriend of one month. The Love Island star, 27, and his model love looked closer than ever as they shared a smouldering kiss on a sunlounger, with a bikini-clad Danielle laying on top of a shirtless Jonny as they packed on the PDA surrounded by crystalline waters.
item.dc:creator: Eve Buckland
item.mi:shortTitle: Love Island's Jonny Mitchell gets VERY amorous with new girlfriend

item.title: Newly-single Alessandra Ambrosio flashes plenty of sideboob in dazzling velvet gown as she attends amfAR charity gala in Hong Kong
item.description: The 36-year-old Brazilian supermodel made sure to command attention as she flashed plenty of sideboob in her demure black full-length gown with sparkling gem-encrusted straps.
item.content:encoded:
She recently confirmed her split with fiance Jamie Mazur after 10 years together.

Following the news, Alessandra Ambrosio put her best fashion foot forward as she attended the fourth amfAR Charity Gala in Hong Kong on Monday night at Shaw Studios. 

The 36-year-old Brazilian supermodel made sure to command attention as she flashed plenty of sideboob in her demure black full-length gown with sparkling gem-encrusted straps.

Scroll down for video 

Head-turning: Alessandra Ambrosio put her best fashion foot forward as she attended the fourth amfAR Charity Gala in Hong Kong on Monday night at Shaw Studios

The fashion star's velvet gown perilously plunged down her back in dramatic style, highlighting her incredible figure and narrow torso.

Proudly flaunting her gym-honed figure, the former VS Angel paired her head-turning look with a pair of statement drop diamond earrings and dazzling diamond rings.

She kept to her glamorous display by working her long brunette locks into a sleek style slicked back of her face while sporting a vibrant red lip to tie the formal attire together. 

Eye-popping: The 36-year-old Brazilian supermodel made sure to command attention as she flashed plenty of sideboob in her demure black full-length gown with sparkling gem-encrusted straps

Mane attraction: She kept to her glamorous display by working her long brunette locks into a sleek style slicked back of her face while sporting a vibrant red lip to tie the formal attire together

Her dazzling red carpet arrival comes after news broke earlier this month that the catwalk queen split with her fiance of 10 years, Jamie Mazur.

The shocking split has yet to be confirmed by the Brazilian beauty who shares two children - daughter Anja, nine, and son Noah, five - with the businessman.

'They [have] been trying to keep their split on the down low,' an insider told Us Weekly.

Striking: The fashion star's velvet gown perilously plunged down her back in dramatic style, highlighting her incredible figure and narrow torso

Model behaviour: Proudly flaunting her gym-honed figure, the former VS Angel paired her head-turning look with a pair of statement drop diamond earrings and dazzling diamond rings alongside fellow model Shanina Shaik

'But Alessandra has been out and about ready to mingle and hasn't been taking Jamie to anything.'

Alessandra retired from walking the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show catwalk in 2017 after nearly two decades on the famous runway.

She explained to Entertainment Tonight why she was ending her nearly 20-year career with the lingerie powerhouse, saying: 'Victoria’s Secret is my family, but you know it’s time to move on. Momma is tired.'

Moving on: Her dazzling red carpet arrival comes after news broke earlier this month that the catwalk queen split with her fiance of 10 years, Jamie Mazur
item.dc:abstract: She recently confirmed her split with fiance Jamie Mazur after 10 years together. Following the news, Alessandra Ambrosio put her best fashion foot forward as she attended the fourth amfAR Charity Gala in Hong Kong on Monday night at Shaw Studios.
