item.title: Love is in the air! Charlotte McKinney cuddles up to tattoo artist Nathan Kostechko in West Hollywood
item.description: The 24-year-old blonde bombshell was seen snuggling up to her heavily tattooed beau at a gas station in West Hollywood on Sunday evening.
item.content:encoded:
They were first spotted together in December.

And it appears that things are moving along swimmingly between Charlotte McKinney, 24, and her new boyfriend, now identified as artist Nathan Kostechko, 38. 

The blonde bombshell was seen snuggling up with her heavily tattooed beau at a gas station in West Hollywood on Sunday evening.

Going strong: Charlotte McKinney was spotted looking cuddly with tattoo artist Nathan Kostechko on Sunday evening in West Hollywood

The couple embraced in the doorway of a store with the Baywatch star leaning her head against her man's chest. 

Waiting for Nathan's vintage ride to be refueled Charlotte grabbed some snacks from a gas station.

Charlotte, who first shot to fame as the busty blonde in Carl's Jr's Super Bowl ad in 2015, looked great in tight red jeans with rips on the knees and a black scoop neck bodysuit.

She wore patent black heels and wore her blonde locks loose, later pinning them up in a pretty bun.   

Charlotte, 24, looked great in tight red jeans and a scoop neck bodysuit

Smitten: Nathan, 38, doted over the leggy blonde as they grabbed some supplies from a gas station

Charlotte split from Blade actor Stephen Dorff, 44, in July 2016 after a year of dating.

By September that year she was spotted canoodling with hunk Scott Eastwood, 32.

But by January 2017 Charlotte declared she was 'so single it's crazy'. 

'Starting this year off, I've been really focused on work. But I'm really open. I'm here, call me!' she told E! News.

Going swimmingly: The duo were first seen together in December when they hung out at Ollo restaurant in Malibu

Blonde bombshell: Charlotte enjoyed a tropical vacation recently and shared this sexy snap by the beach last week

The blonde bombshell was seen snuggling up with her heavily tattooed beau at a gas station in West Hollywood on Sunday evening.

item.title: She's all heart! Mila Kunis sports love-themed sweater and skinny jeans as she runs errands in LA
item.description: The former That 70s Show starlet, who is married to her former co-star Ashton Kutcher, wore her shoulder-length dark hair loose and tucked behind her ears.
item.content:encoded:
Mila Kunis showed off her slender figure Monday as she ran errands in Los Angeles.

The actress and mom-of-two paired a dark blue sweater decorated with pink hearts with skinny blue jeans.

Keeping it casual, she went sock-less in a pair of white trainers.

On the go: Mila Kunis showed off her slender figure Monday as she ran errands in Los Angeles

The former That 70s Show starlet, who is married to her former co-star Ashton Kutcher, wore her shoulder-length dark hair loose and tucked behind her ears.

She was made up with foundation and blush and sported black mascara on her lashes.

She completed her look with dark pink lip color. 

Looking good: The actress and mom-of-two paired a dark blue sweater decorated with pink hearts with skinny blue jeans

Running errands: She was made up with foundation and blush and sported black mascara on her lashes. She completed her look with dark pink lip color

 Working mom: Keeping it casual, Mila went sock-less in a pair of white trainers

Busy day: The former That 70s Show starlet, who is married to her former co-star Ashton Kutcher, wore her shoulder-length dark hair loose and tucked behind her ears

The 34-year-old is a doting mother to daughter Wyatt, three, and son Dimitri, one.

But, she revealed during a recent appearance on The Ellen DeGeneres Show, the pair are very different.  

'My boy’s like a sloth. He’s wonderful, and I love him — ’cause one day he’ll probably watch this and be like, 'Why did you say that?' - but the truth is, women are smarter than men,' she said.  'And I have this evidence from my two different humans that I created.'

Mila explained: 'Girls are just like, on it and boys are like, dum dum dum. They’re just like a little bit more like little linebackers going through life and like Neanderthal-ish.'

Mila and Ashton have been married for nearly three years after tying the knot in July 2015.

The actor, 40, was previously married for eight years to actress Demi Moore. 

Sharing news: Mila Kunis, left, dished about the differences between her one-year-old son Dimitri and daughter Wyatt, three, on The Ellen DeGeneres Show last week, pictured with Kate McKinnon

item.title: Jenna Dewan's sweet daughter Everly, four, enjoys her first Kids' Choice Awards as she watches dad Channing Tatum be pelted with snowballs during fun ceremony
item.description: With the multi-talented Jenna Dewan and Channing Tatum as parents, little Everly Tatum was bound to make her awards show debut at some point.
item.content:encoded:
With the multi-talented Jenna Dewan and Channing Tatum as parents, little Everly Tatum was bound to make her awards show debut at some point.

And Everly, four, certainly chose a fun event at which to spend her Saturday, hitting the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards at The Forum in Inglewood, California.

Jenna held hands with her adorable mini-me as they took their seats at the star-studded ceremony, where Channing was presenting an award.

Family day out! Jenna Dewan was joined by her daughter Everly, four, at the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards at The Forum in Inglewood, California on Saturday

Everly matched the colourful event with her outfit, looking sweet in a purple and green number.

Her mum meanwhile showed off her dancer figure in a AO.LA by alice + olivia tight denim jumpsuit paired with gold jewellery.

Channing was also at the event, teaming up with Zendya and Black-ish actress Yara Shahidi for some fun and games.

Taking aim!Everly's dad Channing was also at the event, taking to the stage for a mass snowball fight at the notoriously messy awards do

The trio were showered in fake snowfall and pummeled with snowballs as they came out to give a lengthy description of their new animated feature Smallfoot.    

Jenna and Channing, both 37, met on the set of their film Step Up in 2006. They began dating shortly after filming for the movie wrapped and became engaged in Maui September 2008.

They got married on July 11, 2009, at Church Estates Vineyards in Malibu, California and Dewan gave birth to daughter Everly a few years later in London during May 2013. 

Target: The actor was showered in fake snowfall and pummeled with snowballs as he came out to give a lengthy description of new animated feature Smallfoot

Talented trio: Channing teamed up with his Smallfoot co-stars Black-ish actress Yara Shahidi and Zendya

Defence mode! The athletic star defended himself from snowballs while also rocketing several cold ones into the crowd

Speaking to People, Jenna explained it's a finely tuned juggling act balancing motherhood with work and her life with Channing. 

'I think it's important to be conscious about giving everyone equal attention,' she said.

'I'll think, "Okay, I've been with my daughter a lot, so Channing and I need a date night".' 

She added, 'Some days I am better at it than others, but I just try to figure it out. Like everyone else! But I do think it's important to consciously think about it.'

Cheeky! Channing shared a sweet Insta shot last week, showing the aftermath of artistic Everly's face painting session
item.dc:abstract: With the multi-talented Jenna Dewan and Channing Tatum as parents, little Everly Tatum was bound to make her awards show debut at some point. And Everly, four, certainly chose a fun event at which to spend her Saturday, hitting the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards at The Forum in Inglewood, California.

item.title: American Idol: Katy Perry munches her way through auditions and admits to having 'snacks under the desk'
item.description: The 33-year-old singer munched her way though Sunday's episode of American Idol, slurping on noodles, gobbling fruit, and even getting a pizza delivered to her judging table.
item.content:encoded:
Katy Perry munched her way though Sunday's episode of American Idol, slurping on noodles, gobbling fruit, and even getting a pizza delivered to her judging table.

'I have snacks under the desk, I love to eat, I love to snack…I love chicken nuggets,' said the 33-year-old singer, who revealed her beloved dog Nugget looks like a chicken nugget.

The Roar singer was not seen sharing her snacks with her fellow judges, 68-year-old R&B legend Lionel Richie and 41-year-old country star Luke Bryan, but she had plenty of enthusiasm for the contestants after her cravings were satisfied.

Snack time: Katy Perry admitted to a snacking habit during Sunday's episode of American Idol on ABC

One of the most interesting performers of the night was Adam Sanders, who completed during season 12 of the show, when he was 19-years-old.

The Texan had been attacked on social media since the appearance, for his 'weight and sexuality'. 

Some trolls had even told him to commit suicide.

'I let it get to me in the wrong way, it killed me inside,' said the 24-year-old, who works in a seafood restaurant and at a drag club.

Insatiable appetite: The pop star was shown munching throughout auditions

Various foods: Katy was shown eating snacks from a bag and a salad

Little nugget: The Teenage Dream singer said she loves chicken nuggets and said her beloved dog Nugget looks like one

Pizza break: A contestant pleased Katy when she walked up with a hot pizza for her

Adam appeared reborn as Ada Vox, in full drag regalia, to sing House Of The Rising Sun.

'You are owning your talent, you are owning who you are,' praised Lionel, as Katy ran in circles jubilantly.

Ada was sent to Hollywood, after receiving oodles of adoration from the panel.

Triumphant return: Adam Sanders auditioned on season 12 and made the top 50

Full drag: The singer returned in full drag regalia as Ada Vox

First time: Katy pulled up a photo from the singer's first audition

The first person to hit the stage was 17-year-old 'daddy's girl' Gabby Barrett from Pennsylvania.

She sang Good Girl by Carrie Underwood.

The judges thought her 'nasal-y' rendition was a bit too gimmicky.

Country singer: Gabby Barrett struggled with country songs but  found her voice with a church song

She tried a church song instead that pleased them more.

'You were just on fire,' said Lionel as she was voted in.

Katy 'punked' Gabby's dad, pretending she hadn't made it, which led to tears and laughter.

Good times: Katy helped pull a prank on Gabby's supportive father

Golden ticket: Gabby held up her golden ticket to Hollywood as her father beamed

'I hate it when dads cry,' wailed the Dark Horse songstress.

Flamboyant 22-year-old Caitlin Lucia did a version of Katy's I Kissed a Girl, with acoustic guitar.

'I think she might have sung it better,' Katy told her fellow judges.

Hit song: Caitlin Lucia sang Katy's song I Kissed A Girl

Nailed it: Katy told Caitlin that she might have sung it better

Caitlin, a Californian waitress, was voted into the next round.

Elvis' distant cousin, 28-year-old Amelia Presley, did Heartbreak Hotel.

'I think Elvis would be proud,' Luke told the Texan singer.

Next was Elvis impersonator/country lover Drake Milligan, who did George Strait's You Look So Good In Love.

Elvis fan: Drake Milligan advanced after the former Elvis impersonator performed a country song

'I'm fired up now,' Luke told the 19-year-old Texan, who received a golden ticket.

Mylon Shamble, a 24-year-old 'barbershop bartender', did Stand By Me, by Ben E. King.

'That's the best Stand By Me I've ever heard,' Katy told the excited Floridian.

Best version: Mylon Shamble impressed with her version of Stand By Me

North Carolina lady Lee Vasi was keen to impress Lionel.

The 20-year-old got a warm serenading of Zoom from the music legend, which she joined enthusiastically.

'You learned from the old-school up, you've been educated,' Lionel told her.

Soul song: Lionel Richie sang his song Zoom with Lee Vasi

Special moment: Lee was thrilled to sing along with Lionel

The retail associate was less successful with Toni Braxton's Love Shoulda Brought You Home.

'Your pitch went out of line,' commented Lionel.

'You're so close to being the complete package,' added Luke.

The judges took a chance with Lee, and she was sent to Hollywood.

Next round: The judges took a chance on Lee and sent her to Hollywood

In Los Angeles, they received some 'real characters' including Tory N. Teasley, a 26-year-old music teacher who did the explicit version of Cee Lo Green's Forget You.

Then, Lucy Clearwater, a 19-year-old Californian, dedicated Sir Mix-a-Lot's Baby Got Back to Luke.

Jarom Eubanks, a 20-year-old fast food worker from Utah, turned up in his PJs.

Nice try: Jarom Eubanks showed up in his pajamas and was sent home

He warbled through R.E.M.'s Losing My Religion, getting a 'no' from everyone except Katy.

'You're absolutely weird and I'm totally weird…you're cool bro,' she consoled.

Philadelphia bowling alley attendant Michael J. Woodward did Ed Sheeran's Make It Rain.

Killed it: Michael J. Woodward did Ed Sheeran's Make It Rain

'It's really refreshing to see this,' Lionel told the lovable 20-year-old, who has no formal singing experience.

'Beautiful soul,' he added as Michael took his golden ticket.

Brielle Rathbun, an 18-year-old Tennessean choreographer, coached Luke with some 'hip thrusts'

Teen talent: Brielle Rathbun coached Luke with some dance moves

Hip thrust: Luke learned a new hip thrust from Brielle

She did Sara Bareilles' Gravity, and was sent to Hollywood.

'I really like what you're doing,' Lionel told Brielle, who has a large collection of adopted and biological siblings.

Carly Moffa said: 'I would definitely describe myself as a mess.'

Quirky star: Carly Moffa described herself as 'a mess' but she sang beautifully

The 25-year-old did an original song, which she wrote while her mother was going though a tough time with Primary Progressive MS.

'Vocal quality is amazing, personality is amazing,' praised Lionel, who adored the quirky New Jersey resident.

Carly was sent to Hollywood.

Amazing gal: The judges praised Carly for her voice and personality

Ayana 'Rose' Lawson has been homeless in Illinois for almost five years, while she works at the Navy Pier in Chicago.

'I've always kept a smile on my face,' said the talented 22-year-old, who played guitar beautifully while she sang Bonnie Raitt's I Can't Make You Love Me.

'Your voice is good, and it's only going to get better,' said Luke, while Katy advised her to 'develop a little bit more' then come back.

Always smiling: Ayana 'Rose' Lawson failed to advance after her story of being homeless endeared her to the judges

'The hardest thing as a judge, is telling these kids no,' said Katy tearfully.

Flamoyant Harlem resident Samuel Swanson used to work on a farm in Alabama.

The 28-year-old did Al Green's Let's Stay Together, and gained a golden ticket.

Alabama roots: Samuel Swanson belted out Let's Stay Together and advanced

'Velvet, velvet and then layered with silky velvet,' sighed Luke, as Lionel compared him to his 'good friend' Luther Vandross.

Connecticut 'heavy metal rocker' Damiano Scarfi, who is unemployed, screeched through More Than a Feeling.

'You may have to branch off from that 80s stuff,' Luke told the 19-year-old, who didn't make the cut.

Rock singer: Damiano Scarfi failed to advance after his screeching take on More Than A Feeling

Colorado-based hostess Jurnee (no second name) met her wife Ashley at a party.

'It means everything to me to make her proud,' said the 18-year-old, who sang Rise Up by Andra Day.

'Jurnee, don't stop believing,' joked Luke, as the teen was sent to Hollywood.

American Idol continues on Monday on ABC.

Teen talent: Jurnee sang Rise Up by Andra Day

Moving on: The Colorado singer celebrated after getting her golden ticket to Hollywood

item.title: PICTURED: Troy, who? MAFS' Ashley Irvin confirms her relationship with millionaire Justin Fischer as the smitten pair enjoy a romantic dinner before spending the night together at his Rose Bay home
item.description: They have been at the centre of romance rumours for weeks.
item.content:encoded:
They have been at the centre of romance rumours for weeks. 

And it appears sparks really are flying between Ashley Irvin, 28, and Justin Fischer, 41, who were pictured enjoying a date this month.

The Married At First Sight millionaire picked up the slender blonde from the airport before treating her to a romantic dinner at Sydney's Park Hyatt.

Troy, who? After weeks of speculation, Ashley Irvin has confirmed her relationship with Justin Fischer after the pair were spotted on a romantic date in Sydney this month

The smitten pair then went back to his lavish Rose Bay apartment, where they spent the night together, before making their way to breakfast the morning after.

Flight attendant Ashley arrived in Sydney on a Friday night from Queensland and her strapping co-star was right on time to pick her up.

Hopping into his black BMW convertible, Ashley was seen already dressed and ready for their date.

The photos taken earlier in the month saw the reality star flaunt her enviable physique in a teal green form-fitting mini dress with black stiletto heels.

Her knight in shining armour! Arriving in Sydney on a Friday night Virgin flight from Queensland, strapping Justin was right on time to pick her up

Date ready! Hopping into his black BMW convertible, Ashley was seen already dressed and ready for their date

Dapper: The strapping father-of-two sported a perfectly ironed shirt and suit pants for the evening agenda 

Arriving with one suitcase and an overnight bag on her shoulder, chivalrous Justin was seen opening her door as she jumped inside.

The pair headed straight into the Sydney city for a romantic date at the Park Hyatt Hotel, where they were seen walking in hand-in-hand.

The strapping father-of-two sported a perfectly ironed shirt and suit pants for the evening agenda. 

Will he get a second date? Sitting by a window with glasses of wine, fans who were lucky enough to witness the date take place told OK! Magazine that the pair were definitely getting along really well

Going smoothly: 'They were flirty. They touched each other a lot,' reported the source to the publication

Keeping the romance alive: And the night didn't end there, with Ashley and Justin progressing to Sydney's Rock's to watch the sun set

Sitting by a window with glasses of wine, fans who were lucky enough to witness the date take place told OK! magazine that the pair were definitely getting along really well. 

'They were flirty. They touched each other a lot,' reported the source to the publication. 

And the night didn't end there, with Ashley and Justin progressing to Sydney's Rock's to watch the sun set.  

What a night to be alive! Getting close, Justin was photographed with his hands around her back while the blonde gazed out into the distance

Sparks flying? They've been rumoured to have been enjoying their own wife-swap love story over the past few weeks 

Getting their beauty sleep: With everything going to plan, the latest couple headed back to Justin's Rose Bay mansion where they spent the night together

Getting close, Justin was photographed with his hands around her back while the blonde gazed out into the distance.

With everything going to plan, the latest couple headed back to Justin's Rose Bay mansion where they spent the night together. 

The following morning saw the pair head to breakfast in the millionaire's Range Rover.

Out again! The following morning saw the pair head to breakfast in the millionaire's Range Rover

Happy days: Nourishing their bodies for the day ahead, Ashley was seen in a black tube top with form-fitting denim jeans and ditched her heels for black flats as she walked into the eatery smiling alongside Justin

Did Carly warn you Ash? However, it doesn't appear as though much has changed since his relationship with Carly Bowyer, with the former Married At First Sight husband seen on his phone during breakfast while Ashley patiently waited for his attention to return

Nourishing their bodies for the day ahead, Ashley was seen in a black tube top with form-fitting denim jeans and ditched her heels for black flats as she walked into the eatery smiling alongside Justin.  

However, it doesn't appear as though much has changed since his relationship with Carly Bowyer, with the former Married At First Sight husband seen on his phone during breakfast while Ashley patiently waited for his attention to return.

With the tennis enthusiast content with her meal, the ice-cream technician was seen walking out with his unfinished berry smoothie.

Smoothie to go! With the tennis enthusiast content with her meal, the ice-cream technician was seen walking out with his unfinished berry smoothie

It had to come to an end some day! And unfortunately, the pair's overnight of fun was destined to come to an end, with the Sydney-native returning back to the airport to drop his date off

And unfortunately, the pair's overnight of fun was destined to come to an end, with the Sydney-native returning back to the airport to drop his date off.  

After hours of fun, the pair's adventure came to an end with Justin taking Ashely back to the airport before leaning in for a kiss.   

Although the love-seekers are yet to confirm or deny their current relationship status, last week it was revealed that Justin's ex-wife Carly and Ashley's ex-husband Troy Delemege are currently in a serious relationship. 

What's so funny? It seemed as though the night had gone well, with Ashley laughing in the car before hopping out

Did he get the kiss? After hours of fun, the pair's adventure came to an end with Justin taking Ashely back to the airport before leaning in for a kiss

Longtime crush: During the reality show, Justin also expressed his desire for the busty Virgin Australia air hostess

During the reality show, Justin also expressed his desire for the busty Virgin Australia air hostess. 

'I'm more attracted to girl's like Ash,' he revealed after putting down his wife.

'I did say to the experts that I did like the blonde beach babe Aussie type girls.'

Will she be back? 'I'm more attracted to girl's like Ash,' he revealed after putting down his wife

item.title: Kissed and made up? Beaming James Lock and Yazmin Oukhellou pack on the PDA as they indulge in a spot of retail therapy... a day after their furious row on TOWIE
item.description: The couple cosied up to one another as they were ladden down with bags filled with their designer purchases, a day after 31-year-old James launched a foul-tirade aimed at girlfriend Yazmin.
item.content:encoded:
Their explosive argument on Sunday night's TOWIE left viewers and cast mates in shock.

Despite the uproar, Yazmin Oukhellou and James 'Lockie' Locke looked happier than ever as they packed on the PDA following a spot of retail therapy at London department store Selfridges on Monday.

The couple cosied up to one another as they were ladden down with bags filled with their designer purchases, a day after 31-year-old James launched a foul-tirade aimed at girlfriend Yazmin on The Only Way Is Essex's season premiere on ITVBe.

Packing on the PDA: Yazmin Oukhellou and James 'Lockie' Locke looked happier than ever as they packed on the PDA following a spot of retail therapy at London department store Selfridges on Monday

Showcasing her glamorous style, 24-year-old Yazmin slipped into a pair of high-waisted denims which she teamed with a attention commanding black scoop necklined top for the outing.

The reality beauty paired the look with a statement oversized black faux fur while she tackled the city's streets in her designer trainers while her brunette locks fell into a sleek style.

Despite the lack of sunshine in London, Yazmin accessorised her ensemble with a pair of oversized shades while she puckered up to her beau.

Complementing her look, beaming James donned a black wool coat over his skinny dark wash denims and leather Chelsea boots.

All smiles: The couple cosied up to one another as they were ladden down with bags filled with their designer purchases, a day after 31-year-old James launched a foul-tirade aimed at girlfriend Yazmin on The Only Way Is Essex's season premiere on ITVBe

Although putting on a smiling united front, the couple were involved in one of the more dramatic storyline's on Sunday night's The Only Way Is Essex. 

The ITVBe favourite proved to be more explosive than ever before after James launched into a foul-mouthed tirade aimed at Yazmin while in Barcelona.

The TOWIE veteran became agitated after he was confronted for his disrespectful behaviour by his other half's pals Chloe Lewis and Chloe Meadows following a recent dinner they had all attended.

Rant: James launched into a foul-mouthed tirade aimed at his girlfriend Yazmin while in Barcelona on Sunday night's TOWIE

Although the girls were sticking up for their pal and attempting to calmly resolve the issue, James quickly became enraged and left Yazmin in tears as he repeatedly called her a 'spoilt brat'. 

Taking a nasty turn, he shouted: 'Let me tell you something. Okay, you’re gonna start doing that. Throwing that card. Listen Yaz, do not f***ing sit there and make me look like a d**k. 

'Don't sit here playing the victim because you are a spoilt, f***ing brat. Alright? You're a spoilt, little f***ing brat. Do not sit here and f***ing play the victim. Don’t start f***ing crying.I'm a f***ing nice boy...'

In the midst of his rage, Yazmin pleaded with him to stop: 'I don't care if you do it at home but this is embarrassing'.

Disrespectful: Although the girls were sticking up for their pal and attempting to calmly resolve the issue, James quickly became enraged and left Yazmin in tears as he repeatedly called her a 'spoilt brat' 

Confronted: The TOWIE veteran became agitated after he was confronted for his disrespectful behaviour by his other half's pals Chloe Lewis and Chloe Meadows following a recent dinner they had all attended

Nasty: Taking a nasty turn, he shouted: 'Let me tell you something. Okay, you’re gonna start doing that. Throwing that card. Listen Yaz, do not f***ing sit there and make me look like a d**k'

But James refused to stop and tensions continued to rise as he reduced Chloe L to tears after he insinuated she went on a night out without telling her boyfriend Danny Flasher.

The brunette fired back: 'I'm very much in love and my partner does not speak to me the way you do.' To which Lockie replied: 'Yeah, go and have a cry. Bore off...'

Shocked by his behaviour, Chloe L made her way back inside the venue screaming: 'Gentleman? You're not a gentleman! You might want to look it up in the dictionary.'

Not holding back: He added: 'Don't sit here playing the victim because you are a spoilt, f***ing brat. Alright? You're a spoilt, little f***ing brat. Do not sit here and f***ing play the victim. Don’t start f***ing crying.I'm a f***ing nice boy...'

'Embarrassing': In the midst of his rage, Yazmin pleaded with him to stop: 'I don't care if you do it at home but this is embarrassing'

Claims: But James refused to stop and tensions continued to rise as he reduced Chloe L to tears after he insinuated she went on a night out without telling her boyfriend Danny Flasher

Firing back: The brunette fired back: 'I'm very much in love and my partner does not speak to me the way you do'

Tension: As tensions slowly started to simmer down, Yazmin said through her tears: 'It's embarrassing that they think you treat me like shit'

As tensions slowly started to simmer down, Yazmin said through her tears: 'It's embarrassing that they think you treat me like shit.'

Which left James angry adding: 'Me and you have a really toxic relationship. You try and wind me up, Yaz.'

Following expletive scene, viewers took to social media in their droves as they slammed the TOWIE star for his appalling behaviour while his co-star Gemma Collins and Celebs Go Dating expert Nadia Essex admitted they were outraged by his appearance.  

TOWIE's Gemma Collins tweeted: 'What totally disgusting behaviour! Not for me!'

Outrage: Following expletive scene, viewers took to social media in their droves as they slammed the TOWIE star for his appalling behaviour while his co-star Gemma Collins and Celebs Go Dating expert Nadia Essex admitted they were outraged by his appearance

While Nadia shared: 'If my boyfriend spoke to me like Lockie just spoke to Yaz in or out of public...needless to say he would no longer be my boyfriend' alongside a hand-waving emoji. 

A viewer wrote: '@JamesLock__ wouldn't know the meaning of the word "Gentleman" if someone smacked him round the face with a dictionary!! Vile human.'

'Sorry but shouting at your bird for crying is a joke, then going on to call her a brat. Gentleman my a**,' another posted. 'The way Lockie talks to Yaz is acc disgusting man. Ngl , it now makes sense why Danielle broke up with him'.

Anger: Which left James angry adding: 'Me and you have a really toxic relationship. You try and wind me up, Yaz'
item.dc:abstract: Their explosive argument on Sunday night's TOWIE left viewers and cast mates in shock. Despite their uproar, Yazmin Oukhellou and James 'Lockie' Locke looked happier than ever as they packed on the PDA following a spot of retail therapy at London department store Selfridges on Monday.
item.dc:creator: Lisa Mcloughlin

item.title: What is Stormy Daniels’s net worth?
item.description: Depending on legal ramifications, Stormy Daniels’s net worth could be changing quite a bit soon. Here's all you need to know about who she is, her net worth, 60 Minutes interview and more.
item.content:encoded:
Depending on legal ramifications, Stormy Daniels’s net worth could be changing quite a bit soon.

The former adult film actress, who allegedly had an affair with Donald Trump in 2006, recently opened up publicly about the reported affair in a 60 Minutes interview after initially denying it. 

The highly-anticipated interview came as Daniels found herself at the center of a legal storm regarding the alleged affair and a nondisclosure agreement involving hush money reportedly established on the eve of the 2016 election, with Daniels insisting that the agreement is void since Trump never personally signed it and the president’s legal team instead insisting that she has to pay $1 million (£703,660) per violation as part of the arrangement. Trump has recently fired back, insisting that reports of the affair were nothing more than 'fake news'.

But just who is Stormy Daniels? What is her net worth? Here’s all you need to know about how she’s made her money, her family, recent 60 Minutes interview and alleged relationship with Donald Trump.

Stormy Daniels gave an interview on 60 Minutes describing her alleged affair with Trump

Who is Stormy Daniels?

Stormy Daniels is an adult film actress, producer and exotic dancer who allegedly had an affair with Donald Trump back in 2006. She recently gave an interview on 60 Minutes detailing the alleged extramarital affair with the president.

Daniels was born Stephanie Clifford on March 17, 1979 in Baton Rouge, Louisiana.

She started exotic dancing at age 17 and later moved into acting, writing and producing in the adult film industry under the name Stormy Daniels, later making a number of media appearances in Real Sex, Dirt, and Maroon 5’s music video for their song Wake Up Call.

At the behest of fans, she also launched a short-lived campaign for the United States Senate for her home state of Louisiana in 2010 but soon dropped out.

Daniels is best-known by the public for her alleged affair with Donald Trump. They reportedly met in July 2006 at a celebrity golf tournament in Lake Tahoe and had a sexual affair while Trump was married to Melania Trump. They two reportedly kept in touch afterwards, with Trump allegedly offering her a role on his TV show Celebrity Apprentice.

Houston....you have a Stormy!

A post shared by stormydaniels (@thestormydaniels) on Mar 1, 2018 at 6:38pm PST

After staying quiet about the affair for years and denying rumors about its validity in 2011, she was reportedly paid $130,000 (£91,477) in hush money by Trump’s personal lawyer, Michael Cohen, just days before the 2016 election, as Trump was locked in a tumultuous race with former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton.

News of the payoff and affair were revealed in a Wall Street Journal report on January 12, 2018. Although Daniels and Trump both initially denied the affair, Cohen later confirmed that he paid Daniels with his own money shortly before the election. Daniels soon filed a lawsuit against Trump on March 6, claiming that the private nondisclosure agreement was void since Trump never signed it. She later offered to return the money in order to speak publicly about the affair even as Trump’s lawyers insisted that she pay a $1 million (£703,660) fine per violation as part of the agreement every time she spoke publicly about it.

Daniels later conducted a much-anticipated interview on 60 Minutes on March 25, claiming that she and Trump did indeed have an affair in 2006 and that she was later threatened by someone connected to Trump after agreeing to sell her story about the alleged affair to the magazine In Touch Weekly.

How old is Stormy Daniels?

Stormy Daniels is 39 years old.

She was born on March 17, 1979.

What is Stormy Daniels’s net worth?

According to Celebrity Net Worth, Stormy Daniels’s net worth is approximately $2 million (£1.4 million).

Off to NY...in the rain! See ya tonight at Gossip in Long Island.

A post shared by stormydaniels (@thestormydaniels) on Feb 22, 2018 at 5:22am PST

How does Stormy Daniels make her money?

Daniels has made most of her money through her career in the adult entertainment industry. She began stripping at 17 years old and later started a career in the pornographic film industry, appearing in more than 180 films and producing more than 65 others. Although now retired from the adult film industry, Daniels continues to perform around the United States as an exotic dancer.

In January 2018, it was also alleged in a report by the Wall Street Journal that Daniels was paid $130,000 (£91,477) in hush money to not reveal an alleged affair with Donald Trump, who had recently married Melania Trump, that took place in 2006.

Although both Daniels and Trump initially denied the affair, she later filed a lawsuit against Trump stating that he never signed the paperwork to officially make the agreement private. The lawsuit did in fact reveal that she was paid some $130,000 (£91,477) by Trump’s lawyer, Michael Cohen. She later offered to return the hush money in March in order to speak publicly about her alleged encounters with Trump.

Who is Stormy Daniels’s husband?

Stormy Daniels’s husband is adult film producer and musician Glendon Crain. The couple have been married since 2010.

Previously, she was married to Pat Myne from 2003 to 2005 and later Mike Moz from 2007 to 2009.

DAY 68... I'm the only one left on the bus.. Rations are low, but morale is high... #cominghome

A post shared by Glendon Crain (@drummerboyglen) on Oct 7, 2017 at 9:25pm PDT

Stormy Daniels interview

On March 25, 2018, Daniels gave a highly-anticipated interview on 60 Minutes. In it, she described the alleged affair that took place between her and Donald Trump in July 2006, claiming to have had a sexual encounter with the president.

In the interview, Daniels stated that Trump said she was ‘special’ and also offered her a role on his hit TV show Celebrity Apprentice. She also stated that she ‘was never a victim’ and that her coming forward was not part of the broader #MeToo movement.

In perhaps the biggest bombshell from the interview, Daniels claimed that she was threatened in 2011 by an unknown man who told her to ‘leave Trump alone’ after she agreed to sell her story to the magazine In Touch Weekly. The man also appeared to subtly threaten Daniels after motioning to her infant daughter and stating that 'it would be a shame if something happened to her mom'. The incident left her ‘rattled’ but she declined to go to the police because she was too frightened about the ordeal.

In the explosive interview, Daniels also said that Trump told her not to worry about his wife Melania since they slept in separate rooms and that she viewed her relationship with Trump as primarily a business deal. She also said that she declined a number of ‘large paydays’ because she never wanted to ‘kiss and tell’ about the alleged affair.

Stormy Daniels and Donald Trump

According to reports, Daniels’s relationship with Donald Trump goes back to July 2006 when they met at a celebrity golf tournament in Lake Tahoe. Daniels claims that she and Trump had unprotected sex and he later promised her an appearance on Celebrity Apprentice. Daniels also claimed that Trump invited her to his office at Trump Tower in New York City and a Trump Vodka launch party event in California. She also stated that she and Trump met in 2007 about a year after their reported affair in his private bungalow in Los Angeles, to discuss the details of a possible role for her on Celebrity Apprentice.

Later, after agreeing to sell her story of the reported affair to In Touch Weekly in 2011, Daniels claimed to have been threatened by a mysterious man who was reportedly somehow linked to Trump. She subsequently denied a report on a celebrity gossip website of the alleged affair with Trump that surfaced mere months later.

On the eve of the 2016 election, Daniels was reportedly paid $130,000 (£91,477) backed by a nondisclosure agreement by Trump’s personal lawyer Michael Cohen to stay quiet about their alleged encounter, with Daniels agreeing to sign off on the arrangement out of fear for her personal safety and the safety of her family.

President Donald Trump has blasted reports of his affair with Daniels as 'so much fake news'

Later, on January 12, 2018, the Wall Street Journal broke news of the reported hush money agreement and Daniels’s alleged affair with Trump. Although Daniels and Trump both initially denied the affair, Cohen later acknowledged on February 13 that he paid Daniels hush money out of his own pocket, with Daniels’s lawyers subsequently stating that Cohen, by acknowledging the payment, was in breach of the contract and that Daniels was therefore no longer bound by it.

On March 6, Daniels filed a lawsuit against Trump claiming that he had never signed the paperwork in order to make the arrangement private, with the lawsuit revealing that she was indeed paid by Trump’s lawyer. She later offered to return the money in order to speak publicly about her affair with Trump.
item.dc:abstract: Depending on legal ramifications, Stormy Daniels’s net worth could be changing quite a bit soon. The former adult film actress, who allegedly had an affair with Donald Trump in 2006, recently opened up publicly about the affair in a 60 Minutes interview after initially denying it. The highly-anticipated interview came as Daniels found herself at the center of a legal storm regarding the alleged affair and a nondisclosure agreement involving hush money reportedly established on the eve of the 2016 election.
item.dc:creator: Rachel Quigley
item.mi:shortTitle: What is Stormy Daniels’s net worth?

item.title: Couple goals! Christina Milian and boyfriend Matt Pokora playfully flirt at a charity soccer game in Glendale
item.description: Christina Milian and Matt Pokora have been dating for roughly eight months. And the couple, who were spotted on Sunday playfully flirting at a charity soccer game in Glendale, seem to be going strong.
item.content:encoded:
Christina Milian, 36, and Matt Pokora, 32, have been dating for roughly eight months. 

And the couple, who were spotted on Sunday playfully flirting at a charity soccer game for Viva Con Agua in Glendale, seem to be going strong. 

Milian's daughter Violet, eight, and mom Carmen were also present for the afternoon outing. 

Scroll down for video 

Game on! Christina Milian and boyfriend Matt Pokora were spotted on Sunday playfully flirting at a charity soccer game for Viva Con Agua in Glendale

Opposites attract! Christina donned a white jersey while Matt ran with the brown squad

The soccer match took place at the Glendale Sports Complex—a field surrounded by mountains and drenched in sunlight. 

The game was put on to benefit the organization's commitment to providing clean drinking water globally. 

Christina donned a white jersey while Matt ran with the brown squad. 

Going strong! Milian and the French crooner have been dating for roughly eight months 

Family affair! Milian's daughter Violet, eight, and mom Carmen were also present for the afternoon outing 

The Bring It On actress looked beyond smitten on the field with her new beau and it seems that her daughter and mom are just as taken with the French crooner. 

At one point Matt was seen carrying Violet across the field.

The Voice Kids France coach does not have any children of his own.  

Say cheese: The three generations of Milian women stopped to snap a photo 

Mom-daughter love: Violet also donned a brown jersey as she spent some time kicking the ball around on Sunday at the Glendale Sports Complex 

Co-parenting: Christina shares her daughter with ex-husband and producer The Dream 

Finding the one: Over the years, Christina has been linked to slew of men including Lil Wayne, Nick Cannon, and Jamie Foxx

Pokora and the Dip It Low singer were first linked back in August when they were spotted canoodling together in Saint-Tropez.  

The actress divorced The Dream in 2011 after a two-year marriage and the exes share custody of their daughter Violet.

Over the years, Christina has been linked to slew of men including Lil Wayne, Nick Cannon, and Jamie Foxx. 

New beau: Pokora and the Dip It Low singer were first linked back in August when they were spotted canoodling together in Saint-Tropez

item.title: PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Lena Dunham cuddles up to mystery man as she moves on from Jack Antonoff... and makes stop at marijuana dispensary
item.description: The couple had their arms wrapped around each other as they headed to the marijuana dispensary MedMen. Lena couldn't have looked happier as she cosied up to her handsome new man.
item.content:encoded:
She called it quits with Jack Antonoff after five years together just months ago. 

And Lena Dunham is not looking back, as the actress was seen putting on a very cuddly display with a mystery man as they stopped by a marijuana dispensary in West Hollywood on Saturday night.

The 31-year-old actress looked completely smitten with her handsome new beau, who kissed the side of her head as she pulled him in close.   

Moving on! Lena Dunham is not looking back, as the actress was seen putting on a very cuddly display with a mystery man in West Hollywood on Saturday night

Packing on the PDA! The 31-year-old actress looked completely smitten with her handsome new beau, who kissed the side of her head as she pulled him in close

Lena couldn't have looked happier as she cosied up to her handsome new man, who held her hands as she wrapped her arms around his shoulders. 

The couple, who were seen together a month ago, looked to be in the throes of new love as they laughed and smiled while enjoying the night together, with a smitten Lena even leaning against her beau as they strolled through the street.

Lena kept it casual in a flowing jade green blouse that flashed her torso and white, flared trousers. 

Her beau also opted to put comfort first, wearing a blue T-shirt, jeans, and black trainers.

First thing's first: Lena appeared to be browsing through the products on a touch screen as her new love smiled inside the dispensary 

The look of love! Dunham and her new beau laughed and smiled as they enjoyed a night out together 

Packing on the PDA! Dunham leaned in close to her new man as he held her gently in his arms

Inside the dispensary, the friendly actress flashed a wide smile as she chatted with employees, who assisted her during her shopping experience. 

Lena appeared to be browsing through the products on a touch screen as her new love smiled. 

The visit comes as marijuana became legalized for recreational use in California this year. 

It comes just months after the actress and her boyfriend of five years, Jack, called it quits earlier this year.  

Checking out: The actress waited patiently alongside her beau as they appeared to purchase items 

It takes two! The pair couldn't have looked any happier 

New love: It comes just months after the actress and her boyfriend of five years, Jack, called it quits earlier this year 

On the go: The friendly star chatted with employees inside the dispensary 

The split was mutual, a source told E! Online.

'Jack and Lena were growing apart and it just made sense for them to end their relationship where it was,' said the source. 

'They want the best for each other no matter what. They are both moving on.' 

Jack was spotted on Saturday getting cozy with stunning blonde Carlotta Kohl as the couple took in a basketball game at Madison Square Garden in New York. 

Hitting their stride! The twosome were in sync as they strolled close together

All in a day's work: The couple stood outside the store beside a security guard

It's all good! The former Girls star looked delighted as she browsed about the shop

It was first revealed Jack was dating Carlotta in January when he was spotted dining with the model and artist at Gemma in New York's East Village.

At the time the 33-year-old insisted he was not seeing anyone in the wake of his split from Lena.  

Jack was also romantically linked to songstress Lorde - who he frequently collaborates with - but shot down the rumors with a tweet to deny that there's anything more than friendship between him and the New Zealand born beauty.

Having a chat: The pair appeared to be speaking with the security guard outside the dispensary 

Off they go: The twosome made their way out of a second shop together, with Lena leading the way 

They have chemistry! Sparks were flying as the couple caught each other up 

Taking to Twitter in January he wrote: 'Normally I would never address rumors but I resent having the most important friendships and working relationships in my life reduced to dumb hetero normative gossip,' he wrote. 'Those relationships are deeply important and sacred.'

He added: 'With that said, I'm not seeing anyone. lol.' 

This comes a month after an UsWeekly report that he ex Jack continues to be a source of support to Lena in the midst of her ongoing health issues.

Cuddle session: Dunham nestled against her beau as he leaned against a pole 

Close: The couple were attached at the hip during the fun night out 

In stitches: Lena giggled as she gazed lovingly at her beau, who placed his face into his palm 

'Lena and Jack are in a great place, not in a romantic way. Jack has been really supportive,' a source told the magazine.

The insider added: 'They aren’t hanging out or talking every day but he’s being supportive and they’re in constant communication and being friendly with each other.'

The Bleachers frontman publicly expressed his well wishes for the Girls creator after she recently revealed she had undergone a total hysterectomy to deal with her serious endometriosis.

Inseparable: Lena did not shy away from cuddling close to her other new other half 

Matters of the heart: The loved-up couple were previously seen together in New York City a month ago 

New flame: It was first revealed Jack was dating Carlotta Kohl in January when he was spotted dining with the model and artist at Gemma in New York's East Village (pictured March 2018 in NYC)

And Lena Dunham is not looking back, as the actress was seen putting on a very cuddly display with a mystery man as they stopped by a marijuana dispensary in West Hollywood on Saturday night. The 31-year-old actress looked completely smitten with her handsome new beau, who kissed the side of her head as she pulled him in close.

item.title: Joanna Krupa confirms engagement to boyfriend Douglas Nunes as she showcases diamond encrusted ring... two months after trying it on in Poland
item.description: She was previously spotted out trying on engagement rings during a recent trip to Poland and now Joanna Krupa has confirmed her engagement to Douglas Nunes.
item.content:encoded:
Joanna Krupa has confirmed her whirlwind engaged to businessman Douglas Nunes after sharing an image of a huge diamond encrusted ring on Instagram.

The Polish-born model and actress, 38 posted a picture of herself wearing the sparkler on her wedding finger while holding hands with Nunes, the President and partner of property development and entertainment company 451 Media Group.

Confirming the news to MailOnline, a spokesperson said: 'Yes they are engaged - that's all for now.' 

What a sparkler! Joanna Krupa confirmed her engagement to boyfriend Douglas Nunes as she posed sporting a huge diamond ring on Sunday

She captioned the image: 'Just another weekend in the Krupa-Nunes household.' 

The caption revealed her fiancé is the hitherto unknown Nunes, who she also tagged in the photo, and comes less than a year after she finalised her divorce from Romain Zago in August 2017.

Also featured in the snap are three adorable dogs, who didn't seem to be as excited about the news as Joanna's fans while slumbering on her bed. 

 Happy lady: Joanna was previously seen trying on the ring during a trip to Poland in January 

One fan commented: 'Congratulations!! Wishing you many years of love and happiness.'

While another added: 'Oh my gosh!!! Congratulations you deserve nothing but happiness.'

One commenter was happy that Joanna had found happiness again, posting: 'Congrats you deserve the best I’m happy you found Love again and I wish you the best today and always, your ring is stunning just like you.'

Engaged! The Polish-born supermodel posted another picture of herself wearing the sparkler on her wedding finger while holding hands with her rumoured boyfriend

Another added: 'So happy for you! You deserve all the love in the world!!' 

Last October, Joanna hinted that she was single when she spoke to US Weekly and admitted she was focusing on her work.

She said at the time: ‘Honestly, right now I’m trying to focus on work. I just feel like men in Hollywood are looking for a trophy wife.  

In the past: She finalised her divorce from Romain Zago in August, after four years of marriage (Pictured together in 2015)

'It’s really hard to get to know somebody. If prince charming comes along, great, but I just feel like it’s really tough in LA.’  

Despite the emotional process, Joanna proved there was no ill will between the couple, telling DailyMail.com: 'We’re on great terms and I’m very grateful Romain is supporting me right now. We are on great terms, we talk more than ever. 

'We’re best friends and not much has changed. I’m very grateful to have Romain’s support and we respect our ten years together.' 

Not so single? Last October, Joanna hinted that she was single when she spoke to US Weekly and admitted she was focusing on her work

Joanna, who has also been linked with restaurateur Nico Santucci, appeared to be in high spirits as she tried on engagement rings during a trip to Poland in January.

A source close to Joanna told MailOnline: 'Joanna and Nico are strictly friends. Joanna is in a relationship but at this stage they want to keep things private.

'Joanna is not engaged to a film producer but she will say she is super happy but not ready to make it official yet.'
item.dc:abstract: Joanna Krupa has confirmed her whirlwind engaged to businessman Douglas Nunes after sharing an image of a huge diamond encrusted ring on Instagram. The Polish-born model and actress, 38 posted a picture of herself wearing the sparkler on her wedding finger while holding hands with Nunes, the President and partner of property development and entertainment company 451 Media Group. Confirming the news to MailOnline, a spokesperson said: 'Yes they are engaged - that's all for now.'

item.title: 'I would go home and cry': Loose Women's Saira Khan recalls 'miserable' experience of struggling to conceive a child before opting to undergo IVF
item.description: Speaking on Monday's instalment of ITV's Loose Women, the 47-year-old said: 'I was 34 when we started to try and it wasn’t happening. It got to the stage I saw babies everywhere.'
item.content:encoded:
She's the proud mother two children - nine-year-old son Zac, who she conceived through IVF, and seven-year-old adopted daughter Amara.

And Saira Khan has opened up about her struggles to conceive when she first started trying for a child more than 13 years ago, admitting that she was often left her in floods of tears after watching other women with their offspring.

Speaking on Monday's instalment of ITV's Loose Women, the 47-year-old, married to  Steve Hyde, said: 'I was 34 when we started to try and it wasn’t happening. Steve and I couldn’t conceive. It got to the stage I saw babies everywhere.

Scroll down for video 

Struggles: Saira opened up about her struggle to conceive on Monday's instalment of Loose Women, admitting that the experience left her 'miserable'

I didn’t want to be miserable and I couldn’t help it. I was miserable, you have to say. I would go home and cry. One Christmas, we started getting photos of babies. I was so devastated. I couldn’t be around peoples families. It was so hard.'

Saira's candid chat with her fellow Loose Women panellists came about after it was reported that Declan Donnelly and his wife Ali Astall - who have just confirmed they're expecting their first child - struggled to conceive.

Back in 2016, Derbyshire native Saira opened up about adopting her daughter from Pakistan, revealing that failed IVF and the British adoption system pushed her and her husband towards making the big decision. 

The TV personality now has nine-year-old son Zac, who she conceived through IVF, and seven-year-old adopted daughter Amara with her husband Steve Hyde. Pictured in 2011

We are family: Over the years, Saira has shared several snaps of her family on social media

The erstwhile Apprentice contestant and her 51-year-old husband decided to adopt Amara after visiting an orphanage in Karachi, where she'd been abandoned in her temporary home's doorway by her biological parents who have never been traced. 

The family, who live in Oxford, decided to add to their brood after conceiving their first child Zac, now nine, through IVF.

Saira suffers with endometriosis and had to undergo fertility treatment to get pregnant with her son. 

Road to motherhood: TV personality Saira adopted Amara as a young baby in Pakistan. Pictured with Muslim cleric Abdul Sattar Edhi in 2011

When a second attempt failed, the couple began the lengthy adoption process in the UK before turning to adoption abroad. 

After bringing Amara home, Saira told New Day: ‘Being a parent is being a parent. We adopted overseas because we were advised there needed to be a two-year gap between Zac and the child we were going to adopt.

'We were told it wouldn’t be possible to get a child in the time frame we were looking at in Britain so we went to Pakistan.'

Process: Saira and her husband had to wait three months until they could bring Amara from Karachi to live with them in the UK, so that she could be issued with travel documents

Orphanage: Saira and Steve have been honest with Amara about her Pakistani heritage. The youngster was abandoned by her birth mother at the doors of the orphanage

The businesswoman travelled to the Edhi Foundation Orphanage in Karachi, a trip that was covered by the BBC in a documentary called Adopting Abroad: Saira’s Story.

Baby Amara, weighing just 5lb, was desperately ill, said Saira, with her skin 'flaking off like a snake's' but says the bond was instant. 

Amara was dehydrated and in intensive care for a week but made a full recovery.

She said: 'She looked at me with these big brown eyes and there was such life and intensity in them that I knew I had to look after her, no matter what the ­outcome.' 

Against the odds: The erstwhile Apprentice contestant revealed that her daughter was dehydrated and in intensive care for a week when she first met her
item.dc:abstract: She's the proud mother two children - nine-year-old son Zac, who she conceived through IVF, and seven-year-old adopted daughter Amara. And Saira Khan has opened up about her struggles to conceive when she first started trying for a child more than 13 years ago, admitting that she was often left her in floods of tears after watching other women with their offspring. Speaking on Monday's instalment of ITV's Loose Women, the 47-year-old, married to Steve Hyde, said: 'I was 34 when we started to try and it wasn’t happening. Steve and I couldn’t conceive. It got to the stage I saw babies everywhere.
item.dc:creator: Smith Ryan
item.mi:shortTitle: Loose Women's Saira Khan recalls 'miserable' struggle to conceive

item.title: 'You sound awful!': Bella Thorne was 'devastated' when her boyfriend said he 'hated' her song
item.description: The 20-year-old singer-and-actress learned never to date someone who wouldn't 'motivate or encourage' her after having her music trashed by a guy she was romantically involved with.
item.content:encoded:
Bella Thorne was devastated when her boyfriend told her he 'hated' one of her songs.

The 20-year-old singer-and-actress learned never to date someone who wouldn't 'motivate or encourage' her after having her music trashed by a guy she was romantically involved with, because his cruel comments left her feeling 'like s**t'. 

She recalled: 'If you're dating someone that's not going to motivate you or encourage you, don't date them. 

'I dated somebody and sent him a song that I recorded and he was like, "This is honestly not very good at all. I'm sorry. I kind of hate this song. You sound awful."

'You sound awful!': Bella Thorne was 'devastated' when her boyfriend said he 'hated' her song; she is seen in 2012 performing as a singer 

'I was like, 'That feels like s**t. That hurts on the inside, man.

'It's the worst thing when you're dating somebody who is just like, "You're s**t."'

The Midnight Sun actress - who is now dating rapper Mod Sun - recalled her first crush was on a guy she used to do modelling assignments with.

She told Us Weekly magazine: 'There was this boy that I worked with a bunch in modelling. I kept working with this boy and I thought he was so cute at the time.'

Moved on: The Midnight Sun actress is now dating rapper Mod Sun, who she said was much more supportive than his unnamed ex; they are seen last week

Bella recently admitted her current relationship has changed her outlook on life because Mod Sun is such a positive person.

She said: 'Meeting someone that's just so happy, you know that's kind of his whole thing, and for me [as] someone who's a little bit glass half empty, it really is nice for me to have someone on my back that's like, 'No, it's good, it's good, it's good,' even when it's bad.

'You're always your harshest critic.

'[But now] when I see me going toward the negative I'm like, "Bella, go toward the positive."'

Learnt her lesson: Bella says she now seeks out more positive people; she is seen in 2012
item.dc:abstract: Bella Thorne was devastated when her boyfriend told her he 'hated' one of her songs. The 20-year-old singer-and-actress learned never to date someone who wouldn't 'motivate or encourage' her after having her music trashed by a guy she was romantically involved with, because his cruel comments left her feeling 'like s**t'. She recalled: 'If you're dating someone that's not going to motivate you or encourage you, don't date them. You should straight up just be out of the relationship right then and there.

item.title: 'I don't have a body that can sit on a stool in a ladylike way': Mindy Kaling talks her post-baby figure... three months after welcoming daughter
item.description: Mindy Kaling welcomed a baby last year. And she still does not feel comfortable with her figure even though she seems to have lost the baby weight fast.
item.content:encoded:
Mindy Kaling welcomed a baby in December.

And she still does not feel comfortable with her figure even though the Ocean's Eight star seems to have lost the baby weight fast.

On Monday the 38-year-old Wrinkle In Time star shared a post to Instagram where she said she was having trouble sitting on a stool.

No holding back: Mindy Kaling got real on Instagram on Monday and explained that she doesn't always feel comfortable in her own body

While filming at an undisclosed restaurant location, the 38-year-old wrote: 'I'm ready to admit that I don't have a body that can sit on a stool in a comfortable or ladylike way.

'Also: I would rather drown than have you see me hoist myself out of a swimming pool,' she added.

But she ended the photo caption on a more positive note, setting the record straight that she's being interviewed for something fun. 

The actress did not reveal who she was being interviewed by nor for what, but she did hint that it would be released soon.

1,2,3 Action: The mother of one posed in a stool in a black mid-length dress in a restaurant setting

Mindy wore a form-fitting Roland Mouret dress while filming the unknown project, and was photographed with no shoes on. 

She managed to get her full glam on with some berry-colored lipstick and her signature soft waves fully in tact. 

The Wrinkle in Time star welcomed her first child, a baby girl named Katherine, in December. 

Quite the comedian: The Mindy Project creator made a point to goof around with the camera crew while on set

Cheers!: Following the filming, she enjoyed a drink at NYC's Hot Tin Roof at The Dutch

The new mom plays the role of the Shakespeare-quoting Mrs. Who in the Disney sci-fi film which hit theaters earlier this month. 

While visiting Good Morning America in early March, Mindy explained that the sci-fi novels growing up as 'a little shy, chubby, book-reading kid.'

 'I had such a great imagination, but largely science fiction books ignore you if you are, you know, an Indian girl,' she added. 

A dream come true: Mindy explained how she never saw girls like her portrayed in sci-fi films when she was a child

item.title: Wonder in white! Star Jones stuns in sleeveless silk wedding gown as she poses with Tina Knowles after tying the knot on cruise ship
item.description: The 56-year-old television personality looked stunning in a silk wedding dress as she married Ricardo Lugo while sailing in The Bahamas on the Royal Caribbean's Anthem Of The Seas.
item.content:encoded:
Star Jones shined on her special day.

The 56-year-old television personality looked stunning in a silk wedding dress as she married Ricardo Lugo while sailing in The Bahamas on the Royal Caribbean's Anthem Of The Seas.

Star's beautiful wedding gown can be seen in all its glory in a cute Instagram snap posted by Beyonce's mom Tina Knowles on Monday morning.

The American television personality looked lovely in a sleeveless white silk mermaid dress featuring a scarf-like detailing around the neck.

Stunning: Star Jones looked fantastic in a silk white sleeveless mermaid wedding dress as she posed with husband Ricardo Lugo in this snap posted by Beyonce's mom Tina Knowles Monday

She paired the dress with a blinged out headband with matching earrings.

The shiny headwear was worn over her raven-colored tresses as she accentuated her natural looks with complimentary make-up topped off with shiny lip.

Tina, 64, also wore white including a lacy sheer long-sleeve over a matching jumpsuit. 

Ricardo kept up with the motif with a white blazer over a matching dress shirt, shiny tie, and contrasted it all with black trousers.

Seafaring nuptials: Jones, 56, tied the knot with fiance Ricardo Lugo on board a Royal Caribbean cruise ship in The Bahamas on Sunday. She posted this snap to her Instagram

It was quite the weekend for the couple as Star not only celebrated her 56th birthday on Saturday on board a cruise ship; she also got hitched Sunday.

Star exchanged vows with fiance Lugo in front of family and friends as they set sail on the Atlantic Ocean. 

Star shared several snaps to her Instagram, first of her lavish birthday party on Saturday, then her on board bachelorette party along with her pet pooch Pinky Michelle Jones.

Celebrating: The former panelist on The View also shared snaps of her bachelorette party posing with her beloved dog Pinky Michelle Jones and a glass of champagne

She also added a shot of herself and her new husband silhouetted against the sunset sky.

She wrote in the caption:  'Yesterday was my birthday...and today is our wedding day at sea! Our #AnthemToLove has officially begun on the #AnthemOfTheSeas!'

The couple, who've been dating for several years, got engaged last summer. 

Blowing out candles: She also posted to Instagram a montage of photos taken at her 56th birthday party on Saturday, also on board the ship

Lugo is an assistant state attorney who works for State Attorney Kim Foxx in Illinois, according to the Chicago Tribune. 

Guests at the nuptials included Beyonce's mom Tina Knowles-Lawson who shared a snap of some of the female guests to Instagram with the caption: 'With all my beautiful fly girls on the seas❤️ here to celebrate the love and Union of Star Jones and Ricardo.'

Star was previously married from 2004 to 2008 to Al Reynolds, a former investment banker. 

'Fly girls': Guests at the nuptials included Beyonce's mom Tina Knowles-Lawson who shared this snap of some of the female guests

Husband number 2: Ricardo, pictured with Star in New York this past October, is an attorney

The TV personality is best known for her stint on ABC's The View where she was one of the original panelists alongside Barbara Walters and Whoopi Goldberg.

She appeared on the daytime show from 1997 to 2006.

In 2011 she was cast in the fourth installment of The Celebrity Apprentice, placing fifth in the reality competition.

In November 2017, her ex-husband Reynolds came out as bisexual. 

The first husband: Star wed Al Reynolds, an investment banker, in 2004. They divorced in 2008. They're pictured at Diddy's Real White Party in The Hamptons in 2007

item.title: Shock twist! MAFS' Davina Rankin reveals the REAL reason she called Tracey Jewel 'crazy' during THAT argument about her 'affair' with Dean Wells
item.description: She encountered an almighty showdown with co-star Tracey Jewel over her affair with Dean Wells. But Davina Rankin has insisted she had a valid reason for branding her MAFS co-star 'crazy'.
item.content:encoded:
She encountered an almighty final showdown with Married At First Sight co-star Tracey Jewel over her 'affair' with Dean Wells.

But Davina Rankin has insisted she had a valid reason for branding her co-star 'crazy' during the tiff and even says the ladies are 'fine' with each other now the dust has settled.

Talking to A Current Affair on Monday, the 26-year-old said: 'Tracey actually called me after she left Dean at the aisle of the last ceremony, and we're actually fine.'

Scroll down for video 

The truth: MAFS' Davina Rankin has revealed the REAL reason she branded Tracey Jewel 'crazy' during THAT argument about her affair with Dean Wells

Davina went on to explain that she and Tracey, 35, had in fact discussed the issues off-camera and put the whole thing to bed - which is why she felt blindsided by the sudden outburst at the group dinner.

This confusion led to Davina branding Tracey 'crazy' after she launched into a tirade.

In the same interview, Davina burst into tears while explaining how the public backlash to her actions affected her parents.

Having been accused of failing to show 'empathy' or 'remorse' after starting an affair behind her 'husband' Ryan Gallagher's back [with Dean], the aspiring bikini model sobbed as she admitted she felt 'so helpless' when her mother and father became upset over the online abuse directed at her.

'She's crazy!' Davina slammed Tracey during a heated confrontation about Tracey's ex Dean Wells on MAFS

Reasoning: Davina went on to explain that she and Tracey [pictured] had in fact discussed the issues off-camera and put the whole thing to bed - which is why she felt blindsided by the sudden outburst at the group dinner

Emotional: Davina proved he's not heartless as she broke down crying while explaining how the public backlash to her actions affected her parents

'My mum and dad were ropeable. Absolutely ropeable,' Davina said. 'I just felt really bad for them because's it's all on the internet. 

'And bless them, but they know nothing about the internet. They just want to get on there and say 'F**k you Susan, don't call my daughter a bitch!'.' 

'I just have to be like, 'Mum, Dad, you need to not comment, that's not how this works. If you comment, people are going to start attacking you.'

Not impressed? She also called her former love rival Tracey Jewel's new romance with Sean Thomsen 'f**king weird' 

Wiping away tears, the personal trainer added shakily: 'And so it was really hard watching them feel so helpless.' 

The Instagram model was branded a 'homewrecker' by MAFS fans after she began a secret relationship with 'alpha male' Dean Wells behind Ryan's back.

Davina also angered viewers when she refused to properly apologise to Dean's TV 'wife' Tracey Jewel for her actions, instead suggesting: 'What? I thought your boyfriend was hot... But he didn't want to be with you.'

Overwhelmed: The aspiring bikini model, 26, sobbed as she admitted she felt 'so helpless' when her mother and father became upset over the online abuse directed at her

Sad: 'My mum and dad were ropeable. Absolutely ropeable,' Davina said during an appearance on A Current Affair on Monday (pictured with her father Bob) 

Helpless' She became choked up and stopped, before continuing: 'I just felt really bad for them because's it's all on the internet'. Pictured with her mother Barb

Discussing the backlash, she said: 'Yeah, words still have litte weight. 'Screw the haters' - it's easy to say, you know, or 'Yeah, whatever,'. But they're pretty serious threats.

'It doesn't matter who you are, it's not nice to think that people hate you that much.'

Davina then took aim at her former love rival Tracey Jewel's new romance with MAFS star Sean Thomsen, branding it 'f**king weird'.

'I just find it so f**king weird. Like, I don't understand it,' she fumed.

'You don't understand compatible people?' asked reporter Alison Piotrowski.

Davina elaborated: 'Because they don't seem like were such a good match. Sean is so different to Dean.' 

Hmm: Davina then took aim at her former love rival Tracey Jewel's new romance with MAFS star Sean Thomsen, branding it 'f**king weird'

Sceptical: Rankin continued: 'I just don't understand it. Sean is so different to Dean'

Rankin also touched on her explosive showdown with Tracey at the reunion, claiming she was 'confused' by her anger as the pair had talked after the vow renewal ceremony. 

'Tracey actually called me as soon as she left Dean the aisle in the last ceremony, and that kind of stuff at so we had been fine,' she claimed.

'I was caught off guard. And that's why at the reunion because it's just like, and almost just sassy, like we haven't spoken. 

'I was confused. I was like 'I can't believe we're pretending'.'

Controversy!  Davina was criticised for being unkind to 'husband' Ryan Gallagher, and soon after received backlash for beginning a secret 'relationship' with co-star Dean Wells, who was 'married' to Tracey Jewel
item.dc:abstract: Talking to A Current Affair on Monday, the 26-year-old said: 'Tracey actually called me after she left Dean at the aisle of the last ceremony, and we’re actually fine.'

item.title: Plenty to Kroes about! Model Doutzen showcases her natural beauty as she sports chic tan coat for new L'Oreal shoot in Paris
item.description: The catwalk queen, 33, proved to maintain her impressive modelling talent as she filmed an upcoming L'Oreal commercial in Paris' Broken Arm Cafe on Monday afternoon.
item.content:encoded:
She's made a name for herself as one of the world's leading fashion models.

And Doutzen Kroes proved to maintain her impressive talent as she filmed an upcoming L'Oreal commercial in Paris' Broken Arm Cafe on Monday afternoon.

The catwalk queen, 33, cut a sophisticated figure during the shoot, as she donned a chic suede mac coat, teamed with a comfy pair of trainers.

All eyes on her: Doutzen Kroes proved to maintain her impressive modelling talent as she filmed an upcoming L'Oreal commercial in Paris' Broken Arm Cafe on Monday afternoon

As she headed to the set, the Dutch star covered herself in a cobalt blue towel to wrap up against the French city's chilly climes.

The mother-of-two flaunted her naturally striking beauty for the shoot, adding a pop of colour to her look with a slash of dark purple lipstick.

In order to reveal her radiant appearance, Doutzen's hair was styled into a slick ponytail.

Working it! The catwalk queen, 33, cut a sophisticated figure during the shoot, as she donned a chic suede mac coat, teamed with a comfy pair of trainers

On her way: As she headed to the set, the Dutch star covered herself in a cobalt blue towel to wrap up against the French city's chilly climes 

While working her magic on set, the L'Oréal Paris ambassador struck a series of poses, which included taking a selfie on a mobile phone, as well as blowing a kiss for the cameras.  

The fitness enthusiast was joined by models Duckie Thot, Luma Grothe and Alexina Graham. 

Doutzen hung up her prestigious Victoria's Secret wings back in 2015 to focus on her family. 

In an interview with Vogue UK in 2016, the leggy star shared the details of her career move: 'Victoria’s Secret gave me a lot, but I had to move on and do different things.' 

Stunning: The mother-of-two flaunted her naturally striking features for the shoot as she styled into a slick ponytail - giving the floor to her radiant beauty

Working her angles:  The L'Oréal Paris ambassador struck a series of poses, which included taking a selfie on a mobile phone, as well as blowing a kiss for the cameras

Speaking on her bond with her catwalk pals, she gushed: 'Adriana (Lima), Candice (Swanepoel), Karlie (Kloss), Joan (Smalls) – I don’t want to leave anyone out! We built amazing relationships.' 

'What’s so great is that there is always someone in the world that I know. Every fashion country I go to, there is someone there that I can spend time with.'  

The blonde beauty unveiled the secret behind her sensational appearance in a recent discussion with Pop Sugar.

'Balance is my secret. I simply take the time to recharge. Healthy food, sport and wellbeing have always been fundamental in my life. They are my motto.'

Star-studded: The fitness enthusiast was joined by models Duckie Thot, Luma Grothe and Alexina Graham

Auburn beauty: Alexina accentuated her slender frame in a ribbed burgundy jumper and a striped skater skirt, embellished with a dipped hem
