item.title: PICTURED - The other side of Paradise: Extraordinary photos reveal the small Fijian village of Namatakula just a 20-second drive from the luxury Mango Bay resort where Bachelor stars sip cocktails and enjoy casual hook-ups
item.description: For the singletons looking for love on Bachelor In Paradise, life at the four-star Mango Bay Resort in Fiji is all about sun, sand and hook-ups.
item.content:encoded:
For the singletons looking for love on Bachelor In Paradise, life at the four-star Mango Bay Resort in Fiji is all about sun, sand and hook-ups.

But if the D-list celebrities were to take a 20-second drive down the street, they would be confronted with an altogether different scene. 

The village of Namatakula is home to approximately 2,500 people, who lead far more humble lives than their Australian visitors.

How the other half lives: For the singletons looking for love on Bachelor In Paradise, life at the four-star Mango Bay Resort in Fiji is all about sun, sand and hook-ups

Different worlds: But if the D-list celebrities were to take a 20-second drive down the street, they would be confronted with an altogether different scene

Photos taken by Daily Mail Australia show streets lined with tin-roofed shacks and children earning extra money selling food.

While it's possible the producers employed villagers and supported local businesses, it is unlikely Bachelor viewers will ever see the other side of Paradise on-screen.

Instead, they will be treated to their twice-a-week dose of drama, dates, and romantic betrayals.

Close proximity: The village is located just a stone's throw from the glamorous reality TV set 

Local residents: The village of Namatakula, home to about 2,500 people, lead far more humble lives than their Australian visitors

Just visiting: Bachelor In Paradise stars are shown enjoying cocktails at the resort bar

Life in Namatakula: Photos show streets lined with tin-roofed shacks and children appearing to selling food to earn extra money

Community: While it's possible the producers employed villagers and supported local businesses, it is unlikely Bachelor viewers will ever see the other side of Paradise on-screen

Four-star destination: Bachelor In Paradise contestants Michael Turnbull (left) and Davey Lloyd (right) are pictured in the luxury Mango Bay Resort

Villagers: A boy is pictured sitting on a 'Hot Food' stand in Namatakula

In a statement to Daily Mail Australia on Tuesday, a rep from Warner Brothers said they received 'blessings' from local Chiefs to film the show.

'Before filming we engaged the two local village Chiefs, obtaining blessings to film on their land,' they said.

'In consultation with the Chiefs, we engaged villagers to work in various departments, employing 55 local Fijians full time.

The statement continued: 'During our ten week stay in Fiji, we utilised the services of over 50 Fijian companies and were in constant communication with each village on how we could assist each other.

'In addition to this, we supported the local villages by providing building materials, fabrics, homewares and stationary for the children.'

Bachelor In Paradise brings together previous contestants from The Bachelor and Bachelorette for a second chance at love.

The males and females alternate between positions of power: one week, it will be the boys handing out roses, the next week it will be the girls. 

Trade: A villager is pictured preparing food outdoors under a tin-roofed structure

Outdoor scenes: A rubbish-strewn beach in Namatakula is shown

Pristine: Mango Bay Resort looks positively picturesque in this aerial photograph

Inside look: Photographers who flew to Fiji to document Bachelor In Paradise's filming also captured striking images of Namatakula

Repeat performance: The Mango Bay Resort was also used for the filming of The Bachelorette finale last year

There is an uneven number of male and female contestants, which means if you are left empty-handed at a Rose Ceremony, you are sent home. 

One path to success on Bachelor In Paradise is to 'couple up' early in the series, meaning you will always have someone to give you a rose at the Rose Ceremonies.

However, this gameplan can be disrupted by 'intruders' who are thrown into the mix later on to shake things up. 

Return: The producers decided to return to Fiji to film Bachelor In Paradise

Exotic: The Mango Bay Resort is a four-star holiday destination, according to travel websites

Close: A sign for the Mango Bay Resort in Namatakula is pictured

 Picture series: Photographers captured the daily lives of the residents of Namatakula

Villagers are pictured below a sign reading '2017 Fiji Population and Housing Census'

Idyllic: The lush surroundings of the resort are featured prominently in Bachelor In Paradise
item.dc:abstract: For the singletons looking for love on Bachelor In Paradise, life at the four-star Mango Bay Resort in Fiji is all about sun, sand and hook-ups. But if the D-list celebrities were to take a 20-second drive down the street, they would be confronted with an altogether different scene. The village of Namatakula is home to approximately 2,500 people, who lead far more humble lives than their Australian visitors.
item.dc:creator: Joe Scrimshire
item.mi:shortTitle: PICTURED: The village next to Bachelor In Paradise's luxury resort

item.title: Coronation Street's Lucy Fallon flaunts her washboard abs in a flirty pink bikini in St Lucia
item.description: Coronation Street star Lucy Fallon, 22, enjoyed some time away from the famous Cobbles as she soaked up the sun in Saint Lucia on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She's no stranger to sharing her enviable holiday snaps on Instagram. 

And Coronation Street star Lucy Fallon enjoyed some time away from the famous Cobbles as she soaked up the sun in Saint Lucia on Monday. 

The 22-year-old soap star flaunted her sensational figure in her tiny florescent pink bikini, putting her saucy floral thigh tattoo on full display.

Beach babe: Lucy Fallon flaunted her washboard abs and floral leg tattoo in a flirty pink two-piece as she enjoyed a tropical getaway in St Lucia on Monday

Lucy showcased her washboard abs in the striking two piece, while the vibrant pink colour complemented her sun-kissed tan to perfection.

Lounging back in the beach side hot tub, the actress - who plays Bethany Platt in the Weatherfield soap - shielded her eyes in a pair of ultra-chic wide rimmed sunglasses. 

Lucy appeared right at home as she relaxed in the water, letting her golden tresses fall by her shoulder in beachy waves. 

The small-screen siren kept it fresh-faced with minimal make-up while her manicure matched the shocking pink colour of her bikini.

Soaking up the sun: It's not the first time Lucy has paraded her incredible beach body on the Caribbean island, and previously shared a tantalizing swimsuit shot from the tropical climes

Making light of the unusually grey day behind her, Lucy captioned the saucy snap: 'Gloooooomy as hell day in st loosh... I promise the water was actually bright blue!'

It's not the first time Lucy has paraded her incredible beach body on the Caribbean island, and previously shared a tantalizing swimsuit shot from the tropical climes in October. 

Baring her intricate body ink once again, Lucy opted for a bright yellow and black swimsuit while she sat perched on a sea swing. 

St Lucia love: Lucy often spends time on the Caribbean island, sending enviable snaps from her regular getaways

While not in either beach snap, Lucy is currently smitten with boyfriend Tom Leech, and the pair appear to be infatuated with each other in the numerous loved-up pictures shared on Lucy's Instagram.

The starlet has been with her beau for two years and the loved-up couple live together.

In January Lucy won a National Television Award for her performance in the popular soap. 

Well deserved break: In January Lucy won a National Television Award for her performance in the popular soap

The starlet's boyfriend works as a salesman, and the pair appear to be infatuated with each other in the snaps shared on Lucy's Instagram.

She has admitted she has found 'The One' in her handsome beau and confessed they have already started thinking about marriage.

Lucy is clearly overjoyed with her beau as she previously told OK! magazine: 'I know we’ll get married and have babies together.' 

Happy couple: The starlet's boyfriend works as a salesman, and the pair appear to be infatuated with each other in the snaps shared on Lucy's Instagram

Lucy has not been subtle with her hints, as Tom told the magazine: 'She keeps sending me pictures of rings that she likes!'

The pair started dating two years ago, and confirmed they had moved in together with a sweet Instagram snap of their new keys in March 2017.

After taking their romance to the next step, Tom admitted to the magazine that he had always known Lucy was the woman for him, after witnessing her bubbly behavior during their first meeting. 

Loved up: The pair started dating two years ago, and confirmed they had moved in together with a sweet Instagram snap of their new keys in March 2017

And Coronation Street star Lucy Fallon enjoyed some time away from the famous Cobbles as she soaked up the sun in Saint Lucia on Monday. The 22-year-old soap star flaunted her sensational figure in her tiny florescent pink bikini, putting her saucy floral thigh tattoo on full display.

item.title: Tom Arnold calls ex-wife Roseanne Barr a 'Trump-loving troll' in a review of ABC's Roseanne reboot...after being fired from the original show in 1994
item.description: Tom Arnold and Roseanne Barr were married for four years before he was fired from the ABC sitcom in 1994. He wrote a review of her rebooted Roseanne show for The Hollywood Reporter.
item.content:encoded:
Tom Arnold and Roseanne Barr were married for four years before he was fired from the ABC sitcom in 1994. 

On Monday, The Hollywood Reporter released a review by the 59-year-old actor which critiqued the Roseanne reboot that airs on March 27. 

Arnold, who started as an audience 'warm-up guy,' was a writer, producer, and actor on Roseanne for more than five years.  

Op-ed: On Monday, The Hollywood Reporter released a review by the Tom Arnold which critiqued the Roseanne reboot that airs on March 27. Arnold and Roseanne were married for four years before he was fired from the ABC sitcom in 1994; seen in 1989

The reboot: Roseanne with her co-stars on the new series with John Goodman

He began by saying: 'When THR asked me to review the new Roseanne reboot, I promised objectivity. But, of course, I'd been the audience warm-up guy for the Roseanne pilot in 1988 and worked my way up on the show from writer to producer. 

'In fact, by the time Roseanne fired me in 1994 — destroying the trophy case in my office, canceling my credit cards and promising I'd never work in show business again — I'd been executive producing and playing Arnie for a few years.

'So you can see why these delightful memories would make it hard not to be prejudiced.'

Mixed reviews: According to Twitter comments, the show's ratings may very well suffer from the Trump supporter's conservative views

He then added: 'The world is different now than when Roseanne and I went to Bill Clinton’s inauguration in 1992, and a lot has changed since the show went off the air in 1997. 

'When I read on Twitter that there was going to be a Roseanne reboot, I was happy for Roseanne and the other actors, but I also knew the new show's success would rest on one thing: Who will Roseanne Conner be in 2018? Because today's Roseanne Barr is more polarizing than ever.

'No longer a feminist-pacifist voice for the working folks, she's now a far-right Trump-loving troll who's gone hard against liberals and Hillary supporters and even #MeToo women. 

Back at it: Roseanne has been rebooted for nine episodes; here is the writers room in 2018

'Roseanne Barr knew Donald Trump personally for 30 years and saw how he treated women,' he explained. 'She even did business with him. I'm not surprised by anything Trump does, but Roseanne made $200 million off Roseanne Conner, so I'm a little disappointed she doesn't have her back'; a scene from the reboot

'That is not the Roseanne Barr I knew, but that's OK so long as that's not the Roseanne Conner she brings back to TV.'

He then wrote: 'Then I read on the internet that Roseanne Conner was going to be a far-right Trump lover.

'I also read that the show would now be more about Sara Gilbert’s character, Darlene, and that Roseanne’s role wouldn’t be that big of a deal. 

'Neither change sounded that good to me, but then I remembered it's the internet, and that's where you hear all sorts of crazy stuff, like the president paying hush money to porn stars. 

In his THR review, the actor talked candidly about his termination from their marriage and the hit-TV show. 'Roseanne fired me in 1994—destroying the trophy case in my office, canceling my credit cards and promising I'd never work in show business again,' he explained

'So I accepted THR’s assignment and watched the first episode, “Twenty Years to Life,” and I discovered this: Dan is alive. Even though John Goodman's character suffered what everyone assumed was a fatal heart attack in the 1997 series finale, he and Roseanne haven't skipped a beat.'

Arnold then said it all seemed too much like the Nineties and noted Laurie Metcalfe was a 'tour de force.'   

Up the ladder: Arnold, who started as an audience 'warm-up guy,' was a writer, producer, and actor on Roseanne for more than five years. Seen in 1992

He also compliments Roseanne on her timing.

But he cautions viewers that if they want to watch a show 'because it's the voice of your political point of view, right or left,' do not watch the Roseanne reboot. 

'You'll be disappointed,' he added.

'But if you're a fan of the original Roseanne, especially the glory years — you know, the "Tom Arnold years" — this is as good as it's going to get,' he said.

He then got personal: 'Roseanne has done everything from pulling my hair transplants immediately after surgery to saying I had a 3-inch penis on SNL, so I figure if I can give the show another shot, maybe other people could too. Also, there’s Laurie F***ing Metcalf. I can face all kinds of past pain and humiliation with a smile on my face because I know Laurie Metcalf walks this earth.'

And then he ended with a big dig at his ex: 'I can also forgive Roseanne Conner voting for Trump in 2016. I bet if you're a Midwest housewife, he might've come across on TV like he really had your back. But Roseanne Barr knew Donald Trump personally for 30 years and saw how he treated women. She even did business with him. I'm not surprised by anything Trump does, but Roseanne Barr made $200 million off Roseanne Conner, so I'm a little disappointed she doesn't have her back.'

'If you're a fan of the original, especially the glory years — you know, the "Tom Arnold years" — this is as good as it's going to get,' he said as his review conclusion. Seen in 1991
item.dc:abstract: Tom Arnold and Roseanne Barr were married for four years before he was fired from the ABC sitcom in 1994. On Monday, The Hollywood Reporter released a review by the 59-year-old actor which critiqued the Roseanne reboot that airs on March 27.
item.dc:creator: Heidi Parker
item.mi:shortTitle: Tom Arnold reviews Roseanne reboot after being fired in 1994

item.title: 'I need to figure out what the purpose is': Anna Faris reveals she isn't sure if she still believes in marriage after Chris Pratt split
item.description: Anna Faris isn't sure whether she still believes in marriage. The 41-year-old actress has already tied the knot two times, to actors Ben Indra and Chris Pratt.
item.content:encoded:
Anna Faris isn't sure whether she still believes in marriage.

The 41-year-old actress has already tied the knot two times, to actors Ben Indra and Chris Pratt, and she's admitted she isn't certain if she still believes in the institution.

Anna has son Jack, five, with her estranged husband Chris.

No wedding bells?: Actress Anna Faris, pictured hand-in-hand with boyfriend Michael Barret admitted that she's unsure if she still believes in marriage

 She is currently dating cinematographer Michael Barrett.

'I need to figure out what the purpose is,' Faris, 41, said on Monday's episode of Dax Shepard's Armchair Expert podcast.

'Is it safety for your children? Is it convention? Is it so other people respect your relationship more?' she questioned.

Happier times: The 'Scary Movie' actress and ex-husband Chris Pratt have a 5-year-old son together, Jack.

'For me, I'm just not quite sure where it fits, especially when it feels so easy to get married, and then the untangling — when the state gets involved,' the actress added.

'There is the importance of how other people then treat you as a married man than as a man with a girlfriend,' she conceded of marriage.

'I do think it is important how other people respect a relationship… I'm not saying it's a good reason, but it is a small benefit of having that label of being married.'

Young and in love: The 41-year-old actress and her first husband, Ben Indra, seemed smitten in 2006

 'I am a romantic. I believe in a partnership, I believe in companionship. I just don't know if I believe in a ceremony of a wedding.'

Faris was married to Indra from 2004 to 2007. Anna and Chris, 38, were together from 2009 to August last year. 

The House Bunny star has been seeing her current boyfriend, Michael, since October of last year.

Mommy duties: Anna cradled her son Jack, 5, who she has from her second marriage to ex-husband Chris Pratt
item.dc:abstract: Anna Faris isn't sure whether she still believes in marriage. The 41-year-old actress has already tied the knot two times, to actors Ben Indra and Chris Pratt, and she's admitted she isn't certain if she still believes in the institution. Anna has son Jack, five, with her estranged husband Chris.

item.title: Ryan Knight KILLS uncle DS Geoff Thorpe in dramatic standoff... just moments after confessing to the murder of wife Amy Barnes on Hollyoaks
item.description: Ryan Knight found himself in a challenging dilemma in Monday's edition of the E4 series as DS Thorpe confronted the widower over the killing.
item.content:encoded:
He has managed to conceal the murder of his late wife Amy Barnes for months.

But Ryan Knight found himself in a challenging dilemma in Monday's edition of the E4 series as DS Thorpe confronted the widower over the killing, which led the police officer to attempt to convince his nephew to hand himself in.

As their heated exchange continued, Ryan - who is played by Blue's Duncan James - subsequently murdered his uncle (James Bradshaw) with the precious necklace he received from his boyfriend Ste Hay (Kieron Richardson).

Murderer: Ryan Knight found himself in a challenging dilemma in Monday's edition of the E4 series as DS Thorpe confronted the widower over the killing

Kyle Kelly (Adam Rickitt) informed Thorpe of his steamy liaison with his former flame Ryan, which took place the night Amy was murdered - ripping Ryan's alibi into shreds.

This confession led Thorpe to examine the evidence about her the former student's tragic murder.

After eagerly looking for a loop hole, the detective sergeant found Amy’s phone and called her father Mike for more information.

Dramatic: As their heated exchange continued, Ryan - who is played by Blue's Duncan James - subsequently murdered his uncle (James Bradshaw)

Thorpe headed to The Lomaxes to confront Ryan about his affair with Kyle, before eventually taking the plunge to ask him about a voicemail on Amy's phone.

The troubled character not only admitted to his passionate night with Kyle, but also confessed to murdering his former wife.

Suggesting that he should hand himself in, Thorpe appeared devastated as he discovered the tragic news. 

Unfortunate: Suggesting that he should hand himself in, Thorpe appeared devastated as he discovered the tragic news

As Ryan told his beau that he needs some time alone, Ste presented him with a sweet necklace. 

Ryan called Thorpe in a panic, telling the officer to meet him to at Hollyoaks High building site. 

In a bid for justice, DS encouraged Ryan to go to the police station - which eventually led the murderer to worry about whether Thorpe would confess the truth.

In the dramatic standoff, Ryan punched his uncle before murdering him with the same necklace Ste gifted him.  

Scared: In a bid for justice, DS encouraged Ryan to go to the police station - which eventually led the murderer to worry about whether Thorpe would confess the truth

Found by Glenn Donovan (Bob Cryer), Ryan cried for help as he was seen with his dead uncle.

This tragic murder comes after Ryan smothered Amy as she discovered he was having a gay affair with Kyle Kelly. 

After several red herrings Ryan was finally revealed as Amy's killer back in October, after fans were made to think it was Harry Thompson, only for a flashback episode to reveal she was still alive after he pushed her into a glass table. 

What has he just done? Found by Glenn Donovan (Bob Cryer), Ryan cried for help as he was seen with his dead uncle

As their heated exchange continued, Ryan - who is played by Blue's Duncan James - subsequently murdered his uncle with the precious necklace he received from his boyfriend Ste Hay.

item.title: 'I have amazing Karma!': Paris Hilton shares her relief after recovering $2M engagement ring she LOST at Miami nightclub
item.description: The incident took place early on Friday at RC Cola Plant at Mana Wynwood, a Miami nightclub that spans nearly 50,000 sq. feet.
item.content:encoded:
Paris Hilton is breathing a $2 million sigh of relief.

The 37-year-old socialite revealed via social media that she had lost her 20-carat engagement ring her boyfriend Chris Zylka proposed to her with earlier this year, but the actor later found it.

'I have amazing Karma!' the Stars Are Blind singer tweeted Monday, before explaining the course of events that led to the seven-figure fiasco.

Scroll below for video 

Lovebirds: Paris Hilton, 37, and fiance Chris Zylka, 32, were snapped in Miami on Saturday after she briefly lost her $2 million engagement ring, which was later found in an ice bucket 

'The ring was just so heavy and big that while I was dancing it literally flew off my finger into an ice bucket a couple of tables over,' Hilton explained. 'Thank God by some miracle my fiancé found it before someone else did and most likely would not have returned it.'

The 5ft8 fashionista added, 'I am so lucky!'

The incident took place early on Friday at RC Cola Plant at Mana Wynwood, a Miami nightclub that spans nearly 50,000 sq. feet. After Paris realized the jewelry was missing, Zylka led the charge of security guards combing through the club's VIP section.

'Paris was dancing with her hands in the air, and the next minute her giant ring had flown off,' an insider told Page Six. 'She was really panicked as the venue was packed and very dark, it was the early hours of the morning and it was crazy in there.'

Exuberant: Paris was thrilled as she took to Twitter Monday to explain what had happened 

Bling! The multi-million dollar ring was designed by Los Angeles jeweler Michael Greene 

The eyewitness told the outlet that 'security started an exhaustive search of the VIP area with torches, led by Chris and with the help of other patrons' and that 'there was a frantic scramble with everyone looking for it, people were crawling on the floor, under tables, under other people’s feet, and under seats.'

Eventually, the ring was located in the aforementioned ice bucket.

The eyewitness told the outlet that 'it was amazing that they managed to even see that huge diamond in an ice bucket,' and that 'Paris cried with relief when it was safely back on her finger.'

Zylka, a 32-year-old model/actor who's been seen on The Leftovers and The Amazing Spider-Man, had the multi-million dollar ring designed by Los Angeles jeweler Michael Greene, basing it off of a design of a ring Paris was partial to from the collection of her mother, Kathy Hilton.

'The ring was so gorgeous and sparkling,' the Nothing in This World songstress told People earlier this year. 'I was shaking as I put it on. It is the most beautiful ring that I have ever seen!'
item.dc:abstract: Paris Hilton is breathing a $2 million sigh of relief. The 37-year-old socialite revealed via social media that she had lost her 20-carat engagement ring her boyfriend Chris Zylka proposed to her with earlier this year, but the actor later found it. 'I have amazing Karma!' the Stars Are Blind singer tweeted Monday, before explaining the course of events that led to the seven-figure fiasco.

item.title: 'This b**** just bit Beyonce!' Tiffany Haddish reveals what really happened on the night she met the Queen Bee
item.description: After Tiffany Haddish dished on partying with Beyonce, she got called out by the pop icon.
item.content:encoded:
After Tiffany Haddish dished on partying with Beyonce, she got called out by the pop icon.

But far from silencing the Girl's Trip star, the mention on DJ Khaled's new song Top Off seems to have done the opposite.

The irrepressible 38-year-old opened up further about her night with Beyonce in a new GQ interview - revealing that a drugged up actress actually bit Queen Bee on the night in question.

'This b**** just bit Beyonce!' Tiffany Hadish reveals what really happened on the night she met the Queen Bee in a new interview with GQ

Tiffany explained: 'There was this actress there that's just, like, doing the mostest. She bit Beyonce in the face.'

As might be imagined, Beyonce wasn't happy about this. 

Continued Tiffany: 'So Beyonce stormed away, went up to Jay-Z, and was like, "Jay! Come here! This b****..." and snatched him. They went to the back of the room. I was like, "What just happened?" And Beyoncé's friend walked up and was like, "Can you believe this b**** just bit Beyonce?"'

Tiffany says that the mystery actress then crossed her path - telling her to stop dancing, despite the gathering being an afterparty at one of Jay Z's gigs.

Warning! Tiffany Haddish was previously called out by Beyonce in new song Top Off after the comedian spilled party drama; the two are seen in a selfie that night

In DJ Khaled's new song Top Off, Queen Bey seemed to address her interaction with Haddish when she rapped, 'If they’re tryna party with the queen, they gon' have to sign a non-disclosure'; she is pictured with Jay Z at the bash

Tiffany then approached Beyonce, who she had only met for the first time that evening. 

She said she told her: 'I'm going to beat somebody ass at your party. I just want to let you know that.' 

Beyonce told her not to, and said of the actress: 'That b**** is on drugs. She not even drunk. The b**** is on drugs. She not like that all the time. Just chill.'

The interview updates a previous mention Tiffany gave in an interview about the superstar, in which she went into less detail. 

In response in DJ Khaled's new song Top Off, Queen Bey said the actresses name and rapped, 'If they’re tryna party with the queen, they gon' have to sign a non-disclosure.' 

Opening up: Tiffany's interview appears in the new edition of GQ, out now

In her first interview Tiffany said she had witnessed the singer act possessively when the unidentified actress placed her hand on Jay Z's chest.

But the Girls Trip star doesn't seem to be too worried that she has burned the friendship bridge with her idol. 

'Everything she said rang so real to me,' she said in a tweet after the song was released. 'Just know I will sign an NDA any day for Beyoncé. But also know this I will fight for Beyoncé. I love that woman she is a gift from God,'
item.dc:abstract: After Tiffany Haddish dished on partying with Beyonce, she got called out by the pop icon. But far from silencing the Girl's Trip star, the mention on DJ Khaled's new song Top Off seems to have done the opposite. item.title: Makeup-free Dua Lipa keeps her head down as she leaves a dentist office in Australia... nearly two weeks after getting her wisdom teeth pulled
item.description: Singer Dua Lipa, 22, was spotted leaving a dentist's office in Bondi, Australia on Sunday afternoon looking comfortable and relaxed.
item.content:encoded:
Dua Lipa was spotted leaving a dentist's office in Bondi, Australia on Sunday afternoon looking comfortable.

The singer wore a green button-down top styled as a crop top, khaki army pants and a pair of colorful 'dad' sneakers—a huge trend among stars at the moment.

The 22-year-old New Rules hit-maker recently revealed she underwent a wisdom teeth removal that had caused her to cancel scheduled performances.

Healing just fine: Singer Dua Lipa was spotted leaving a dentist's office in Australia on Sunday afternoon

The singer had been down under for the month of March as the opening act for the Australian and New Zealand leg of Bruno Mars' 24K Magic World Tour. 

On March 14 she announced on Twitter that she had to cancel some of her shows due to emergency oral surgery and awful pain in her wisdom teeth. 

She dropped out of two Brisbane shows that were originally scheduled for March 14 and 15. 

Back on the road: The singer wears army pants and the dad sneaker trend while checking up on her healing teeth

'Im so sorry to have to cancel some of my support shows with @brunomars. I’ve been performing with an awful pain due to my wisdom teeth and as advised by my dentist and oral surgeon I have had to have them imminently removed," she tweeted. 

'I have been enjoying this tour so much and i’m so upset that life has gotten in the way but hopefully i’ll have a speedy recovery and make it back as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding xx,' she added. 

Dua quickly reemerged and performed in Melbourne the following Monday post-surgery, despite being in the early stages of recovery. 

Global success: Her hit single New Rules continues to break records despite being released last summer

Her biggest single to date, New Rules, just garnered over 1.1 billion views on YouTube over the weekend. 

It is the seventh video released in 2017 to achieve this record of success on the video streaming network. 

She will be among the list of performers at some of this summer's biggest music festivals including Bonnaroo, Lollapalooza and Panorama NYC. 

Looking good: The brunette beauty was wearing red when she hit Jimmy Kimmel in this performance that aired on Valentine's Day
item.dc:abstract: She seems to be healing just fine and getting back to her day-to-day activities. Dua Lipa was spotted leaving a dentist's office in Bondi, Australia on Sunday afternoon looking comfortable and relaxed. She wore a green button-down top styled as a crop top, khaki army pants and a pair of colorful 'dad' sneakers—a huge trend among stars at the moment. The 22-year-old 'New Rules' hit-maker recently revealed she underwent a wisdom teeth removal that had caused her to cancel scheduled performances.
item.dc:creator: Heidi Parker
item.mi:shortTitle: Dua Lipa emerges at a dentist office after canceling performances

item.title: Twice as nice! Rosie Huntington-Whiteley turns heads in leopard print and bold tartan as she rocks two bold looks in NYC
item.description: The supermodel, 30, used the street as her very own runway as she stepped out in two stylish outfits in New York City on Sunday and Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She's one of the world's top-earning catwalk queens.

And Rosie Huntington-Whiteley used the street as her very own runway as she stepped out in two stylish outfits in New York City on Sunday and Monday.

The supermodel, 30, turned heads in bold leopard print, before switching things up in a kooky cobalt blue oversized blazer the following day.   

Twice as nice: Rosie Huntington-Whiteley used the street as her very own runway as she stepped out in two stylish outfits in New York City on Sunday and Monday 

On Sunday, the former Victoria's Secret model teamed her fur coat with a chic black and gold buckled belt tied around the waist.

Rosie completed her ensemble with blue jeans, a pair of black heeled ankle boots and vintage-looking cat eye sunglasses. 

The Mad Max actress appeared to be on an important looking phone call as she made her way across the city with her hand tucked in her pocket, showing off her impressive diamond engagement ring from actor fiance Jason Statham, 50.

On Monday, the mother-of-one chose a completely different style as she showed off her enviable frame in a structured blue tartan blazer with a white ribbed top.

Wild thing: On Sunday, the former Victoria's Secret model, 30, teamed her fur coat with a chic black and gold buckled belt tied around the waist 

Bling: Rosie completed her ensemble with blue jeans, a pair of black heeled ankle boots and vintage-looking cat eye sunglasses

New York state of mind: Rosie sent her fans wild after she shared a stunning selfie of her animal print outfit to her 7.7 million Instagram followers

Kicking off her week in style, Rosie completed her businesslike look with navy blue silk tapered trousers.

The beauty styled her blonde tresses into a sleek pulled back do, while she completed the ensemble with a pair of black heeled sock boots.

Rosie, who welcomed her first child Jack Oscar Statham in June, showed signs of a hectic schedule as she carried two handbags with her - one as a side bum bag while the other a much larger bucket shaped tote.

Model business: On Monday, the mother-of-one chose a completely different style as she showed off her enviable frame in a structured blue tartan blazer with a white ribbed top

Checkmate: Kicking off her week in style, Rosie completed her businesslike look with navy blue silk tapered trousers

Rosie has shown no sign of slowing down since welcoming baby Jack and landed in fifth place on Forbes' annual list of the world's best-paid supermodels in November - with earnings of a staggering $9.5 million in just 12 months.

The supermodel attended Paris Fashion Week in February, and was spotted on the front row of several high-profile catwalk shows earlier this year.

 Rosie welcomed her first child, a son called Jack, with her fiancé Jason in June 2017.

The Marks & Spencer lingerie model has been dating the action star for almost eight years.

The pair are yet to tie the knot, despite announcing their engagement in January 2016.

Chic: The beauty styled her blonde tresses into a sleek pulled back do, while she completed the ensemble with a pair of black heeled sock boots 

Busy: The Mad Max actress appeared to be taking an important looking phone call as she made her way across New York City
item.dc:abstract: She's one of the world's top-earning catwalk queens. And Rosie Huntington-Whiteley used the street as her very own runway as she stepped out in two stylish outfits in New York City on Sunday and Monday. The supermodel, 30, turned heads in bold leopard print, before switching things up in a kooky cobalt blue oversized blazer the following day.
item.dc:creator: Louise Saunders
item.mi:shortTitle: Rosie Huntington-Whiteley debuts two very different looks in NYC

item.title: Look no hands! Kourtney Kardashian shares video of toyboy Younes Bendjima steering SUV with his legs on Easter road trip
item.description: Kourtney shared video to Instagram Monday showing Younes with his arms folded and looking at her as the vehicle whizzes along the highway. 'Keeping me safe.'
item.content:encoded:
Kourtney Kardashian and her younger lover Younes Bendjima have headed off on a road trip for spring break.

The reality star and mom-of-three, 38, didn't seem fazed, however, when the 24-year-old Algerian model decided to drive their SUV with his knees instead of his hands.

Kourtney shared video to Instagram Monday showing Younes with his arms folded and looking at her as the vehicle whizzes along the highway.

And as he sits in the driver's seat with his shoe-less feet up on the dash, the Keeping Up With The Kardashian's star added the caption: 'Keeping me safe.'

Scroll down for video 

Road trip: Kourtney Kardashian shared Instagram video Monday showing her toyboy Younes Bendjima sitting with his hands off the wheel while driving their SUV on the highway

'Keeping me safe': Mother-of-three Kourtne, 38, seemed unfazed by the 24-year-old Algerian model's laid back attitude as he placed his shoe-less feet on the dash

The pair look to be taking time away from Kourtney's Calabasas home as the video also showed images of a silver Airstream trailer.

It's not known where they are heading.

The couple, who started dating in December 2016 after meeting in Paris, unfollowed each other on Instagram earlier this month sparking rumors of a split.

But the romance seems to be going stronger than ever. 

Getaway: The couple, who started dating in December 2016 after meeting in Paris, are headed off on a spring break road trip together

Road trip: The video also showed a silver Airstream trailer under the blue California sky

Snacking: On Sunday, Kourtney had shared a picture of herself in a racy black ensemble eating pizza

Not to be outdone by his ex, Scott Disick, 34, also left town Monday with his teen girlfriend Sofia Richie. 

Sofia, 19, shared a snap to Instagram showing them hugging on the steps of a private jet with the pilot in the cockpit. 

She also shared a photo of her new mottled Dachshund puppy gifted to her by Scott along with the caption: 'First time flyer.'

The two have been an item since May last year. 

They'r eoff: Not to be outdone by his ex, Scott Disick, 34, also left town Monday with his teen girlfriend Sofia Richie. Sofia, 19, shared a snap to Instagram showing them hugging on the steps of a private jet with the pilot in the cockpit

She also shared a photo of her new mottled Dachshund puppy gifted to her by Scott along with the caption: 'First time flyer'

Scott and Kourtney share three young children together - Mason, eight, Penelope, five, and Reign, three.

The kids have been introduced to their parents' new partners.

The reality TV exes split in July 2015 after Kourtney grew tired of Scott's partying and cheating.

They had been together since 2006.

Exes: Scott and Kourtney, who split in July 2015, share three young children together - Mason, eight, Penelope, five, and Reign, three.  They're pictured in Las Vegas in May 2015

item.title: 'I still want a relationship with her!' Desperate Stephen Belafonte exhibits his 'A' tattoo in dedication to ex Mel B's daughter Angel, 10 ... as he continues to pursue step-parent visitation rights
item.description: Stephen Belafonte, 42, has spoken lovingly about his step-daughter Angel, 10, as he continues to pursue visitation rights with her and has also showed off an 'A' tattoo in dedication to her.
item.content:encoded:
Stephen Belafonte has spoken lovingly about his step-daughter Angel, 10, as he continues to pursue visitation rights with her.

The producer, 42 - who finalised his divorce from Mel B in December - despairingly admitted to TMZ that while he didn't want to be 'disrespectful' of anyone, he was still fighting to see the youngster 'through the courts' - following reports that her biological dad Eddie Murphy is 'not interested in seeing her.'

To further prove his point Stephen showed cameras an 'A' tattoo on his wrist in dedication to Angel and admitted that he wanted the same relationship with her as he did while he was in a marriage with the former Spice Girl. 

'I'm fighting to see her!' Stephen Belafonte, 42, has spoken about his step-daughter Angel, 10, as he continues to pursue visitation rights with her and has also showed off an 'A' tattoo in dedication to her

Stephen and Mel divorced in December after a bitter, seven-month battle in which lurid tales of kinky sex, drug and alcohol abuse and allegations of domestic violence made headlines. 

And while Belafonte was granted joint custody of their six-year-old daughter Madison, he is now hoping for step-parent visitation rights with step-daughter Angel. 

On Monday, Stephen truly detailed his love for Angel as he showed off the letter tattoo: 'You see this A? This is for Angel', before going on to address his legal battle to see her.

'I'm going to do it through the courts. I don't want to be disrespectful to anyone but I'm fighting to see my daughter. 

Determined: The producer - who finalised his divorce from Mel B in December - despairingly admitted to TMZ that while he didn't want to be 'disrespectful' of anyone, he was still fighting to see the youngster 'through the courts' 

Dad role: He admitted that he wanted the same relationship with Angel (pictured together in happier times in 2009) as he did while he was in a marriage with the former Spice Girl

'I don't get money to see my daughter. There is no upside. I actually spend money to see my daughter... my stepdaughter, I guess. It's a touchy subject.'

He also addressed Eddie Murphy's reportedly strained relationship with Angel.   

'I don't know that relationship. I was with my wife for ten years. I have nothing against Eddie or anyone else. I still want to have that relationship I had for ten years.'

This comes after reports of Eddie ‘not being interested’ in seeing his 10-year-old daughter Angel, according to a Los Angeles court.

Meanwhile, Stephen - who helped raise Angel during his 10-year marriage to Mel - is trying to persuade a judge to grant him step-parent visitation with the child, whom, he says, ‘has called me dad since she started to talk.’

Mel is vehemently opposing his efforts, refusing to let him see her daughter.

Not in the picture: This comes following reports that Angel's biological dad Eddie Murphy is 'not interested in seeing her'

'It's a touchy subject': Stephen - who helped raise Angel during his 10-year marriage to Mel - is trying to persuade a judge to grant him step-parent visitation with the child, whom, he says, ‘has called me dad since she started to talk’

But Belafonte’s lawyer, Grace Jamra, said that she had been trying to reach Murphy, Angel’s biological dad, to discuss Belafonte’s step-parent request but to no avail.   

Jamra said she was told by his lawyers that Murphy is simply ‘not interested.’

‘Mr Murphy has had no contact with the child,’ she told the court.

Jamra added that she had tried to serve Murphy with legal papers, but ‘Mr. Murphy is avoiding service.’

As part of their divorce settlement, Mel - real name Melanie Brown - and Belafonte were to split the proceeds of their former marital home in LA, worth an estimated $6-7 million.

He was given joint-custody of his daughter with Mel, six-year-old Madison, and he went back to court to try to win step-parent rights to visit Angel.

Speaking of Angel (Far L), Stephen continued: 'I don't get money to see my daughter. There is no upside. I actually spend money to see my daughter... my stepdaughter, I guess. It's a touchy subject'

Bitter: Stephen and Mel divorced in December after a bitter, seven-month battle in which tales of kinky sex, drug and alcohol abuse and allegations of domestic violence made headlines

But Mel has consistently blocked his efforts to spend time with Angel, calling him in court papers a ‘bad man’ and accusing him of being violent and abusive during their 10-year marriage.  

The couple’s marriage fell apart in March last year when Brown filed for divorce, citing irreconcilable differences, and she took out a domestic violence restraining order against Belafonte, accusing him of years of abuse against her, embezzling $10 million of her money and keeping her drugged during much of their marriage.

She also took out a civil harassment restraining order against the couple’s beautiful blonde nanny Lorraine Gilles whom she branded a ‘home wrecker’ and ‘prostitute’ she claimed had an affair with Belafonte and conspired with him against her by threatening to release embarrassing sex videos of Mel.

Explosive: The couple’s marriage fell apart in March last year when Brown filed for divorce, citing irreconcilable differences, and she took out a domestic violence restraining order against Belafonte

Dramatic: Belafonte who accused his estranged wife of being addicted to cocaine and alcohol during their marriage repeatedly denied Mel's charges

Over the following seven months intimate details were revealed about the couple’s sex life during their marriage, including three-ways with German-born Gilles who claimed to have had a seven-year sexual relationship with the British singer.

Belafonte who accused his estranged wife of being addicted to cocaine and alcohol during their marriage - and Gilles, 26 - repeatedly denied Mel's charges against them and fought the restraining orders through 20-plus court hearings till, at last, the case was set to go to trial in November 2017. 

It was halted at the last minute after the former couple came to a private settlement.

The divorce became final last December 15 with Mel agreeing to pay Belafonte $15,000 a month in spousal support until December 2020. 

Settlement: The divorce became final last December 15 with Mel agreeing to pay Belafonte $15,000 a month in spousal support until December 2020

The producer, 42 - who finalised his divorce from Mel B in December - despairingly admitted to TMZ that while he didn't want to be 'disrespectful' of anyone, he was still fighting to see the youngster 'through the courts' - following reports that her biological dad Eddie Murphy is 'not interested in seeing her.' To further prove his point Stephen showed cameras an 'A' tattoo on his wrist in dedication to Angel and admitted that he wanted the same relationship with her as he did while he was in a marriage with the former Spice Girl.

item.title: Katie Price shares an awkward kiss with Chris Hughes after his split from Olivia Attwood... as mother-of-five is supported by husband Kieran Hayler at charity football match
item.description: The former glamour model, 39, appeared to mend broken ties with Chris Hughes as they shared a friendly kiss during the Sellebrity Soccer match in Cheltenham on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
The pair were involved in a heated disagreement last year following reports of a flirty message exchange.

But Katie Price and Chris Hughes appeared to mend broken ties as they shared a potentially awkward kiss during the Sellebrity Soccer match at the LCI Rail Stadium in Cheltenham on Sunday afternoon. 

The former glamour model, 39, was joined by her children Jett, four, and Princess Tiaamii, 10, as the trio received support from the TV personality's estranged husband Kieran Hayler.

Pals again? Katie Price appeared to mend broken ties with Chris Hughes as they shared a friendly kiss during the Sellebrity Soccer match in Cheltenham on Sunday

The entrepreneur beamed with joy as she put on a friendly display with the reality star, 25.

Despite clad in a low-key football jersey, the mother-of-five looked typically glamorous as she teamed her look with a pair of thigh-high boots and form-fitting leggings.

The brunette accessorised with a pair of chic oversized sunglasses and wore a sophisticated Russian hat. 

 Doting mother: The former glamour model, 39, put on a typically glamorous display as she was joined by her children Jett, four, and Princess Tiaamii, 10

In February, Katie revealed her delight after Chris' on/off girlfriend Olivia Attwood confirmed the long-standing rumours surrounding a series of messages with Chris last year. Chris and Katie first met after he appeared on Loose Women in August 2017.

A representative for Katie told Mirror: 'She is delighted the truth is out. As Katie always says: "The truth always comes out in the end - she doesn't lie"'. 

Her comment came after Olivia, who met Chris on ITV2 series Love Island, admitted to OK! Magazine that she'd been left reeling after she initially refused to believe he had sent Katie 52 messages over Snapchat - despite Katie's infamous insistence.  

On good terms: The entrepreneur beamed with joy as she put on a friendly display with the reality star

'I chose to stand by him at that time. I had known him for two months, how am I to know what he was doing?' she told the publication. 'All I know is that whether he did or he didn't, he didn't sleep with her, it was just a couple of messages.'

Olivia admitted to feeling betrayed following the furore, which occurred two months into their romance, and angry that he didn't give her the same respect that she gave him.

'Yes, I do feel like I stood by him through a lot of things which weren't great and that I probably shouldn't have let slide, but I did. When I have slipped up and done something a bit stupid he's jumped on it and like: 'It's unacceptable'. 

Sophisticated: Despite clad in a low-key football jersey, the mother-of-five looked typically glamorous as she teamed her look with a pair of thigh-high boots and form-fitting leggings

'So I was angry about that. To have him post on Instagram straight away: 'Everybody let's you down'. I was like are you having a laugh? Have you been here for the past six months?'  MailOnline have contacted Katie and Chris Hughes' reps for comment. 

Olivia shocked fans earlier this month after it was announced that she had split from her reality star beau following six months together, with their emotional parting captured on camera for their TV series Chris and Olivia: Crackin' On.

However, the couple seemed to be back on good terms as they were spotted together for the first time since their split at the Cheltenham festival last week.

Back on? Chris and his on/off girlfriend Olivia Attwood, 26, seemed to be back on good terms as they were spotted together for the first time since their split at the Cheltenham festival last week

Katie has gone through her own romance woes, as she and husband Kieran Hayler decided to part ways after Katie discovered in August last year that Kieran, 30, was having a year-long affair with the nanny. 

However, the pair have kept fans guessing over their relationship status - with speculation over Kieran and Katie getting back together. 

Earlier this month, Kieran shared a MailOnline story on his Instagram story last week, which documented his day out at Cheltenham with Katie circling the headline in which he was referred to as her ex. 

On-trend: The brunette accessorised with a pair of chic oversized sunglasses and wore a sophisticated Russian hat

He wrote the word: 'Hilarious' implying that he is in fact not her ex. His post came as Katie insisted that she will divorce the love rat, who has cheated on his wife before, with two of her best friends. 

The Sunday People claims Katie is ready to officially end their marriage 'amicably' and has been in touch with divorce lawyers.

A source said: 'She has had it with Kieran and wants to move on. It’s pretty sad because she really tried, they both did. But at the end of it all she can’t get over all the lies.'

Supportive: Katie's estranged husband Kieran Hayler was also in attendance at the charity football match

Caring: The former stripper was spotted with their child Jett, as well as Junior, 12, and Princess Tiaamii, who Katie shares with former husband Peter Andre

Coy? The Celebrity Big Brother star seemed to hide her plump pout with a scarf as she headed to the venue

It's not the first time Kieran has given the impression that things are back on between them, despite Katie's rep stating it's not the case. The couple live together so that they can share the childcare and get along as friends. 

Katie and Kieran share two children together; son Jett, four and daughter Bunny, three. Katie is also mum to Harvey, 15, from her previous relationship with Dwight Yorke.

She is also mother to Junior, 12, and daughter Princess, 10, with ex husband Peter Andre, 45. A source told MailOnline in January that Kieran was keen to reconcile with Katie and shared a gushing social media post in a bid to show his devotion.

He took to Instagram stories, where he shared a snap of Katie posing against a wall in her glamorous gown ahead of the NTAs, writing: 'Stunning.' 

But a source said at the time: 'The feelings are all one-sided. Katie still feels like the relationship is over - but obviously she doesn't have a nanny now so Kieran lives with her and he takes care of the children.

'Katie has a lot on her plate right now with her mother being ill, so that and her children are her main focus.' 

Cheers! A source told MailOnline in January that Kieran was keen to reconcile with Katie and shared a gushing social media post in a bid to show his devotion (pictured March 15)

The Loose Women star flew to Brussels earlier this month to undergo a facelift, after claiming a surgeon 'f**ked up' her face last autumn. 

Following her surgery earlier this month, the TV star told MailOnline: 'I instantly feel better after [Dr] Frank [Plovier] treated me. He is the only surgeon I've trusted over the years and the only one I wanted to correct the work.

'I am so happy with Frank's work, he really has restored my confidence. He is very loyal and an incredible surgeon!' 

Showing off her results: The Loose Women star flew to Brussels earlier this month to undergo a facelift, after claiming a surgeon 'f**ked up' her face last autumn

Making her entrance! The Atomic Kitten star - who recently shed a whopping two stone - hid her impressively toned figure under an oversized football top as she held onto her daughter Heidi's hand

Passionate: The Whole Again hitmaker gave viewers a lively performance shortly before the match

The soccer event - which was held to raise money for The British Heart Foundation - saw a legion of celebrities, including fitness enthusiast Kerry Katona, Love Island's Jess Shears, and TV personality James 'Arg' Argent.

The Atomic Kitten star - who recently shed a whopping two stone - hid her impressively toned figure under an oversized football top as she held onto her daughter Heidi's hand. 

The Whole Again hitmaker accentuated her stunning features with heavy strokes of make-up, and wore her tresses in effortless waves. 

Smitten: Love Island's Jess Shears and Dom Lever posed arm-in-arm as they were spotted at the event

Good sports: TOWIE's James 'Arg' Argent (left) and actor Jake Wood (right) beamed with pride as they took part in the active game 

Happy team: The soccer event - which was held to raise money for charity - saw a legion of celebrities, including EastEnders' Jake Wood, Dan Osborne and Jamie Reed

During the action-packed game, Katie and Arg were spotted engaging in conversation as they observed the match.

Viewers saw lively performances from the TOWIE star, Kieran, MC Harvey and Calum Best.

The former So Solid Crew rapper proceeded to remove his shirt as his team took home the winning trophy.

Cheering on! During the action-packed game, Katie and Arg were spotted engaging in conversation as they observed the match

Trying his best: Viewers saw lively performances from the TOWIE star, Kieran, MC Harvey and Calum Best

Battling it out! Chris showcased his competitive side as he attempted to tackle against Kieran

Having a ball! Kieran and MC Harvey shared a sweet hug as they took part in the live action

The champs! The former So Solid Crew rapper went topless as his team took home the winning trophy

The former glamour model, 39, was joined by her children Jett, four, and Princess Tiaamii, 10, as the trio received support from the TV personality's estranged husband Kieran Hayler.

item.title: She's ripped! Anne Hathaway demonstrates her strength while lifting weights in Einstein tank top and sporty leggings at the gym
item.description: The Oceans Eight star, 35, gave it her all while lifting weights during a strenuous workout at her local West Hollywood gym.
item.content:encoded:
Anne Hathaway made it clear that she has brains, brawn and beauty while getting her sweat on this Monday.

The Oceans Eight star, 35, gave it her all while lifting weights during a strenuous workout at her local West Hollywood gym.  

There, the Academy Award winning actress acknowledged her intellectual side with black Albert Einstein tank but kept things sporty with Adidas sneakers while pumping iron and displaying her toned arms at the exercise establishment.

Stronger than she looks! Anne Hathaway gave it her all while lifting weights at her local West Hollywood gym Monday, where she teamed an Albert Einstein tank top with sporty layers

Anne — who is an alum of both Vassar College and New York University — was ready for whatever as she laid back on the bench wearing basic black athletic-wear.

The Brokeback Mountain actress kept her dark tresses out of her face with the aid of a black Nike ballcap. 

A muscular male trainer egged the starlet on while she gave 100% to her workout.

After lifting, the Princess Diaries darling cooled down with a bit of stretching.

Her cheerleader! The Brokeback Mountain actress kept her dark tresses out of her face with the aid of a black Nike ballcap while a muscular male trainer kept her focused as she bench-pressed

Lean into it! After lifting, the Princess Diaries darling cooled down with a bit of stretching

The Les Miserables actress bent her body at the waist and reached to the ground to ease her arms and legs.

After getting in a rigorous workout, the star got picked up by hubby Adam Shulman.

The American Dream actor gave Anne a smooch before hopping into the passenger seat of their white SUV and driving off with his love.

It looked like the couple's two-year-old son Jonathan Rosebanks Shulman stayed at home during the quick trip to the gym. 

Getting the gal! After getting in a rigorous workout, the star got picked up by hubby Adam Shulman, who kissed his wife of five years before hopping into the passenger seat

Missing one? It looked like the couple's two-year-old son Jonathan Rosebanks Shulman stayed at home during the quick trip to the gym. The duo are seen at the 2015 Met Gala above

The Hollywood star is gearing up for her next big film release, Ocean's Eight, which is the female-centered spin-off of the Ocean's Trilogy directed by Gary Ross.

Sandra Bullock, Cate Blanchett, Mindy Kaling, Rihanna, Helena Bonham Carter, Sarah Paulson, Awkwafina, Damian Lewis and Richard Armitage are among the cast.

Anne excitedly shared a photo of the movie's poster late last year with a caption that read: 'Boom #Oceans8 in theatres June 2018.'

Oceans Eight is set to steal the hearts of movie-goers upon its June 8 2018 release. 

Coming soon! The Hollywood star is gearing up for her next big film release, Ocean's Eight, which is the female-centered spin-off of the Ocean's Trilogy and is set for release June 8 2018

item.title: 'It started as a joke, but it worked!' Alicia Vikander reveals she threw a dinner party on SKYPE
item.description: With friends spread all over the world, get togethers can be few and far between.
item.content:encoded:
With friends spread all over the world, get togethers can be few and far between.

But Alicia Vikander found the ultimate solution, when she hosted a dinner party on Skype.

'One time, I had a Skype dinner party with my friends,' she explained. 'We decided to each buy a drink, cook something for ourselves, then sit down at a table and Skype each other.

'It started as a joke, but it actually worked. We had such a good time, we wanted to go out afterwards but, of course, we were in different parts of the world. It was a great night anyway.'

'I spend hours!' Alicia Vikander reveals her secret to the perfect dinner party... a good table plan and plenty of games; she is seen earlier this month in London

The Tomb Raider actress - who is married to Michael Fassbender - likes introducing different groups of pals to one another through fun games and spends 'hours' agonizing over seating plans to make sure everyone has a good time.

She told Britain's ELLE magazine: 'I love to get guests playing games. It's like stepping on new ground for the first five minutes and then people really, really enjoy it.

'Normally, you kind of just fall into patterns of how dinner parties should be - you should be polite and you should say these things. But I like to shake the box a bit.

'I really enjoy hosting, throwing dinner parties or surprise parties for people and I can spend weeks planning them.

'I come up with games that introduce new people to one another. I spend hours with seating plans, even for a small dinner. It really makes such a difference.

'And I always try to put people next to someone they haven't met before.'

Married couple: With her husband, Michael Fassbender, in October last year

When it comes to socialising, the 28-year-old star 'loves' drinking alcohol - but insists she rarely gets drunk.

She said: 'I do love a drink. More and more, I love wine but I like vodka Martinis or straight-up tequilas.

'I've taken to drinking straight, but I only ever have one or two and I never really get drunk.'

The Danish Girl star and her spouse live in Lisbon, Portugal, and she loves the pace of the city - and eating fish there.

She said: 'I've fallen in love with the city and the fact it's just on the waterfront, close to nature, and I like the warm weather a lot.

'It's a place that is just constantly alive. And they're known for their sardines. I do love sardines.'

'One time, I had a Skype dinner party with my friends,' she explained. 'We decided to each buy a drink, cook something for ourselves, then sit down at a table and Skype each other.

item.title: Afternoon delight! Lady Gaga rocks studded leather jacket on coffee run in Malibu with fiance Christian Carino
item.description: The 31-year-old singing sensation kept warm in a black leather jacket as she followed her fiance Christian Carino out of the coffeehouse near the western end of the upscale beach community.
item.content:encoded:
She's been on the mend since canceling her last string of concerts for her Joanne World Tour due to 'severe pain'.

But Lady Gaga seemed to be in good spirits as she was spotted leaving a Starbucks in Malibu on Sunday afternoon.

The 31-year-old singing sensation kept warm in a black leather jacket as she followed her fiance Christian Carino out of the coffeehouse near the western end of the upscale beach community. 

Scroll down for video 

Out and about! Lady Gaga seemed to be in good spirits as she was spotted leaving a Starbucks in Malibu on Sunday afternoon

Her ornate leather coat featured a splattering of silver studs across her shoulders, with leopard print sleeves beginning below her biceps.

Gaga - whose real name is Stefani Germanotta - kept with the dark theme as she sported a pair of tight black trousers and matching booties.

She tied up half of her platinum blonde hair, with tendrils cascading down her face as she peered out from behind dark cat-eye sunglasses.

Lovers in LA: The 31-year-old singing sensation kept warm in a black leather jacket as she followed her fiance Christian Carino out of the coffeehouse near the western end of the upscale beach community

Style: Her ornate leather coat featured a splattering of silver studs across her shoulders, with leopard print sleeves beginning below her biceps

The Edge of Glory songstress carried a large coffee cup in one hand as she showed off her massive diamond engagement ring.

She followed closely behind her talent agent beau Christian, who kept one hand in the pocket of his grey jeans.

Carino rolled up the sleeves of his black sweater for their quick coffee run, and kept his salt-and-pepper-colored hair covered with a woven fedora. 

Caffeine: Gaga - whose real name is Stefani Germanotta - kept with the dark theme as she sported a pair of tight black trousers and matching booties

Cute: She tied up half of her platinum blonde hair, with tendrils cascading down her face as she peered out from behind dark cat-eye sunglasses

Sparkling: The Edge of Glory songstress carried a large coffee cup in one hand as she showed off her massive diamond engagement ring

While Gaga reportedly became engaged over the summer, she did not want to make an announcement as she was battling fibromyalgia, the chronic condition that resulted in her cancelling the final dates of the European leg of her Joanne World Tour in February.

A statement released by Live Nation following the cancelation claimed the singer was 'suffering from severe pain that has materially impacted her ability to perform live.

'As a result, Live Nation and Lady Gaga are announcing the cancellation of the final 10 dates of the European leg of her Joanne World Tour.  

'Last night, with strong support from her medical team, Lady Gaga made the tough decision to immediately come off the road. She is extremely sorry and deeply saddened that she cannot perform for her European fans, who have waited so patiently.

'​She is in the care of expert medical professionals who are working closely with her so she can continue to perform for her fans for years to come.' 

Whisked away: Carino rolled up the sleeves of his black sweater for their quick coffee run, and kept his salt-and-pepper-colored hair covered with a woven fedora

item.title: Olivia Buckland hits back at cruel trolls who branded her bikini body 'fat' after Barbados getaway
item.description: The reality star has hit back at cruel trolls who branded her bikini-body 'fat' after pictures emerged of her flaunting her stunning size 8 figure on her Barbados getaway.
item.content:encoded:
She enjoyed a exotic beach holiday in Barbados with her fiancé Alex Bowen last week. 

And Olivia Buckland has hit back at cruel trolls who branded her bikini-body 'fat' after pictures emerged of her flaunting her stunning size 8 figure in an array of colourful bikinis during the idyllic break. 

The Love Island star, 24, said she has been affected by some of the 'vile' comments over her weight but defiantly insisted that she likes being 'curvy'. 

Hitting back: Olivia Buckland has slammed cruel trolls who branded her bikini-body 'fat' after pictures emerged of her flaunting her stunning size 8 figure in Barbados

'I don't mind paps taking pictures of me when I'm on holiday, but I do mind some of the vile comments people make under them when they're posted online,' she wrote in her New Magazine column. 

'Around 95 per cent of trolls said I was fat and had cellulite, which worries me because comments like that might affect other girls who could think, "I have cellulite too, that must mean I'm disgusting as well".

'Websites often describe me as a curvy girl as if it's a bad thing, I like being curvy because it means that I'm happy.'

The Love Island star, 24, said she has been affected by some of the 'vile' comments over her weight but defiantly insisted that she liked being 'curvy'

Mean: 'Around 95 per cent of trolls said I was fat and had cellulite' she wrote in her Now Magazine column

The star, who insists she doesn't weigh herself, recently divulged her eating habits in Now Magazine. 

She told the publication, she has banana and chocolate overnight oats for breakfast, chicken and avocado salad with a light dressing for lunch and cooks baked cod with sweet potato and vegetables for dinner. 

For a light snack, the blonde beauty keeps her appetite at bay with pitta bread, houmous, cucumber and carrot sticks.  

Describing her Love Island beau as her 'biggest motivator' to exercise, she added: 'I quite like my bum now but I have to work to keep my stomach flat. I love my food and refuse to deprive myself, but when I eat a lot I get a little tummy bulge.' 

The couple - who are due to get married this summer - enjoyed their extended break with Olivia's family and also met up with Celebs Go Dating matchmaker Lady Nadia Essex during their time on the island.

Their romance has gone from strength to strength since they finished as runners up on the 2016 series of Love Island, with Cara De La Hoyde and Nathan Massey being named winners of the season.

Power couple: The star, who insists she doesn't weigh herself, described her fiancé Alex Bowen as her 'biggest motivator' to exercise 

The couple got engaged during a trip to New York in late 2016 and are now planning their wedding, which is just six months away.

Fans originally thought the pair would be the first Love Island couple to tie the knot, but they were pipped to the post by Jess Shears and Dom Lever, who tied the knot in a Valentine's Day ceremony live on Good Morning Britain.

After Jess and Dom's wedding, Olivia appeared to mock their TV nuptials by 'liking' a tweet posted by a fan that read: 'Jess in a bikini & Dom topless getting married on GMB this morning has gotta be the most tragic thing of 2018. Imagine doing what’s meant to be the most amazing day of our life dirty like that…' 

Alex and Olivia have also spoken recently about plans to start a family, after their Love Island co-stars Cara De La Hoyde and Nathan welcomed their first child together.

Clean eater: The star credits her lean figure to a healthy diet, which includes oats, cod and chicken and avocado salad  

In an exclusive interview with MailOnline in November, the Wolverhampton native joked: 'I want to get her pregnant on our wedding night!' The couple also revealed plans to film their wedding, so fans would get the chance to see their relationship come full circle after first meeting in the Love Island villa.

Olivia said: 'We’re in talks about having our wedding filmed as it would be nice to look back on. People saw us get get together on Love Island so it will complete our love story.'

The couple launched their new business venture In Fitness & In Health - the first wellbeing wedding boutique where engaged couples can seek advice for overcoming the stresses of their upcoming nuptials. 

During an insightful discussion at the launch event in February, the pair admitted to 'skipping meals' and 'eating takeaways' due to their busy schedules, but vowed to 'cut down on fast food' to ensure they fit in their dream wedding ensembles.

They also aimed to 'reduce social media screen time' in order to prevent sleep issues before their big day. The launch comes after the Say Yes to the Dress star revealed she's a 'little bit of a Bridezilla' when planning her upcoming wedding. 

When speaking on her approaching nuptials, the reality star told new! magazine: '[I'm] a little bit [of a bridezilla]. You don't realise how stressful it is until you go through it...I think bridezilla will make its way out fully eventually.'

She continued: 'Alex was hands-on when he tried the cakes, but he lets me get on with it because he knows I'm quite picky and he trusts my opinion.'

Revealing the location of her wedding, Olivia told the publication: 'We've decided we're definitely getting married in Essex. There are so many beautiful houses and gardens around the area, so that's sort of the vibe we want to go for.' 

Lifestyle overhaul: The pair admitted to 'skipping meals' and 'eating takeaways' due to their busy schedules back in February but vowed to be healthier ahead of their upcoming nuptials

And Olivia Buckland has hit back at cruel trolls who branded her bikini-body 'fat' after pictures emerged of her flaunting her stunning size 8 figure in an array of colourful bikinis during the idyllic break. The Love Island star, 24, said she has been affected by some of the 'vile' comments over her weight but defiantly insisted that she likes being 'curvy'.

item.title: Shanina Shaik sparkles in a silver dramatically plunging gown and shows off her incredible pins as she attends the amFAR Gala in Hong Kong
item.description: Shanina Shaik continued to glow as she attended the 2018 American Foundation for AIDS Research [amFAR] gala at Shaw Studios in Hong Kong on Monday night.
item.content:encoded:
She recently shared images of her stunning bridal shower, ahead of her wedding to fiancé DJ Ruckus.

And model Shanina Shaik continued to glow as she attended the 2018 American Foundation for AIDS Research [amFAR] gala at Shaw Studios in Hong Kong on Monday night.

The Australian beauty, 27, wore a drastically plunging gown, cut down to her navel and teasing her bust, which she off-set with an aquamarine necklace of stones which cascaded between her assets.

Star quality: Shanina Shaik sparkles in a silver dramatically plunging gown and shows off her incredible pins as she attends the amFAR Gala in Hong Kong 

Te gown was adorned at the front with a giant mauve bow, the rest of the outfit silver and sparkling.

While the back of the gown cascaded to the floor behind her, the front featured a high-cut, slanted hem, which showed off her toned pins.

She wore black strap heels to the look and offset the silver dress with a hot pink clutch.

The model teamed her necklace with earrings of the same jewels, and wore her chestnut tresses up, allowing two strands to fall playfully around her features.

Sweeping statement: While the back of the gown cascaded to the floor behind her, the front featured a high-cut, slanted hem, which showed off her toned pins

She smouldered for the cameras with a caramel sweep of foundation and a pop of clay pink to her lips. 

Shanina had previously gushed over her phenomenal bridal shower when she posted a heartfelt thank you to her close girl pals on Instagram following the extravagant soiree.

Accompanied with the note, the model documented her gorgeous look for the swanky soiree as she donned a pretty floral dress.

Fans were given a further glimpse at her very plush party, which was complete with an impressive flower wall as well as a dessert bar and floral ice cubes.

Blossoming beginnings: Shanina Shaik gushed over her lavish bridal shower complete with signature cocktails and Tom Ford gifts

Must be love: The stunning model, 27, is going to be heading down the aisle to marry her fiancé DJ Ruckus

The bride-to-be thanked her close girl pals for making her wedding send-off 'so beautiful and special'.

Shanina penned on social media: 'Thank you to everyone who made my Bridal Shower so beautiful and special! #SoonToBeMrsAndrews.' (sic) 

The  statuesque brunette documented her soiree, via Instagram, complete with Tom Ford gifts, signature cocktails, flower ice cubes and pink choc-dipped strawberries. 

Before the bridal party had even commenced, the Victoria's Secret model posted a number of presents she had been gifted by American fashion designer Tom Ford.

Blooming lovely: Fans were given a further glimpse at her very plush party, which was complete with an impressive flower wall as well as a dessert bar and floral ice cubes

Ice hot: The bride-to-be thanked her close girl pals for making her wedding send-off 'so beautiful and special'

A-list guest list: Shanina penned on social media 'Thank you to everyone who made my Bridal Shower so beautiful and special! #SoonToBeMrsAndrews' (sic)
